papers.title: Study of LDPC decoders with quadratic residue sequence for communication system
papers.authors: A. Rajagopal, K. Karibasappa, K. S. Vasundara Patel
papers.abstract: This paper shows an effective combination of LDPC codes along with DSSS technique to achieve the most reliable and an efficient transmission of information signal. Here the LogSPA and SSD decoders are selected for the decoding task and spreading of signal in DSSS is achieved by using quadratic residue sequences that are based on prime numbers as pseudo-noise sequences (PN sequence). In particular the PN sequences being used here are Legendre and Weil sequences. Due to the significant increase in the trend of PN sequence's application in global positioning system (GPS) and satellite communication systems, in the present work an attempt is done to show suitability of PN sequences based on quadratic residues with LDPC codes which have gained substantial importance in recent advancements due to their excellent error-correcting capabilities.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文展示了LDPC码与DSSS技术的有效结合，以实现最可靠和最有效的信息信号传输。这里选择LogSPA和SSD解码器用于解码任务，并且通过使用基于素数的二次剩余序列作为伪噪声序列(PN序列)来实现DSSS中的信号扩展。特别地，这里使用的PN序列是Legendre和Weil序列。由于PN序列在全球定位系统(GPS)和卫星通信系统中的应用趋势的显著增加，在当前的工作中，尝试显示基于二次剩余的PN序列与LDPC码的适用性，该码在最近的发展中由于其优异的纠错能力而获得了实质的重要性。
papers.title_zh: 通信系统中二次剩余序列LDPC译码器的研究

papers.title: Static analysis method for detecting cross site scripting vulnerabilities
papers.authors: Usha Gopal, Kannimuthu Subramanian, P. D. Mahendiran, Anusha Kadambari Shanker, Deepti Venugopal
papers.abstract: These days, the internet has turned into the favoured stage for clients to complete many activities of their everyday lives, including activities that include delicate data, for example, e-trade, e-administration, e-saving money, shopping portals and that is only the tip of the iceberg. Web applications have turned out to be unavoidable in all parts of life in view of the simplicity of remote availability for its clients. Yet, as the use of web builds each day, it has likewise brought into light the perilous side of HTML. Security has, along these lines end up noticeably one of the significant concerns with respect to the internet. In this paper, we concentrate on the particular issue of cross site scripting (XSS) assaults. We exhibit a scientific categorisation think about on cross site scripting assaults. We have additionally examined different sorts of vulnerabilities present and dangers delivered for this assault. We have also proposed a static analysis-based system for the detection and removal of the XSS vulnerabilities.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，互联网已成为客户完成日常生活中许多活动的首选平台，包括包含敏感数据的活动，例如电子贸易、电子管理、电子存钱、购物门户，而这只是冰山一角。鉴于客户远程访问的简单性，Web应用在生活的各个方面都是不可避免的。然而，随着web的使用日益增多，它也同样暴露了HTML的危险一面。按照这些思路，安全性显然已经成为互联网最重要的问题之一。在本文中，我们集中讨论跨站点脚本(XSS)攻击这一特殊问题。我们展示了关于跨站脚本攻击的科学分类。此外，我们还研究了此次攻击中存在的不同类型的漏洞和带来的危险。我们还提出了一个基于静态分析的系统，用于检测和消除XSS漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 检测跨站脚本漏洞的静态分析方法

papers.title: An energy efficient authentication scheme based on hierarchical IBDS and EIBDS in grid-based wireless sensor networks
papers.authors: Handenahalli Channareddy Kantharaju, K. N. Narasimha Murthy
papers.abstract: Wireless sensor network is a peculiar kind of ad hoc network, consists of hundreds of tiny, resource constrained as sensor nodes. Clustering is a demanding task in such environment mainly due to the unique constraints such as energy efficiency and dynamic topology. In this paper, a novel energy efficient cluster-based routing algorithm is proposed on which hierarchical identity-based digital signature (IBDS) and enhanced-identity-based digital signature (EIBDS) scheme is concerning in grid-based wireless sensor networks. Firstly we form clusters using multi-parameters-based type-2 fuzzy logic algorithm. This paper proposes an improved ant colony optimisation algorithm, which optimises the energy consumption on data transfer in a WSN. Each node in a sensor network is authenticated using elliptic curve cryptography (ECC). After a set of simulation tests on NS-3 simulator, our proposed work achieves good performance for various metrics.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线传感器网络是一种特殊的ad hoc网络，由数百个微小的、资源受限的传感器节点组成。在这种环境中，群集是一项要求很高的任务，这主要是由于诸如能量效率和动态拓扑等独特的限制。在网格无线传感器网络中，提出了一种新的能量有效的基于簇的路由算法，该算法结合了基于层次身份的数字签名(IBDS)和基于增强身份的数字签名(EIBDS)方案。首先，我们使用基于多参数的2型模糊逻辑算法形成聚类。提出一种改进的蚁群优化算法，优化WSN中数据传输的能耗。传感器网络中的每个节点都使用椭圆曲线密码(ECC)进行认证。经过在NS-3模拟器上的一系列模拟测试，我们的工作在各种指标上都取得了良好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 网格无线传感器网络中基于分层IBDS和EIBDS的节能认证方案

papers.title: An efficient interior and exterior boundary detection-based two level iris segmentation
papers.authors: Suleiman Salihu Jauro, Raghav Yadav
papers.abstract: Iris recognition system's performance relies upon the method of segmentation of iris from the eye image. The segmentation process of iris still stumbles upon with few tricky challenges, particularly in separating the iris from eye image. The prevailing eyelids and eyelashes in the image leads to the lessening of the accuracy. A two-level segmentation' methodology was proposed. Initially, the iris image was converted to greyscale image and normalised. The adaptive median filter (AMF) was utilised to remove the noise. The noise removable image was segmented using two-level segmentation method. In interior boundary segmentation section, the image was segmented utilising some methods like Gaussian pyramid, anisotropic diffusion, thresholding, centroid computing, polar transform, and radius computing. Exterior boundary segmentation section performs zigzag collarette process. Finally, the IBS was subtracted from EBS; to give the segmented iris. Experimental results when compared with ACWOE and K-means demonstrated the superiority of the proposed technique.
papers.abstract_zh: 虹膜识别系统的性能依赖于从眼睛图像中分割出虹膜的方法。虹膜的分割过程仍然遇到一些棘手的挑战，特别是在从眼睛图像中分离虹膜。图像中占优势的眼睑和睫毛导致精确度降低。提出了一种两级分割方法。最初，虹膜图像被转换成灰度图像并被归一化。自适应中值滤波器(AMF)被用来消除噪声。采用两级分割法对去噪图像进行分割。在内部边界分割部分，利用高斯金字塔、各向异性扩散、阈值、质心计算、极坐标变换和半径计算等方法对图像进行分割。外部边界分割部分执行锯齿形围环处理。最后，从EBS中减去IBS以给出分段的虹膜。实验结果表明，与ACWOE和K-means算法相比，该方法具有优越性。
papers.title_zh: 一种高效的基于内外边界检测的两级虹膜分割方法

papers.title: An improved co-designed AES-ECC cryptosystem for secure data transmission
papers.authors: Amal Hafsa, Anissa Sghaier, Medien Zeghid, Jihene Malek, Mohsen Machhout
papers.abstract: Asymmetric cryptography is inherently slow because of its associated complex computing, while symmetric cryptography is speedy. However, the latter is suffering from a serious gap which is secure key exchange. To deal with this problem, we suggest an efficient hybrid AES-ECC cryptosystem combining the benefits of the symmetric advanced encryption standard (AES) to speed-up data encryption and the asymmetric elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) to secure the symmetric key session interchange. The proposed hybrid AES-ECC cryptosystem uses a co-design approach and relies on AES-ECC optimisations. We fundamentally mix the matrix multiplication of the AES MixColumns with the S-box allowing for very fast software implementation (on NIOS-II processor). Then, we propose an optimised ECC hardware architecture based on Lopez-Dahab scalar multiplication (on Cyclone IV.E). The implementation results of the proposed cryptosystem afford an interesting trade-off between area, speed, and power and can be used for information and computer security.
papers.abstract_zh: 非对称加密由于其相关的复杂计算而天生缓慢，而对称加密速度很快。然而，后者存在一个严重的缺陷，即安全密钥交换。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种高效的混合AES-ECC密码系统，它结合了对称高级加密标准(AES)的优点以加速数据加密和非对称椭圆曲线密码(ECC)的优点以保护对称密钥会话交换。所提出的混合AES-ECC密码系统使用协同设计方法，并且依赖于AES-ECC优化。我们从根本上混合了AES混合列的矩阵乘法和S-box，允许非常快速的软件实现(在NIOS-II处理器上)。然后，我们基于Lopez-Dahab标量乘法(在Cyclone IV上)提出了优化的ECC硬件架构。e)。所提出的密码系统的实现结果在面积、速度和功率之间提供了有趣的折衷，并且可以用于信息和计算机安全。
papers.title_zh: 一种改进的协同设计的AES-ECC安全数据传输系统

papers.title: Image encryption scheme based on a novel fractional order compound chaotic attractor
papers.authors: Jian-Feng Zhao, Shu-Ying Wang, Li-Tao Zhang, Xian-Feng Li
papers.abstract: Many image encryption algorithms have too small key space to prevent exhaust attacks. Based on a novel compound chaotic system, an algorithm with expanded key space is proposed to aim at the problem. Firstly, an adaptive method is provided to design switching controllers during creating a novel compound chaos. Secondly, general Arnold transform is used to realise pixel scrambling technology. Finally, the novel fractional compound chaos is applied in pixel diffusion to improve security of the image encryption algorithm. In numerical simulation, classical colour image, gray image, binary image and non-square image are encrypted sufficiently to identify the encryption algorithm. Both theoretical analysis and experimental results show that the algorithm has larger key space and is suitable for different types of digital images, and encryption image can resist some kinds of external attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多图像加密算法的密钥空间太小，无法防止穷举攻击。针对该问题，基于一种新型复合混沌系统，提出了一种扩展密钥空间的算法。首先，在产生一个新的复合混沌的过程中，提出了一种自适应方法来设计切换控制器。其次，利用广义Arnold变换实现像素置乱技术。最后，将新型分数复合混沌应用于像素扩散，以提高图像加密算法的安全性。在数值模拟中，对经典的彩色图像、灰度图像、二值图像和非正方形图像进行了充分的加密，以识别加密算法。理论分析和实验结果表明，该算法具有较大的密钥空间，适用于不同类型的数字图像，加密后的图像可以抵抗一些外部攻击。
papers.title_zh: 基于新型分数阶复合混沌吸引子的图像加密方案

papers.title: Comparative evaluation of different classification techniques for masquerade attack detection
papers.authors: Wisam Elmasry, Akhan Akbulut, Abdul Halim Zaim
papers.abstract: Masquerade detection is a special type of intrusion detection problem. Effective and early intrusion detection is a crucial basis for computer security. Although of considerable work has been focused on masquerade detection for more than a decade, achieving a high level of accuracy and a comparatively low degree of false alarm rate is still a big challenge. In this paper, we present an extensive empirical study in the area of user behaviour profiling-based masquerade detection using six of different existed machine learning methods in Azure Machine Learning (AML) studio. In order to surpass previous studies on this subject, we used four free and publicly available datasets with seven data configurations are implemented from them. Moreover, eight well-known masquerade detection evaluation metrics are used to assess methods performance against each data configuration. Finally, intensive quantitative and ROC curves analyses of results are provided at the end of this paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 伪装检测是一种特殊类型的入侵检测问题。有效和早期的入侵检测是计算机安全的重要基础。虽然十多年来大量的工作都集中在伪装检测上，但是实现高水平的准确性和相对低程度的虚警率仍然是一个巨大的挑战。在本文中，我们使用Azure Machine Learning(AML)studio中六种不同的现有机器学习方法，在基于用户行为分析的伪装检测领域进行了广泛的实证研究。为了超越之前在这个问题上的研究，我们使用了四个免费和公开可用的数据集，其中实现了七种数据配置。此外，八个众所周知的伪装检测评估指标用于评估方法性能对每个数据配置。最后，在文章的最后提供了结果的定量和ROC曲线分析。
papers.title_zh: 伪装攻击检测不同分类技术的比较评估

papers.title: Mobile cloud computing applications penetration testing model design
papers.authors: Ahmad Salah Al-Ahmad, Syed Ahmad Aljunid, Normaly Kamal Ismail
papers.abstract: Mobile cloud computing (MCC) is a promising technology due to its features that mitigate mobile computing limitations and enhances cloud services. However, penetration testing is more challenging when conducted on MCC applications. These applications use offloading, and thus another layer of complexity in generating, selecting and executing test cases, which implies and requires an MCC applications penetration testing offloading-awareness model. To overcome these challenges, a penetration testing model for mobile cloud computing applications is designed. This model defines the process of penetration testing over MCC applications including penetration test preparation, test case generation, selection and execution processes. Key components of this offloading-awareness model are state management and mobile agent while other components are adapted from previous penetration testing models for the web, cloud or mobile applications. This model will enable penetration testers to tackle the mobile cloud computing complexity and uniqueness. Currently, we are preparing the evaluation of the model against these MCC applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动云计算(MCC)是一项很有前途的技术，因为它具有减轻移动计算限制和增强云服务的特性。然而，渗透测试在MCC应用中更具挑战性。这些应用使用卸载，因此在生成、选择和执行测试用例时又增加了一层复杂性，这意味着并需要MCC应用渗透测试卸载感知模型。为了克服这些挑战，设计了一种针对移动云计算应用的渗透测试模型。该模型定义了对MCC应用进行渗透测试的过程，包括渗透测试准备、测试用例生成、选择和执行过程。这种卸载感知模型的关键组件是状态管理和移动代理，而其他组件则改编自以前针对web、云或移动应用的渗透测试模型。该模型将使渗透测试人员能够应对移动云计算的复杂性和独特性。目前，我们正在准备对这些MCC应用的模型进行评估。
papers.title_zh: 移动云计算应用渗透测试模型设计

papers.title: An authentication scheme for distributed computing environment
papers.authors: Saeed Ullah Jan, Fawad Qayum
papers.abstract: In this era of information technology, the protection of personal sensitive information is one of the most challenging tasks which will not allow any human being to escape from browsing, sharing and holding information. In this scenario different service provider offers services for its users to share their personal sensitive information, resources and identity via distributed network. And attackers can easily pick this information from the open network due to lack of cross verification of the legality of peers. Almost no researcher claims with conviction about a foolproof secure authentication scheme for the said environment. In this regard, a robust authentication scheme is presented for the distributed computing environment which not only offers a secure cross verification of user validity but can also protect personal sensitive information and secure sharing of associated resources. The performance and security analysis at the end of this paper shows that the scheme is best among all available in the recent literature. All the narratives show that the scheme can easily be implemented in the recent era for the said purpose.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这个信息技术时代，保护个人敏感信息是最具挑战性的任务之一，任何人都无法逃避浏览、共享和保存信息。在这种情况下，不同的服务提供商为其用户提供服务，以通过分布式网络共享他们的个人敏感信息、资源和身份。由于缺乏对对等体合法性的交叉验证，攻击者可以很容易地从开放网络中获取这些信息。几乎没有研究人员有把握地宣称，在上述环境中，有一个万无一失的安全认证方案。在这方面，提出了一种用于分布式计算环境的健壮认证方案，该方案不仅提供了用户有效性的安全交叉验证，而且还可以保护个人敏感信息和相关资源的安全共享。本文最后的性能和安全性分析表明，该方案在现有文献中是最好的。所有的叙述表明，该计划可以很容易地在最近的时代实现上述目的。
papers.title_zh: 一种分布式计算环境下的认证方案

papers.title: Introducing virtue ethics concepts into the decision processes of information systems trusted workers: a Delphi study
papers.authors: John M. Gray, Gurvirender P. Tejay
papers.abstract: Human factors affect the incorporation and efficiency of information systems security (ISS). This study examined various factors which affect and shape the ethical perspectives and decision making processes of individuals with access to personal, sensitive, and classified information maintained in information systems. A two-round web-based Delphi survey was completed by a ten member panel of ISS subject matter experts who were convened to identify and establish the key indicators of four virtue ethics based formative constructs for ISS trusted worker decision making and conduct. Consensus was reached on the applicability of a set of indicators for each construct. The high level of agreement among panel members indicates that these constructs can be used to promote conceptual thinking about the influences and implications to the ISS culture in an organisation. The controls lay the foundation for future research as they can be incorporated into a new theoretical model of ISS trusted worker ethical behaviour.
papers.abstract_zh: 人为因素影响信息系统安全(ISS)的整合和效率。本研究调查了影响和塑造个人道德观点和决策过程的各种因素，这些个人有权访问信息系统中保存的个人、敏感和机密信息。由ISS主题专家组成的十人小组完成了两轮基于网络的德尔菲调查，召集这些专家来确定和建立ISS可信员工决策和行为的四个基于美德伦理的形成性结构的关键指标。就每种结构的一套指标的适用性达成了共识。小组成员之间的高度一致表明，这些结构可用于促进对组织中ISS文化的影响和含义的概念性思考。这些控制措施为未来的研究奠定了基础，因为它们可以纳入ISS可信员工道德行为的新理论模型。
papers.title_zh: 将美德伦理概念引入信息系统可信工作者的决策过程:一项德尔菲研究

papers.title: SAPMS: a secure and anonymous parking management system for autonomous vehicles
papers.authors: Oladayo Olufemi Olakanmi
papers.abstract: Recent surveys on autonomous vehicle (AV) (SAE level 5) have shown its potential in transforming road transportation system. Its advent will revolutionise road transportation, however, before this could happen vital operations in road transportation management need re-modification or redesign. One of these operations is parking system; most of the existing parking systems are targeted towards non-autonomous vehicles, where parking is not only distance-bound but parking prices are affected by other factors such as time and location. In this paper, a smart and anonymous parking management system using a novel space selection technique and anonymous authentication for space selection and reservation is proposed. The system determines the parking pattern with the lowest parking cost using the developed space selection algorithm. The performance of the system was evaluated in terms of estimated computation cost and possibility of obtaining optimal parking pattern under the dynamic pricing system. The results showed that the proposed system is capable of selecting the best parking pattern at the lowest computational cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近对自动驾驶汽车(AV)(SAE 5级)的调查显示了它在改变道路交通系统方面的潜力。它的出现将彻底改变道路运输，然而，在此之前，道路运输管理中的重要操作需要重新修改或重新设计。这些操作之一是停车系统；大多数现有的停车系统是针对非自主车辆的，其中停车不仅受距离限制，而且停车价格受时间和位置等其他因素的影响。本文提出了一种智能的匿名停车场管理系统，该系统采用了一种新颖的车位选择技术和用于车位选择和预订的匿名认证。该系统使用开发的空间选择算法来确定具有最低停车成本的停车模式。该系统的性能是根据估计的计算成本和在动态定价系统下获得最优停车模式的可能性来评估的。结果表明，该系统能够以最低的计算成本选择最佳的停车模式。
papers.title_zh: SAPMS:一个安全匿名的自主车辆停车管理系统

papers.title: An improved key pre-distribution scheme based on the security level classification of keys for wireless sensor networks
papers.authors: Jianmin Zhang, Hua Li, Jian Li
papers.abstract: The use of wireless sensor networks (WSNs) in any real-world application requires a certain level of security. To provide security of operations such as message exchange, key management schemes have to be well adapted to the particularities of WSNs. Unfortunately, the resource limitation of sensor nodes poses a great challenge for designing an efficient and effective key establishment scheme for WSNs. This paper proposes a novel key management scheme. In the proposed scheme, the pre-distributed keys in nodes are classified different security levels and the higher security level of the pre-distributed key in compromised nodes will disclose the fewer pre-distributed keys in the uncompromised nodes than that of the lower security level of the pre-distributed key. The proposed scheme is analysed based on connectivity, resistance against attacks, memory consumption and communication overhead. Simulation results confirm that the proposed scheme has a good resilience against node compromising attacks compared to the existing schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 在任何现实世界的应用中使用无线传感器网络(WSNs)都需要一定程度的安全性。为了提供诸如消息交换等操作的安全性，密钥管理方案必须很好地适应无线传感器网络的特殊性。不幸的是，传感器节点的资源限制给设计高效的无线传感器网络密钥建立方案带来了巨大的挑战。提出了一种新颖的密钥管理方案。在提出的方案中，节点中预分配的密钥被划分为不同的安全级别，受威胁节点中预分配密钥的较高安全级别将比预分配密钥的较低安全级别在未受威胁节点中公开更少的预分配密钥。基于连通性、抗攻击性、内存消耗和通信开销对所提出的方案进行了分析。仿真结果表明，与现有方案相比，该方案具有良好的抗节点泄漏攻击能力。
papers.title_zh: 基于密钥安全等级分类的无线传感器网络密钥预分配方案

papers.title: Protecting composite IoT server by secure secret key exchange for XEN intra virtual machines
papers.authors: Anil Yadav, Anurag Tripathi, Nitin Rakesh, Sujata Pandey
papers.abstract: Challenges presented by ever increasing volumes of smart objects are huge in terms of security and privacy of data generated out of these objects. These challenges range from the usage scenario with other objects and dedicated servers which act as a middleman among various networks such as internet and wireless sensor network. In this paper, attempt has been made to highlight a simple use case of a composite server in a XEN-based virtualised system. Security threats like sniffing and spoofing are isolated and analysed with respect to a novel key transfer method between host and guest operating system in XEN-based virtualised system. In addition, secure and trust model to cater the said security threats like sniffing and spoofing is also presented. The performance of the proposed system in terms of CPU usage and network bandwidth is also shown.
papers.abstract_zh: 不断增长的智能对象数量在这些对象生成的数据的安全性和隐私性方面带来了巨大的挑战。这些挑战包括其他对象的使用场景和在各种网络(如互联网和无线传感器网络)中充当中间人的专用服务器。在本文中，我们试图强调一个基于XEN的虚拟化系统中复合服务器的简单用例。针对基于XEN的虚拟化系统中主机和客户操作系统之间的一种新颖的密钥传送方法，隔离和分析了诸如嗅探和欺骗之类的安全威胁。此外，还提出了一种安全信任模型来应对上述安全威胁，如嗅探和欺骗。还显示了所提议的系统在CPU使用率和网络带宽方面的性能。
papers.title_zh: XEN虚拟机内部安全密钥交换保护复合物联网服务器

papers.title: Reversible data hiding methods in integer wavelet transform
papers.authors: Amishi Mahesh Kapadia, Nithyanandam Pandian
papers.abstract: Reversible data hiding is art of concealing secret information such that cover media and secret information are both recovered without any information loss. In this paper high frequency sub-bands of integer wavelet transform are used for data embedding. All coefficients are used for embedding and to improve the security the embedding is carried out in frequency domain using spiral, sequential and random embedding method. The main objective of this research is to hide the maximum data with minimal distortion and to attain reversible hiding phenomenon both in cover and secret image. The experimental result shows the improved capacity, imperceptibility and complete reversibility attained on standard and medical images. The parameter of robustness has not been vastly studied for reversible data hiding and an attempt is made to check the same for basic attacks and results shows that it can withstand geometrical attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 可逆数据隐藏是一种隐藏秘密信息的技术，使得载体和秘密信息都可以被恢复而没有任何信息丢失。本文将整数小波变换的高频子带用于数据嵌入。所有系数用于嵌入，并且为了提高安全性，嵌入使用螺旋、顺序和随机嵌入方法在频域中进行。本研究的主要目标是在最小失真的情况下隐藏最多的数据，并在载体和秘密图像中实现可逆隐藏现象。实验结果表明，该算法在标准图像和医学图像上均取得了较好的容量、不可感知性和完全可逆性。对于可逆数据隐藏，鲁棒性参数还没有被广泛地研究，并且尝试对基本攻击检查该参数，结果表明它可以抵抗几何攻击。
papers.title_zh: 整数小波变换中的可逆数据隐藏方法

papers.title: VIKAS: a new virtual keyboard-based simple and efficient text CAPTCHA verification scheme
papers.authors: Ankit Thakkar, Kajol Patel
papers.abstract: Nowadays online transactions are becoming ubiquitous that must be protected from bots using different techniques, and CAPTCHA is one of them. Text-CAPTCHA preferred due to its simplicity amongst different types of CAPTCHAs. Text-CAPTCHA can be strengthened by adding some distortion to prevent bot-attacks but cause usability issues for humans. This results in multiple attempts by a user to gain access to the required service and may give frustration to the user. Hence, there is a need to design CAPTCHA which is easy for humans to recognise but difficult for bots. This paper proposes virtual keyboard-based simple and efficient text-CAPTCHA verification scheme (VIKAS) that makes CAPTCHA verification easy for humans but difficult for bots. VIKAS uses simple text-CAPTCHA and verifies the same using positions of the keys pressed by the user using an image-based virtual keyboard. VIKAS is sustainable against segmentation scheme, replay attacks and possible attacks with keyloggers.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，在线交易变得无处不在，必须使用不同的技术来防止机器人，验证码就是其中之一。文本验证码是首选，因为它在不同类型的验证码中比较简单。文本验证码可以通过添加一些扭曲来加强，以防止机器人攻击，但会给人类带来可用性问题。这导致用户多次尝试访问所需的服务，并可能使用户感到沮丧。因此，有必要设计一个人类容易识别但机器人很难识别的验证码。提出了一种基于虚拟键盘的简单高效的文本验证码验证方案(VIKAS ),使得验证码验证对人类来说很容易，但对机器人来说很难。VIKAS使用简单的文本验证码，并通过用户使用基于图像的虚拟键盘按下的按键位置来验证该验证码。VIKAS对分段方案、重放攻击和可能的键盘记录器攻击是可持续的。
papers.title_zh: VIKAS:一种新的基于虚拟键盘的简单高效的文本验证码验证方案

papers.title: A secured modular exponentiation for RSA and CRT-RSA with dual blinding to resist power analysis attacks
papers.authors: Hridoy Jyoti Mahanta, Ajoy Kumar Khan
papers.abstract: Blinding has been one of the most effective approaches to resist power analysis attacks on asymmetric cryptosystems like RSA. Blinding is similar to masking in symmetric cryptosystems, but masking can be implemented in various ways like Boolean, affine, polynomial masking, etc. However, for asymmetric cryptosystems with modular exponentiation as a fundamental operation, arithmetic masking or simply blinding has been extremely popular. In this paper, we have presented a secured approach for modular exponentiation in RSA and CRT-RSA cryptosystems with dual blinding. Through dual blinding, we have masked both secret exponent and message twice before executing the fundamental operations. We have also injected two ineffectual instructions between the fundamental operations and blinded the intermediate results to felicitate hiding and resist simple power analysis. The implementation results shows that with a nominal penalty, RSA and CRT-RSA with dual blinding can effectively resist some popular simple power analysis and differential power analysis attacks to a significant extent.
papers.abstract_zh: 在RSA等非对称密码系统上，盲法是抵抗功耗分析攻击的最有效方法之一。盲化类似于对称密码系统中的屏蔽，但屏蔽可以以各种方式实现，如布尔、仿射、多项式屏蔽等。然而，对于以模幂运算为基本运算的非对称密码系统来说，算术掩盖或简单的盲法已经极为流行。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个在RSA和CRT-RSA密码系统中实现模幂运算的安全方法。通过双重盲法，在执行基本操作之前，我们对秘密指数和消息进行了两次掩蔽。我们还在基本操作之间注入了两个无效的指令，并对中间结果进行了伪装，以隐藏和抵制简单的功耗分析。实现结果表明，在代价很小的情况下，双盲RSA和CRT-RSA可以有效抵抗一些流行的简单功耗分析和差分功耗分析攻击。
papers.title_zh: 抵抗功耗分析攻击的RSA和CRT-RSA的安全模幂运算

papers.title: Eight neighbour bits swap encryption-based image steganography using arithmetic progression technique
papers.authors: Srilekha Mukherjee, Goutam Sanyal
papers.abstract: This paper presents a steganographic approach of concealing the secret data so as to facilitate secure communication. Eight neighbour bits swap (ENBS) encryption has been used on the chosen cover image in the first stage. This results in the scrambling of the data bits, thereby disrupting the normal pixel orientation. Finally data bits from the secret image are embedded within the scrambled cover using the technique of arithmetic progression. Lastly inverse eight neighbour bits swap (ENBS) transformation is applied on the above generated image. This results in a descrambling operation, i.e., reverting back the normal orientation. Henceforth the stego is generated. Several quantitative and qualitative benchmarks analysis pertaining to this approach is made. All the results show that the imperceptibility is well maintained. Also the payload is high with negligible distortion produced in the image.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种隐藏秘密数据的隐写方法，以利于安全通信。在第一阶段中，在选择的载体图像上已经使用了八个相邻比特交换(ENBS)加密。这导致数据位的扰乱，从而破坏正常的像素方向。最后，使用算术级数技术将秘密图像的数据比特嵌入到加扰的载体中。最后，对上述生成的图像应用逆八邻位交换(ENBS)变换。这导致解扰操作，即恢复正常方向。从此产生隐写。对该方法进行了几个定量和定性的基准分析。所有的结果都表明不可感知性得到了很好的保持。此外，有效载荷很高，图像中产生的失真可以忽略不计。
papers.title_zh: 基于算术级数技术的八邻位交换加密图像隐写术

papers.title: Nested context-aware sanitisation and feature injection in clustered templates of JavaScript worms on the cloud-based OSN
papers.authors: Shashank Gupta, Brij B. Gupta, Pooja Chaudhary
papers.abstract: This article presents an enhanced JavaScript feature-injection based framework that obstructs the execution of cross-site scripting (XSS) worms from the virtual machines of cloud-based online social network (OSN). It calculates the features of clustered-sanitised compressed templates of JavaScript attack vectors embedded in the HTTP response messages. Any variation observed in such JavaScript feature set indicates the injection of XSS worms on the cloud-based OSN server. The injected worms will further undergo through the process of nested context-aware sanitisation for its safe interpretation on the web browser. The prototype of our framework was developed in Java and installed in the virtual machines of cloud environment. The experimental evaluation of our framework was performed on the platform of OSN-based web applications deployed in the cloud platform. The performance analysis done revealed that our framework detects the injection of malicious JavaScript code with low false negative rate and acceptable performance overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一个增强的基于JavaScript特征注入的框架，该框架可以阻止来自基于云的在线社交网络(OSN)的虚拟机的跨站点脚本(XSS)蠕虫的执行。它计算嵌入在HTTP响应消息中的JavaScript攻击向量的集群化压缩模板的特征。在这种JavaScript功能集中观察到的任何变化都表明XSS蠕虫在基于云的OSN服务器上的注入。注入的蠕虫将进一步经历嵌套的上下文感知净化过程，以便在web浏览器上进行安全解释。我们的框架原型是用Java开发的，安装在云环境的虚拟机上。对我们的框架的实验评估是在部署在云平台中的基于OSN的web应用的平台上进行的。性能分析表明，我们的框架能够以较低的误报率和可接受的性能开销检测恶意JavaScript代码的注入。
papers.title_zh: 基于云的OSN上JavaScript蠕虫集群模板中的嵌套上下文感知净化和特征注入

papers.title: Fault prediction for distributed computing Hadoop clusters using real-time higher order differential inputs to SVM: Zedacross
papers.authors: Joey Pinto, Pooja Jain, Tapan Kumar
papers.abstract: Hadoop distributed computing clusters are used worldwide for high-performance computations. Often various hardware and software faults occur, leading to both data and computation time losses. This paper proposes the usage of a fault prediction software called 'Zedacross' which uses machine learning principles combined with cluster monitoring tools. Firstly, the paper suggests a model that uses the resource usage statistics of a normally functioning Hadoop cluster to create a machine learning model that can then be used to predict and detect faults in real time. Secondly, the paper explains the novel idea of using higher order differentials as inputs to SVM for highly accurate fault predictions. Predictions of system faults by observing system resource usage statistics in real-time with minimum delay will play a vital role in deciding the need for job rescheduling tasks or even dynamic up-scaling of the cluster. To demonstrate the effectiveness of the design a Java utility was built to perform cluster fault monitoring. The results obtained after running the system on various test cases demonstrate that the proposed method is accurate and effective.
papers.abstract_zh: Hadoop分布式计算集群在全球范围内用于高性能计算。经常发生各种硬件和软件故障，导致数据和计算时间损失。本文提出使用一种称为“Zedacross”的故障预测软件，该软件使用机器学习原理并结合集群监控工具。首先，本文提出了一个模型，该模型使用正常运行的Hadoop集群的资源使用统计数据来创建一个机器学习模型，然后该模型可以用于实时预测和检测故障。其次，该论文解释了使用高阶微分作为SVM的输入用于高精度故障预测的新颖想法。通过以最小延迟实时观察系统资源使用统计来预测系统故障，将在决定是否需要重新调度作业任务甚至动态扩展集群方面发挥至关重要的作用。为了证明设计的有效性，构建了一个Java实用程序来执行集群故障监控。在各种测试案例上运行该系统后获得的结果证明了所提出的方法是准确和有效的。
papers.title_zh: 使用SVM的实时高阶差分输入对分布式计算Hadoop集群进行故障预测

papers.title: A coupled map lattice-based image encryption approach using DNA and bi-objective genetic algorithm
papers.authors: Shelza Suri, Ritu Vijay
papers.abstract: The paper presents a coupled map lattice (CML) and deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA)-based image encryption algorithm that uses genetic algorithm (GA) to get the optimised results. The algorithm uses the chaotic method CML and DNA to create an initial population of DNA masks in its first stage. The GA is applied in the second stage to obtain the best mask for encrypting the given plain image. The paper also discusses the use of two more chaotic functions, i.e., logistic map (LM) and transformed logistic map (TLM) with DNA-GA-based hybrid combination. The paper evaluates and compares the performance of the proposed CML-DNA-GA algorithm with LM-DNA-GA, TLM-DNA-GA hybrid approaches. The results show that the proposed approach performs better than the other two. It also discusses the impact of using a bi-objective GA optimisation for image encryption and applies the same to the all three discussed techniques. The results show that bi-objective optimisation of the proposed algorithm gives balanced results with respect to the selected fitness functions.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种基于耦合映象格子(CML)和脱氧核糖核酸(DNA)的图像加密算法，该算法利用遗传算法(GA)获得优化结果。该算法在第一阶段使用混沌方法CML和DNA来创建DNA掩码的初始种群。GA应用于第二阶段，以获得用于加密给定普通图像的最佳掩模。本文还讨论了另外两种混沌函数的应用，即logistic映射和基于DNA-GA混合组合的变换logistic映射(TLM)。本文评估并比较了CML-DNA-GA算法与LM-DNA-GA、TLM-DNA-GA混合算法的性能。实验结果表明，该方法的性能优于其他两种方法。它还讨论了使用双目标遗传算法优化图像加密的影响，并将其应用于所有三个讨论的技术。结果表明，所提出算法的双目标优化给出了关于所选适应度函数的平衡结果。
papers.title_zh: 基于DNA和双目标遗传算法的耦合映射格图像加密方法

papers.title: Securing wireless sensor networks from node clone attack: a lightweight message authentication algorithm
papers.authors: Vandana Mohindru, Yashwant Singh, Ravindara Bhatt
papers.abstract: Message communication in WSNs is not secure because energy-starving networks are vulnerable to numerous security attacks mainly due to their nature of distribution and unprotected communication. Securing communication in these networks not only needs to provide the elementary security but also needs resistance against countless attacks. Message authentication and integrity is a serious concern for sensor networks security, therefore, sensor network must assure the distribution of authentic message without any amendment or alteration. To solve these problems, a lightweight message authentication algorithm is proposed for securing message communication in WSNs. The algorithm uses Mod and XOR operations to compute fixed size hash value or message digest. The scheme is robust as a slight change in the message will affect the hash value extensively. The comparative analysis of the proposed algorithm is done with authentication algorithms available in the literature with the help of various metrics. Results show that the proposed message authentication algorithm is energy efficient and secure against node replication attacks. Also, proposed algorithm have 48.75 µJ communications overhead, 4.416 µJ of computational overhead and 3 bytes of storage overheads that is very less as compared to other algorithms present in the literature.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线传感器网络中的消息通信是不安全的，因为能量匮乏的网络容易受到大量的安全攻击，这主要是由于它们的分布特性和无保护的通信。保护这些网络中的通信不仅需要提供基本的安全性，还需要抵抗无数的攻击。消息的认证和完整性是传感器网络安全的一个重要问题，因此，传感器网络必须保证可信消息的分发不被修改和改变。为了解决这些问题，提出了一种轻量级消息认证算法来保证无线传感器网络中消息通信的安全。该算法使用Mod和XOR运算来计算固定大小的哈希值或消息摘要。该方案是健壮的，因为消息中的微小变化将广泛地影响散列值。在各种度量的帮助下，对所提出的算法与文献中可用的认证算法进行了比较分析。实验结果表明，该消息认证算法具有节能性和抗节点复制攻击的安全性。此外，所提出的算法具有48.75 J的通信开销、4.416 J的计算开销和3字节的存储开销，这与文献中存在的其他算法相比非常小。
papers.title_zh: 保护无线传感器网络免受节点克隆攻击:一种轻量级消息认证算法

papers.title: Blind noise estimation-based CT image denoising in tetrolet domain
papers.authors: Manoj Diwakar, Pardeep Kumar
papers.abstract: Recently in medical imaging, various cases of cancers have been explored because of high dose radiation in computed tomography (CT) scan examinations. These high radiation doses are given to patients to achieve good quality CT images. Instead of increasing radiation dose, an alternate method is required to get high quality images for diagnosis purpose. In this paper, we propose a method where, the noise of CT images will be estimated using patch-based gradient approximation. Further, estimated noise is used to denoise the CT images in tetrolet domain. In proposed scheme, a locally adaptive-based thresholding in tetrolet domain and non-local means filtering have been performed to suppress noise from CT images. Estimation noise from proposed method has been compared from added noise in CT images and it was observed that noise is almost correctly estimated by proposed method. To verify the strength of noise suppression in proposed scheme, comparison with recent other existing methods have been performed. The PSNR and visual quality of experimental results indicate that the proposed scheme gives excellent outcomes in compare to existing schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 近来，在医学成像中，由于计算机断层摄影(CT)扫描检查中的高剂量辐射，已经研究了各种癌症病例。给予患者这些高辐射剂量是为了获得高质量的CT图像。代替增加辐射剂量，需要一种替代方法来获得用于诊断目的的高质量图像。在本文中，我们提出了一种方法，其中，噪声的CT图像将估计使用补丁为基础的梯度近似。此外，使用估计的噪声在tetrolet域中对CT图像进行去噪。在所提出的方案中，基于局部自适应的阈值分割和非局部均值滤波被用来抑制CT图像中的噪声。来自所提出方法的估计噪声已经与CT图像中添加的噪声进行了比较，并且观察到噪声几乎被所提出的方法正确地估计。为了验证所提出的方案中噪声抑制的强度，与最近的其他现有方法进行了比较。实验结果的PSNR和视觉质量表明，与现有方案相比，所提出的方案给出了优异的结果。
papers.title_zh: 基于盲噪声估计的四小波域CT图像去噪

papers.title: A hybrid generative-discriminative model for abnormal event detection in surveillance video scenes
papers.authors: P. M. Ashok Kumar, D. Kavitha, S. Arun Kumar
papers.abstract: Detecting anomalous events in densely pedestrian traffic video scenes remains challenging task, due to object's tracking difficulties and noise in the scene. In this paper, a Novel Hybrid Generative-Discriminative framework is proposed for detecting and localising the anomalous events of illegal vehicles present in the scene. This paper introduces a novelty in the application of Hybrid usage of latent Dirichlet allocation (LDA) and support vector machines (SVMs) over dynamic texture at sub-region level. The proposed HLDA-SVM model consists mainly of three steps: first local binary patterns from twelve orthogonal planes (LBP-TwP) technique is applied in each spatio-temporal video patch to extract dynamic texture; then LDA technique is applied to the extracted dynamic textures for finding the latent topic distribution and finally, training is done on the distribution of topic vector for each video sequence using multi way SVM classifier. The proposed HLDA-SVM model is validated on UCSD dataset data set and is compared with mixture of dynamic texture and motion context technique. Experimental results show that the HLDA-SVM approach performs well in par with current algorithms for anomaly detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于目标跟踪困难和场景中的噪声，检测密集行人交通视频场景中的异常事件仍然是一项具有挑战性的任务。本文提出了一种新的混合生成-判别框架，用于检测和定位场景中非法车辆的异常事件。介绍了一种在子区域级动态纹理上混合使用潜在狄利克雷分配(LDA)和支持向量机(SVMs)的新方法。所提出的HLDA-SVM模型主要包括三个步骤:首先，在每个时空视频块中应用来自12个正交平面的局部二值模式(LBP-TwP)技术来提取动态纹理；然后将LDA技术应用于提取的动态纹理以发现潜在的主题分布，最后使用多向SVM分类器对每个视频序列的主题向量分布进行训练。提出的HLDA-SVM模型在UCSD数据集上进行了验证，并与动态纹理和运动上下文混合技术进行了比较。实验结果表明，HLDA-SVM方法与当前的异常检测算法具有相同的性能。
papers.title_zh: 监控视频场景中异常事件检测的混合生成-判别模型

papers.title: Scrutinising internet banking security solutions
papers.authors: Burhan Ul Islam Khan, Rashidah Funke Olanrewaju, Farhat Anwar, Roohie Naaz Mir, Mashkuri Yaacob
papers.abstract: Internet-banking is a crucial service offered by financial Institutions and has gained popularity at a high pace. Owing to the increasing usage of this service, it is being frequently targeted by adversaries. The login process by the user is one of the main points that are at risk of this assault. Hence, a robust security mechanism is essential for warding off those risks. Among other security solutions, a typical arrangement presently employed is the one-time password (OTP), i.e., passwords that remain valid for a single exchange or session. However, the majority of these password generation and processing mechanisms do not fulfil the requirement of usability and/or scalability and hence can be considered as less reliable/fragile. This paper reviews the security mechanisms in E-banking. The pros and con of OTP as well as other non-OTP security solutions have been presented. Finally, the prominence of open issues have been elucidated.
papers.abstract_zh: 网上银行是金融机构提供的一项重要服务，并迅速普及。由于这种服务的使用越来越多，它经常成为对手的攻击目标。用户的登录过程是面临这种攻击风险的要点之一。因此，强大的安全机制对于抵御这些风险至关重要。在其他安全解决方案中，目前采用的典型方案是一次性密码(OTP)，即对于单次交换或会话保持有效的密码。然而，这些密码生成和处理机制中的大多数不满足可用性和/或可扩展性的要求，因此可以被认为是不太可靠/脆弱的。本文综述了电子银行的安全机制。已经介绍了OTP以及其他非OTP安全解决方案的优点和缺点。最后，突出的公开问题已经阐明。
papers.title_zh: 审查网上银行安全解决方案

papers.title: Fake profile detection in multimedia big data on online social networks
papers.authors: Somya Ranjan Sahoo, Brij B. Gupta
papers.abstract: The popularity of online social networks like Facebook and Twitter has become the regular way of communication and interaction. Due to the popularity of such networks, the attackers try to reveal suspicious behaviour in the form of fake profile. To stop fake profile, various approaches are proposed in the recent years. The focus of recent work is to implement a machine learning technique to detect fake profile on Facebook platform by analysing public as well as private features. In this paper, a machine learning-based approach is proposed for detecting suspicious profiles for tapping and tainting multimedia big data on Facebook. Multimedia big data is a type of dataset in which the data is heterogeneous, human centric and has more media related contents with huge volumes like text, audio and video generated in different online social network. The experimental result of our work using content-based and profile-based features delivers first rate performance as compared to other approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 像脸书和推特这样的在线社交网络的流行已经成为交流和互动的常规方式。由于这种网络的流行，攻击者试图以伪造的个人资料的形式来揭示可疑的行为。为了阻止伪造的简档，近年来提出了各种方法。最近工作的重点是实现一种机器学习技术，通过分析公共和私人特征来检测脸书平台上的虚假个人资料。本文提出了一种基于机器学习的方法来检测脸书上用于挖掘和污染多媒体大数据的可疑概要文件。多媒体大数据是一种数据集，其中的数据是异构的，以人为中心，具有更多与媒体相关的内容，如在不同的在线社交网络中生成的大量文本、音频和视频。与其他方法相比，我们使用基于内容和基于简档的特征的工作的实验结果提供了一流的性能。
papers.title_zh: 在线社交网络多媒体大数据中的虚假简介检测

papers.title: Unconstrained face recognition using deep convolution neural network
papers.authors: Amrit Kumar Agrawal, Yogendra Narain Singh
papers.abstract: Different methods have been proposed for face recognition during the past decades that differ essentially on how to determine discriminant facial features for better recognition. Recently, very deep neural networks achieved great success on general object recognition because of their potential in learning capability. This paper presents convolution neural network (CNN)-based architecture for face recognition in unconstrained environment. The proposed architecture is based on a standard architecture of residual network. The recognition performance shows that the proposed framework of CNN achieves the state-of-art performance on publicly available challenging datasets LFW, face94, face95, face96 and Grimace.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的几十年中，已经提出了用于人脸识别的不同方法，这些方法在如何确定用于更好识别的判别面部特征上有本质的不同。最近，深度神经网络由于其学习能力的潜力，在一般物体识别方面取得了巨大的成功。提出了一种基于卷积神经网络(CNN)的无约束环境下的人脸识别体系结构。所提出的体系结构基于剩余网络的标准体系结构。识别性能表明，所提出的CNN框架在公开的挑战性数据集LFW、face94、face95、face96和鬼脸上取得了最先进的性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于深度卷积神经网络的无约束人脸识别

papers.title: CSL: FPGA implementation of lightweight block cipher for power-constrained devices
papers.authors: Hemraj Shobharam Lamkuche, Dhanya Pramod
papers.abstract: The exploration of interconnected devices, embedded devices, sensors, and various network-connected devices helps to communicate each other and exchange communications. These devices overcome with security threats related to privacy and data exchange over billions of devices are interconnected. Lightweight block ciphers aim to provide a feasible solution for power-constrained devices which includes Radio-frequency identification (RFID) tags, ubiquitous computing, wireless sensor network, aggregation network and IoT. In this paper, we have implemented a lightweight block cipher compact, secure, and lightweight (CSL). It operates on 64-bit block size, and key size varies from 64-bit to 128-bit key for encryption and decryption. The hardware implementation of CSL algorithm was thrived using field programmable gate array (FPGA) architecture. A pipelined design of compact S-boxes implemented on Digilent Nexys 4 DDR Artix™-7 board. Our experimental results of CSL consumes 1145 LUTs (Lookup Tables) and has fewer memory requirements. CSL shows resistant against various cryptanalytic attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 对互连设备、嵌入式设备、传感器和各种网络连接设备的探索有助于相互通信和交换通信。这些设备克服了与隐私和数据交换相关的安全威胁，数十亿台设备相互连接。轻量级分组密码旨在为功率受限的设备提供可行的解决方案，这些设备包括射频识别(RFID)标签、普适计算、无线传感器网络、聚合网络和物联网。在本文中，我们实现了一个轻量级分组密码紧凑，安全，轻量级(CSL)。它对64位块大小进行操作，加密和解密的密钥大小从64位到128位不等。使用现场可编程门阵列(FPGA)架构，CSL算法的硬件实现得到了蓬勃发展。在digi lent NEX ys 4 DDR Artix-7板上实现的紧凑型S盒流水线设计。我们的CSL实验结果消耗了1145个查找表，并具有更少的内存需求。CSL表现出对各种密码分析攻击的抵抗性。
papers.title_zh: CSL:功耗受限设备轻量级分组密码的FPGA实现

papers.title: An improved spatial-temporal correlation algorithm combined with compressed sensing and LEACH protocol in WSNs
papers.authors: Xin Xie, Jianan Wang, Songlin Ge, Nan Jiang, Fengping Hu
papers.abstract: The energy of the sensor network nodes is limited, in order to save the energy consumption of the sensor nodes, a compressed sensing method based on the spatial-temporal correlation of nodes is proposed. The LEACH algorithm is used to cluster the network nodes and select the cluster head. Then, the cluster head node is sampled by the compressed sensing theory. The sampled data is passed to the remote sink node through multi-hop routing. Finally, at the sink node, the OMP algorithm can be used to recover the original signal from a small amount of data transmitted by the cluster head nodes. The simulation results show that the method can effectively reduce the amount of data transmission and save the energy consumption of nodes and prolong the lifetime of the wireless sensor network.
papers.abstract_zh: 传感器网络节点的能量是有限的，为了节省传感器节点的能量消耗，提出了一种基于节点时空相关性的压缩感知方法。LEACH算法用于对网络节点进行聚类并选择簇头。然后，利用压缩感知理论对簇头节点进行采样。采样数据通过多跳路由传递到远程汇聚节点。最后，在汇聚节点，可以使用OMP算法从簇头节点传输的少量数据中恢复出原始信号。仿真结果表明，该方法能有效减少数据传输量，节省节点能耗，延长无线传感器网络的生命周期。
papers.title_zh: 结合压缩感知和LEACH协议的无线传感器网络时空相关改进算法

papers.title: An activity theory model for dynamic evolution of attack graph based on improved least square genetic algorithm
papers.authors: Chundong Wang, Tong Zhao, Zheli Liu
papers.abstract: Most of the risk assessments of the attack graph are static and have a fixed assessment scenario, which limit the real-time nature of the situation assessment. This paper presents an activity theory model to analyse the contradictions in the attack behaviour. In order to assess the maximum probability path of an attacker and dynamically remain in control for the overall situation, a definition of attacker's benefit (loss/gain) value calculated by contradictory vector is proposed. The attacker's budget is applied as an unbiased amount in the least square genetic algorithm, optimises the fitness function of the genetic algorithm. Experimental results reveal that the improved least square genetic algorithm with unbiased estimator effectuate higher gains owing to the high fit degree of fitness function. With the coming evidence, the maximum probability attack paths get a more accurate and dynamic risk assessment of the situation.
papers.abstract_zh: 攻击图的大多数风险评估是静态的，并且具有固定的评估场景，这限制了情况评估的实时性。本文提出了一个活动理论模型来分析攻击行为中的矛盾。为了评估攻击者的最大概率路径并动态地保持对全局的控制，提出了一种用矛盾向量计算攻击者收益(损失/收益)值的定义。攻击者的预算作为无偏量应用于最小二乘遗传算法，优化遗传算法的适应度函数。实验结果表明，具有无偏估计量的改进最小二乘遗传算法由于适应度函数的高拟合度而实现了更高的增益。有了即将到来的证据，最大概率攻击路径获得了对形势的更准确和动态的风险评估。
papers.title_zh: 基于改进最小二乘遗传算法的攻击图动态演化活动理论模型

papers.title: Data protection and provenance in cloud of things environment: research challenges
papers.authors: Chundong Wang, Lei Yang, Hao Guo, Fujin Wan
papers.abstract: Internet of things are increasingly being deployed over the cloud (also referred to as cloud of things) to provide a broader range of services. However, there are serious challenges of CoT in the data protection and security provenance. This paper proposes a data privacy protection and provenance model (DPSPM) based on CoT. It can protect the privacy data of the users and trace the source of leaked data. In detail, security encryption and watermarking algorithms are proposed. Meanwhile, we use the improved k-anonymity data masking algorithm and pseudo-row watermarking algorithm in this scheme. Those algorithms can carry out security control over the whole process of data publishing, especially in data encryption, data masking and provenance verification. Finally, the experimental results show that our scheme has good efficiency. It is proved that the data masking time is proportional to the parameters k and L, the results also show good robustness to the common database watermarking attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网越来越多地部署在云(也称为物云)上，以提供更广泛的服务。然而，CoT在数据保护和安全来源方面面临着严峻的挑战。提出一种基于CoT的数据隐私保护和来源模型(DPSPM)。它可以保护用户的隐私数据，并追踪泄漏数据的来源。具体来说，提出了安全加密和水印算法。同时，在该方案中使用了改进的k-匿名数据掩盖算法和伪行水印算法。这些算法可以对数据发布的整个过程进行安全控制，特别是在数据加密、数据屏蔽和来源验证方面。实验结果表明，该方案具有良好的效率。证明了数据掩盖时间与参数k和L成正比，同时对常见的数据库水印攻击也表现出良好的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 物联网环境中的数据保护和来源:研究挑战

papers.title: Advanced security of two-factor authentication system using stego QR code
papers.authors: Kouraogo Yacouba, Ghizlane Orhanou, Said Elhajji
papers.abstract: Many financial institutions are trying to protect their customers by offering improved and more secure technologies for authentication. One of the most common is two-factor authentication (2FA), which presents many vulnerabilities that allow attackers to retrieve confidential information such as mobile transaction authentication (mTAN). Thus, according to NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology), 2FA based on SMS is deprecated and aims to find a secure communication channel other than SMS. Therefore in this paper, we propose a 2FA communication channel based on steganography in the QR-code. So, the mTAN can only be read by a specific scanner that implements the technique of extracting the hidden information while having the shared key and the public information in the QR-code readable by the standard scanners. Finally, we implement our proposed method and then do the test by simulating a line banking service.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多金融机构试图通过提供改进的、更安全的身份验证技术来保护他们的客户。其中最常见的是双因素身份验证(2FA)，它存在许多漏洞，使得攻击者能够检索机密信息，如移动交易身份验证(mTAN)。因此，根据NIST(国家标准和技术研究所)的说法，基于SMS的2FA是不赞成的，并且旨在找到除SMS之外的安全通信信道。因此，本文提出了一种基于QR码隐写术的2FA通信信道。因此，mTAN只能由特定的扫描器读取，该扫描器实现了提取隐藏信息的技术，同时具有标准扫描器可读的QR码中的共享密钥和公共信息。最后，我们实现了我们提出的方法，并通过模拟一个银行服务进行了测试。
papers.title_zh: 使用隐写QR码的双因素认证系统的高级安全性

papers.title: New chaotic cryptosystem for the image encryption
papers.authors: Assia Merzoug, Adda Ali-Pacha, Naima Hadj-Said
papers.abstract: Recent researches of image encryption algorithms have been increasingly based on chaotic systems. This paper, a new image encryption scheme which employs. The idea is to associate the Henon attractor and the logistics map, for the construction of a new secret key cryptosystem. We generate values through of the logistics map that will be added to the pixels of the plaintext image. This result modulo 256 will be permuted to another position of the encrypted image. The calculation of this permutation is deducted from the Henon attractor, which is 2-dimensional, in order to have a significantly increasing the resistance to attacks. The proposed system has the advantage of bigger key space (about 180 bits); high security analysis such as key space analysis, statistical analysis and sensitivity analysis were carried out. The results demonstrate that the proposed system is highly efficient and a robust system.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近对图像加密算法的研究越来越多地基于混沌系统。本文提出了一种新的图像加密方案。其思想是将Henon吸引子和物流映射联系起来，构造一个新的密钥密码系统。我们通过物流图生成值，这些值将被添加到明文图像的像素中。这个模256的结果将被置换到加密图像的另一个位置。这种排列的计算是从二维的Henon吸引子中推导出来的，以便显著增加对攻击的抵抗力。所提出的系统具有更大的密钥空间(大约180比特)的优点；进行了密钥空间分析、统计分析、敏感性分析等高安全分析。结果表明，该系统是一个高效、鲁棒的系统。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的用于图像加密的混沌密码系统

papers.title: Securing IoT-based collaborative applications using a new compressed and distributed MIKEY mode
papers.authors: Mohammed Riyadh Abdmeziem
papers.abstract: Multimedia internet keying protocol (MIKEY) aims at establishing secure credentials between two communicating entities. However, existing MIKEY modes fail to meet the requirements of low-power and low-processing devices. To address this issue, we combine two previously proposed approaches to introduce a new compressed and distributed MIKEY mode applied to a collaborative internet of things context. A set of third parties is used to discharge the constrained nodes from heavy computational operations. Doing so, the MIKEY pre-shared mode is used in the constrained part of network, while the public key mode is used in the unconstrained part of the network. Furthermore, to mitigate the communication cost we introduce a new header compression scheme that reduces the size of MIKEY’s header from 12 bytes to 3 bytes in the best compression case. To assess our approach, we performed a detailed security analysis using a formal validation tool (i.e., Avispa). In addition, we performed an energy evaluation of both communicational and computational costs. The obtained results show that our proposed mode is energy preserving whereas its security properties are preserved untouched.
papers.abstract_zh: 多媒体因特网密钥协议(MIKEY)旨在建立两个通信实体之间的安全凭证。然而，现有的MIKEY模式不能满足低功率和低处理设备的要求。为了解决这个问题，我们结合了以前提出的两种方法来引入一种新的适用于协作物联网环境的压缩和分布式MIKEY模式。一组第三方用于将受约束的节点从繁重的计算操作中释放出来。这样，MIKEY预共享模式被用于网络的约束部分，而公钥模式被用于网络的非约束部分。此外，为了降低通信成本，我们引入了一种新的报头压缩方案，在最佳压缩情况下，将MIKEY报头的大小从12字节减少到3字节。为了评估我们的方法，我们使用正式的验证工具(即Avispa)进行了详细的安全性分析。此外，我们对通信和计算成本进行了能量评估。得到的结果表明，我们提出的模式是能量守恒的，而其安全性保持不变。
papers.title_zh: 使用新的压缩和分布式MIKEY模式保护基于物联网的协作应用

papers.title: ExOShim: preventing memory disclosure using execute-only kernel code
papers.authors: Scott Brookes, Robert Denz, Martin Osterloh, Stephen Taylor
papers.abstract: Information leakage and memory disclosure are major threats to the security in modern computer systems. If an attacker is able to obtain the binary-code of an application, it is possible to reverseengineer the source-code, uncover vulnerabilities, craft exploits, and patch together code-segments to produce code-reuse attacks. These issues are particularly concerning when the application is an operating system because they open the door to privilegeescalation and exploitation techniques that provide kernel-level access. This paper describes ExOShim: a 325-line, lightweight “shim” layer, using Intel’s commodity virtualization features, that prevents memory disclosures by rendering all kernel code execute-only. This technology, when combined with nondeterministic refresh and load-time diversity, prevents disclosure of kernel code on time-scales that facilitate kernel-level exploit development. The proof-of-concept prototype described here has been demonstrated on a 64-bit microkernel. It is evaluated using metrics that quantify its code size and complexity, associated runtime performance costs, and its effectiveness in thwarting information leakage. ExOShim provides complete execute-only protection for kernel code at a runtime-performance overhead of only 0.86%. The concepts are general and can also be applied to render application code execute-only.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息泄漏和内存泄露是现代计算机系统安全的主要威胁。如果攻击者能够获得应用程序的二进制代码，就有可能逆向工程源代码，发现漏洞，精心设计漏洞，并修补代码段以产生代码重用攻击。当应用程序是一个操作系统时，这些问题尤为重要，因为它们为提供内核级访问的特权扩展和利用技术打开了大门。本文描述了ExOShim:一个325行的轻量级“Shim”层，使用英特尔的商用虚拟化特性，通过只执行所有内核代码来防止内存泄漏。这项技术与非确定性刷新和加载时间多样性相结合，可以防止在一定时间范围内泄露内核代码，从而促进内核级漏洞开发。这里描述的概念验证原型已经在64位微内核上进行了演示。使用量化其代码大小和复杂性、相关的运行时性能成本及其在阻止信息泄漏方面的有效性的度量来评估它。ExOShim为内核代码提供完全的只执行保护，运行时性能开销仅为0.86%。这些概念是通用的，也可以应用于呈现只执行的应用程序代码。
papers.title_zh: ExOShim:使用只执行内核代码防止内存泄漏

papers.title: Extracting malicious behaviours
papers.authors: Khanh-Huu-The Dam, Tayssir Touili
papers.abstract: In recent years, the damage cost caused by malwares is huge. Thus, malware detection is a big challenge. The task of specifying malware takes a huge amount of time and engineering effort since it currently requires the manual study of the malicious code. Thus, in order to avoid the tedious manual analysis of malicious codes, this task has to be automatised. To this aim, we propose in this work to represent malicious behaviours using extended API call graphs, where nodes correspond to API function calls, edges specify the execution order between the API functions, and edge labels indicate the dependence relation between API functions parameters. We define new static analysis techniques that allow to extract such graphs from programs, and show how to automatically extract, from a set of malicious and benign programs, an extended API call graph that represents the malicious behaviours. Finally, we show how this graph can be used for malware detection. We implemented our techniques and obtained encouraging results: 95.66% of detection rate with 0% of false alarms.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，恶意软件造成的损失是巨大的。因此，恶意软件检测是一个巨大的挑战。指定恶意软件的任务需要大量的时间和工程努力，因为它目前需要人工研究恶意代码。因此，为了避免对恶意代码进行繁琐的手动分析，这项任务必须自动化。为此，我们提出使用扩展的API调用图来表示恶意行为，其中节点对应于API函数调用，边指定API函数之间的执行顺序，边标签指示API函数参数之间的依赖关系。我们定义了新的静态分析技术，允许从程序中提取这样的图，并展示了如何从一组恶意和良性程序中自动提取代表恶意行为的扩展API调用图。最后，我们展示了该图如何用于恶意软件检测。我们实现了我们的技术并获得了令人鼓舞的结果:95.66%的检测率和0%的虚警率。

papers.authors: S. Bhargavi Latha, D. Venkata Reddy, A. Damodaram
papers.abstract: Copyright protection for videos is important to prevent revenue loss for video generation companies by using video watermarking methods. Though many methods exists, still certain scope is noticed in robust video watermarking methods. Achieving features like trade-off between robustness and imperceptibility, speed, blind watermarking simultaneously is very challenging. The proposed work achieves the above said features using log-polar, DWT, and SVD techniques to embed watermark in a video and extract it when necessary. The objective is to protect the copyright and make the watermarking system blind, robust against frame drop attacks as well as achieving above features. This work also leverages scrambling, deep learning-based approach to generate secret sharing image from watermark to improve the speed compared to conventional tabular-based approach. We evaluated the method on our own dataset and proved that this method is outperforming compared to state-of-the-art methods in DWT and SVD domain.
papers.abstract_zh: 视频的版权保护对于防止视频生成公司通过使用视频水印方法的收入损失是重要的。虽然存在许多方法，但鲁棒性视频水印方法仍有一定的局限性。同时实现鲁棒性和不可感知性、速度和盲水印之间的平衡是非常具有挑战性的。所提出的工作使用对数极坐标、DWT和SVD技术在视频中嵌入水印并在必要时提取水印来实现上述特征。目的是在实现上述功能的同时，保护版权，使水印系统具有盲性，对丢帧攻击具有鲁棒性。与传统的基于表格的方法相比，本工作还利用置乱、基于深度学习的方法从水印生成秘密共享图像以提高速度。我们在自己的数据集上对该方法进行了评估，并证明了该方法在DWT和SVD域的性能优于现有的方法。

papers.title: Accurate and reliable detection of DDoS attacks based on ARIMA-SWGARCH model
papers.authors: K. V. Raghavender, P. Premchand
papers.abstract: DDoS attack detection is the process of finding the attacks happening on a network that causes continues packet drops or losses. Accurate detection of DDoS is the most complex task due to varying network traffic traces and patterns. This is resolved in our previous work by introducing the method namely bandwidth flooding attack detection method. However, this method failed to perform better with varying traffic patterns and traces. This is resolved in this research work by introducing the method namely hybrid ARIMA-SWGARCH model whose main goal is to detection DDoS attacks by analysing the varying measured network traffic. Here initially normalisation of measure network patterns is done by using the Box-Cox transformation. And then the white test is performed to finding the heteroscedasticity characteristics of time series of traffic patterns. And then the hybrid ARIMA-SWAGARCH model is applied to efficiently detect the DDoS attacks happening on the network. The overall evaluation of this method is conducted in the MATLAB simulation environment from which it is proved that the proposed research method can ensure the optimal and reliable detection of DDoS attacks happening on the network.
papers.abstract_zh: DDoS攻击检测是发现网络上发生的导致连续数据包丢弃或丢失的攻击的过程。由于不断变化的网络流量轨迹和模式，准确检测DDoS是最复杂的任务。这在我们之前的工作中通过引入带宽洪泛攻击检测方法得到了解决。然而，这种方法在不同的流量模式和轨迹下表现不佳。这在本研究工作中通过引入混合ARIMA-SWGARCH模型来解决，该模型的主要目标是通过分析变化的测量网络流量来检测DDoS攻击。这里，测量网络模式的初始归一化是通过使用Box-Cox变换来完成的。然后进行怀特检验，找出交通模式时间序列的异方差特征。然后应用混合ARIMA-斯瓦加模型有效地检测网络上发生的DDoS攻击。在MATLAB仿真环境下对该方法进行了总体评估，证明了该研究方法能够保证对网络上发生的DDoS攻击进行最优、可靠的检测。
papers.title_zh: 基于ARIMA-SWGARCH模型的准确可靠的DDoS攻击检测

papers.title: Secure and unifold mining model for pattern discovery from streaming data
papers.authors: Sreenivasa Rao Annaluri, Venkata Ramana Attili, Kalli Srinivasa Nageswara Prasad
papers.abstract: The intimidating challenge is practice of data mining (DM) over the streams of data because of its continuous data streaming. On the data streams, the practices of mining should be performed on cluster of streamed records in specified interval of time. The representation of window is the buffered records set which might be dynamic or static in the size. When compared with other practices of mining, the 'frequent pattern mining' on the streams of data are crucial. This occurs because, for predicting the pattern frequency, many of the existing methods repeatedly scan entire buffered transactions. This denotes the intricacy of procedure and overhead of memory. This paper proposes novel DM algorithms in particular for identifying the frequent patterns from indefinite data streams which scans every window once, therefore windows buffered records is pruned that evades computational and memory overhead. 'Unifold mining model for pattern discovery from streaming data' is the contribution of this paper. The outperformance of UMM when compared with other contemporary models is represented by crucial assessment of algorithm and optimisation schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 令人生畏的挑战是在数据流上进行数据挖掘(DM ),因为它是连续的数据流。在数据流上，挖掘的实践应该在特定的时间间隔内在流记录簇上进行。窗口的表示是缓冲的记录集，其大小可以是动态的或静态的。与其他挖掘实践相比，数据流上的“频繁模式挖掘”至关重要。这是因为，为了预测模式频率，许多现有方法重复扫描整个缓冲的事务。这表示过程的复杂性和内存开销。本文提出了新的数据挖掘算法，特别是用于从不定数据流中识别频繁模式的算法，该算法扫描每个窗口一次，因此窗口缓冲记录被修剪，避免了计算和存储开销。“从流数据中发现模式的统一挖掘模型”是本文的贡献。与其他当代模型相比，UMM的卓越表现体现在对算法和优化方案的关键评估上。
papers.title_zh: 用于流数据模式发现的安全统一挖掘模型

papers.title: Sustainable wireless clouds with security assurance
papers.authors: Kuppani Sathish, Kamakshaiah Kolli
papers.abstract: The smart technology development being an entailment to have an improved quality of living under clean environment, with enhanced social, economic development, public safety and efficient governing would be made possible by the cloud computing, that pillars the smart planning with enhanced decision making and service provisioning. The smart developments must be well planned with the sustainable wireless cloud and should be supported by evaluating, analysing and synthesising to manage with the enormous data flow from diverse fields. This dataflow management that is subjected to threats causing data loss and data mishandling is efficiently prevented by the preventive measures undertaken in the proposed system of security assurance to regulate continuous data transmission to permitted users with authentication, encryption and decryption. The proposed system is validated in CloudSim with regard to throughput and delay to ensure the systems reliability and timely perfect delivery.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能技术的发展是在清洁环境下提高生活质量的必然结果，而增强的社会、经济发展、公共安全和高效治理将通过云计算成为可能，云计算为智能规划提供了增强的决策和服务供应。智能开发必须利用可持续无线云进行良好规划，并应通过评估、分析和综合来支持，以管理来自不同领域的巨大数据流。受到导致数据丢失和数据错误处理的威胁的这种数据流管理通过在所提出的安全保证系统中采取的预防措施而被有效地防止，以通过认证、加密和解密来管理到许可用户的连续数据传输。所提出的系统在CloudSim中就吞吐量和延迟进行了验证，以确保系统的可靠性和及时完美的交付。

papers.title: A novel binary encryption algorithm for navigation control of robotic vehicles through visible light communication
papers.authors: V. Partha Saradi, P. Kailasapathi
papers.abstract: Scarcity in radio frequency spectrum has increased the demands for alternate sources of communication medium out which visible light communication (VLC) is quite notable. VLC works by exploiting the abundance in availability of light as an effective means of communication medium. This principle known as Li-Fi or light fidelity conveys information in the form of light pulses modulated with information signals collected by a suitable detector. The objective of this research article is to ensure a secured wireless communication channel using light as the medium. Communication through a wireless medium necessitates appropriate security mechanisms for data being transmitted. In the proposed work, a binary encryption algorithm (BEA) has been tested in a multi-node environment using a mobile robotic vehicle. Data transmitted through the medium contain instructions to navigate the motion of the vehicle. The algorithm simple yet powerful with precise encryption observed from the results.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线电频谱的稀缺增加了对通信介质替代资源的需求，其中可见光通信(VLC)非常引人注目。VLC利用丰富的光线作为有效的交流媒介。这种被称为Li-Fi或光保真度的原理以光脉冲的形式传递信息，该光脉冲由合适的检测器收集的信息信号调制。这篇研究文章的目标是使用光作为媒介来确保安全的无线通信信道。通过无线介质的通信需要适当的安全机制来传输数据。在提出的工作中，二进制加密算法(BEA)已经在多节点环境中使用移动机器人车辆进行了测试。通过介质传输的数据包含导航车辆运动的指令。该算法简单而强大的精确加密从结果观察。

papers.title: Analysing and comparing the digital seal according to eIDAS regulation with and without blockchain technology
papers.authors: Vlera Alimehaj, Arbnor Halili, Ramadan Dervishi, Vehbi Neziri, Blerim Rexha
papers.abstract: Digitalisation of public services has already changed the way how we interact with government. The electronic signature, based on public key cryptography, has strengthened the trust towards this transformation. With the recent appearance of the electronic seal, this digital transformation is complete. The new European Union regulation for electronic identification, authentication and trust services (eIDAS) has repealed the old directive and provides a regulatory environment. In the meantime, a novel technology based on cryptography rose as an alternative to fulfil these objectives - the blockchain. This paper, analyses the properties of the electronic seal, based on eIDAS regulation, with and without blockchain technology. The developed application uses local X.509 digital certificates and the multichain platform for the creation and deployment of private blockchains. At the end of the paper, an overview of this comparison is provided, using different documents, pointing out the pros and cons of each technology.
papers.abstract_zh: 公共服务的数字化已经改变了我们与政府互动的方式。基于公钥加密的电子签名增强了对这种转换的信任。随着最近电子印章的出现，这种数字化转变已经完成。新的欧盟电子身份识别、认证和信托服务条例(eIDAS)废除了旧的指令，并提供了一个监管环境。与此同时，一种基于密码学的新技术——区块链出现了，作为实现这些目标的替代方案。本文分析了基于eIDAS规范的电子印章在使用和不使用区块链技术时的特性。开发的应用程序使用本地X.509数字证书和多链平台来创建和部署私有区块链。在本文的最后，使用不同的文档对这种比较进行了概述，指出了每种技术的优缺点。

papers.title: Improved RSA lossy trapdoor function and applications
papers.authors: Nanyuan Cao, Zhenfu Cao, Xiaolei Dong, Haijiang Wang
papers.abstract: Kakvi and Kiltz (EUROCRYPT'12) proposed the first tight security reduction for RSA full domain hash signature scheme (RSA-FDH) with public exponent e < N1/4 in the random oracle (RO) model, and they left an open problem which called for a tightly secure RSA-FDH for N1/4 < e < N. In this paper, we consider the improved RSA (iRSA) trapdoor functions, introduced by Cao (Science in China'01), are functions that the security can be strictly proved to be equivalent to the factoring. We show that iRSA-FDH has a tight security reduction for e < N. Technically we construct iRSA lossy trapdoor functions, and then we apply the lossiness of the iRSA trapdoor functions to obtain tight security reductions for iRSA-FDH in the RO model. Finally, we propose a tightly secure blind signature scheme based on our iRSA lossy trapdoor functions in the RO model.
papers.abstract_zh: Kakvi和Kiltz (EUROCRYPT'12)在随机预言机(RO)模型中首次对公开指数为e < N1/4的RSA全域散列签名方案(RSA-FDH)提出了一个严格安全的约简，他们留下了一个公开问题，要求对N1/4 < e < N提供一个严格安全的RSA-FDH。我们证明了iRSA-FDH对于e < N具有紧安全约简。从技术上讲，我们构造了iRSA有损陷门函数，然后我们应用iRSA陷门函数的有损性在RO模型中获得了iRSA-FDH的紧安全约简。最后，在RO模型中，我们提出了一个基于iRSA有损陷门函数的紧安全盲签名方案。
