papers.title: Empirical risk assessment of attack graphs using time to compromise framework
papers.authors: Urvashi Garg, Geeta Sikka, Lalit Kumar Awasthi
papers.abstract: The proliferated complexity of network size together with the expeditious development of software system applications and their large number of vulnerabilities, security hardening is becoming a challenge for security specialists. Operating systems and applications need to be updated on time to ensure the security of the system, but it is neither feasible nor possible to remove every single vulnerability on a system. In this research work, time-based analysis strategy has been proposed to prioritise the machines in terms of their risk factor so as to handle riskier one first. In this regard, a real-time network has been analysed and observed for vulnerabilities present on various systems/machines/hosts in the network and attack graph is generated. Further, the proposed technique was applied on attack nodes (hosts) to find the approximate time to exploit the systems which can be further used to prioritise hosts and attack paths according to their risk of being exploited. Additionally, the proposed methodology can be advantageous in a finding minimal set of machines that needs attention to ensure complete network security. To the best of authors' knowledge, this is the first time that attack paths have been analysed and prioritised using the time to compromise scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着软件系统应用程序的快速发展及其大量的漏洞，网络规模的复杂性激增，安全加固正成为安全专家面临的一个挑战。操作系统和应用程序需要及时更新，以确保系统的安全性，但消除系统上的每个漏洞既不可行，也不可能。在这项研究工作中，提出了基于时间的分析策略，根据机器的风险因素对其进行优先排序，以便首先处理风险较高的机器。在这点上，已经分析和观察了实时网络中存在于网络中的各种系统/机器/主机上的弱点，并且生成了攻击图。此外，将所提出的技术应用于攻击节点(主机),以找到利用系统的近似时间，这可以进一步用于根据主机和攻击路径被利用的风险来对它们进行优先级排序。此外，所提出的方法在寻找需要注意以确保完全网络安全的最小机器集方面可能是有利的。据作者所知，这是第一次使用“妥协时间”方案对攻击路径进行分析和优先排序。
papers.title_zh: 使用妥协时间框架对攻击图进行经验风险评估

papers.title: Fault-based testing for discovering SQL injection vulnerabilities in web applications
papers.authors: Izzat Alsmadi, Ahmed Aleroud, Ahmad A. Saifan
papers.abstract: In this paper we proposed a model to investigate the behaviour of websites when dealing with invalid inputs. Many vulnerabilities rise from invalid inputs. An invalid input is considered as a form of a successful attack if it is processed by the website code or back-end database. Based on this assumption, we proposed a list of indicators that tested and processed invalid inputs. A tool is developed to implement this model. We tested the model through evaluating several websites selected randomly. Our tool has no special credentials or access to any of the tested websites. We found many SQL injection vulnerabilities based on our proposed model. Upon the manual investigation of the web pages that showed such vulnerabilities, we found few instances of false positives. We believe that this can provide a systematic and automated approach to test websites for vulnerabilities related to improper input validation.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个模型来研究网站在处理无效输入时的行为。许多漏洞源于无效输入。如果无效输入由网站代码或后端数据库处理，则被视为一种成功的攻击。基于这个假设，我们提出了一个测试和处理无效输入的指标列表。开发了一个工具来实现这个模型。我们通过评估随机选择的几个网站来测试模型。我们的工具没有特殊的凭证，也不能访问任何经过测试的网站。基于我们提出的模型，我们发现了许多SQL注入漏洞。在对显示此类漏洞的网页进行人工调查后，我们发现很少有误报的情况。我们认为，这可以提供一种系统化和自动化的方法来测试网站与不正确的输入验证相关的漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 基于故障的测试发现web应用中的SQL注入漏洞

papers.title: Leveraging Intel SGX to enable trusted and privacy preserving membership service in distributed ledgers
papers.authors: Xueping Liang, Sachin Shetty, Deepak K. Tosh, Peter Foytik, Lingchen Zhang
papers.abstract: Distributed ledger technology (DLT) provides decentralised services by removing the need of trust among distributed nodes in the distributed system. Transactions across the network are visible to all participants. However, some transactions may contain sensitive information such as business contracts or even personal health records. To protect user privacy, the architecture of distributed multi-channel ledger with membership service as a critical component can be adopted. The proposed multi-channel membership service architecture combines two promising technologies, distributed ledger and Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX). With SGX remote attestation and isolated execution, each node is enrolled as a trusted entity to the channels, which separate different applications and provide better flexibility. We propose security properties for membership service in distributed ledger and illustrate how SGX help to achieve these properties in each phase. Security analysis and evaluation show that the proposed architecture could enhance the privacy preservation and capabilities against attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式账本技术(DLT)通过消除分布式系统中分布式节点之间的信任需求来提供分散式服务。网络上的交易对所有参与者都是可见的。但是，一些交易可能包含敏感信息，如商业合同甚至个人健康记录。为了保护用户隐私，可以采用以会员服务为关键组件的分布式多通道账本架构。提议的多渠道会员服务架构结合了两种有前途的技术，分布式账本和英特尔软件卫士扩展(SGX)。借助SGX远程证明和隔离执行，每个节点都被注册为信道的可信实体，从而分离不同的应用程序并提供更好的灵活性。我们提出了分布式账本中成员服务的安全属性，并说明了SGX如何在每个阶段帮助实现这些属性。安全性分析和评估表明，该架构能够增强隐私保护和抗攻击能力。
papers.title_zh: 利用SGX在分布式账本中实现可信和隐私保护的会员服务

papers.title: Multi-channel time-frequency fusion attacks
papers.authors: Yuchen Cao, Yongbin Zhou, Hailong Zhang
papers.abstract: Side-channel analysis (SCA) is one of the most powerful attacks against cryptographic implementations. Multi-channel fusion attack (MCFA) which can utilise leakages measured from different side channels is a new type of SCA. Till now, existing MCFAs mainly work in the time domain. This paper take time-frequency joint information into consideration, and proposes time-frequency fusion attacks (TFFA). TFFA can be easily expanded to multi-channel case, and this kind of attack is named multi-channel time-frequency fusion attack (MCTFFA). In comparison to existing MCFAs, TFFA and MCTFFA are more effective. Practical experiments against unprotected AES-128 (implemented on MCU and FPGA) and masked AES-128 (implemented on FPGA) show that proper MCTFFA can reduce the number of traces needed to achieve a success rate of 1 by 23% to 60%, compared to that of MCFA. These improvements can be achieved without overhead in measurement complexity.
papers.abstract_zh: 旁路分析(SCA)是针对加密实现的最强大的攻击之一。多通道融合攻击(MCFA)是一种新型的SCA，它可以利用从不同侧通道测得的泄漏。到目前为止，现有的MCFAs主要工作在时域。本文考虑了时频联合信息，提出了时频融合攻击(TFFA)。TFFA很容易扩展到多通道的情况，这种攻击被称为多通道时频融合攻击。与现有的多边金融机构相比，TFFA和多边金融机构更加有效。针对无保护AES-128(在MCU和FPGA上实现)和屏蔽AES-128(在FPGA上实现)的实际实验表明，与MCFA相比，适当的MCTFFA可以将实现1的成功率所需的迹线数量减少23%到60%。这些改进可以在没有测量复杂性开销的情况下实现。
papers.title_zh: 多通道时频融合攻击

papers.title: Time-based key management in attribute-based encryption using piecewise key generation
papers.authors: Geng Wang
papers.abstract: Key management is essential in using attribute-based encryption (ABE) for dynamic access control in the practical world. Although user or key delegation has been widely discussed for ABE, it cannot solve all the key management problems. In this paper, we give a time-based key management scheme for ABE, providing the ABE scheme has piecewise key generation and ciphertext delegation, based on the revocation scheme in Sahai et al. (2012). In detail, we introduce a public time-related key generated by KDS, which stores the beginning time of the currently valid secret key for each user. For any ciphertext, user must download a time-related key which is generated later than the ciphertext, and use the time-related key along with the user private key to decrypt the ciphertext successfully. The user private key must be generated at the time stored in the time-related key, so any user cannot use outdated or revoked private keys to decrypt new ciphertexts, and ciphertext delegation is used to renew any ciphertext up to the current time. We also prove the security of the ABE schemes with time-based key management based on the security of piecewise key generation, for both KP-ABE and CP-ABE schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 在现实世界中，使用基于属性的加密(ABE)进行动态访问控制时，密钥管理是必不可少的。虽然用户或密钥委托已经为ABE广泛讨论，但它不能解决所有的密钥管理问题。本文基于Sahai等人(2012)的撤销方案，给出了一个基于时间的ABE密钥管理方案，该方案具有分段密钥生成和密文委托。详细地说，我们引入了一个由KDS生成的公共时间相关密钥，它存储了每个用户当前有效密钥的开始时间。对于任何密文，用户必须下载比密文晚生成的时间相关密钥，并使用时间相关密钥和用户私钥成功解密密文。用户私钥必须在与时间相关的密钥中存储的时间生成，因此任何用户都不能使用过期的或被撤销的私钥来解密新的密文，并且密文委托用于将任何密文更新到当前时间。对于KP-ABE和CP-ABE方案，我们还基于分段密钥生成的安全性证明了基于时间的密钥管理的ABE方案的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 使用分段密钥生成的基于属性的加密中基于时间的密钥管理

papers.title: Heuristic trust-based neighbour centric routing for CPS-enabled wireless sensor and ad hoc network
papers.authors: Chetna Singhal, A. Rajesh
papers.abstract: Security in cyber physical system (CPS)-enabled wireless sensor and ad hoc network (WSN) is carried out using trustworthy intermediate neighbour nodes, through which sensed information can be securely dispatched to the destination. In this paper, we propose a trust dependent routing scheme to select the most secure routes in such network, which focuses on evaluating any neighbouring entity through direct and indirect trust opinion. Trust assessment is carried out on neighbours by various trust metrics, namely, packet delivery ratio, delay, throughput, topology, energy, and control packets. Initially, we developed the trust-based neighbour centric routing (TBNCR) algorithm for static CPS-enabled WSN. At a later stage, this is further enhanced to meet the dynamic challenges of mobile ad hoc network (MANET) and also tested with various network density and probable security threats. Our simulation reveals that the proposed TBNCR protocol achieved almost 10%-15% higher throughput and reduced packet loss when compared with similar works carried out in the literature.
papers.abstract_zh: 支持网络物理系统(CPS)的无线传感器和自组织网络(WSN)的安全性是通过使用可信的中间邻居节点来实现的，通过这些中间邻居节点，传感信息可以被安全地分发到目的地。在本文中，我们提出了一个信任相关的路由方案来选择这样的网络中最安全的路由，该方案侧重于通过直接和间接的信任意见来评估任何邻居实体。通过各种信任度量对邻居进行信任评估，这些信任度量包括分组投递率、延迟、吞吐量、拓扑、能量和控制分组。最初，我们为支持静态CPS的WSN开发了基于信任的邻居中心路由(TBNCR)算法。在随后的阶段，该协议被进一步增强以应对移动自组织网络(MANET)的动态挑战，并在不同的网络密度和可能的安全威胁下进行了测试。我们的模拟显示，与文献中的类似工作相比，所提出的TBNCR协议实现了几乎10%-15%的高吞吐量和减少的分组丢失。
papers.title_zh: CPS支持的无线传感器和ad hoc网络启发式信任邻居中心路由

papers.title: Supporting features for flow-level packet analysis towards cyber threat detection: a pilot study
papers.authors: Emmanuel C. Ogu, Olusegun A. Ojesanmi, Oludele Awodele, Shade O. Kuyoro
papers.abstract: Thousands of new threats and threat categories continue to emerge every second in cyberspace, even as known threats keep adapting robustly to existing solutions. This has challenged modern approaches and solutions to threat detection and potentially rendered some of these obsolete even before they are able to find applicability. Much contemporary cyber / network threat detection solutions rely largely on flowlevel packet analysis, by monitoring trends and patterns of activity in supporting flow features of interest. However, while this has been the case, little attention has been paid to whether or not such supporting flow features still present an effective means of reaching accurate conclusions regarding imminent or occurrent cyber threat incidents, especially in the face of a rapidly evolving and adapting 21st century cyber threat landscape. This research is therefore a necessary pilot study to a larger research that aims to develop a state-of-the-art detection solution against a newly uncovered category of cyber threats known as subversive cyber threats. The goal of this pilot study being to reinvestigate four of the more commonly used supporting flow features in modern threat detection solutions, viz. Flow Packet Count, Flow Packet Throughput (bytes/s), Flow Packet Throughput (packets/s), and Average Flow Packet Size (bytes), in trying to ascertain / verify their continued relevance in the development of new cyber threat detection solutions. The study adopts the methodology of data simulation with descriptive infographic analysis using the recent UNSW-NB15 cybersecurity dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管已知威胁不断适应现有解决方案，但网络空间每秒钟仍会出现数以千计的新威胁和威胁类别。这对威胁检测的现代方法和解决方案提出了挑战，并有可能使其中一些方法和解决方案在找到适用性之前就已经过时。许多当代的计算机/网络威胁检测解决方案在很大程度上依赖于流级别的数据包分析，通过监控趋势和活动模式来支持感兴趣的流特征。然而，尽管情况如此，但很少有人关注这种支持流特征是否仍然是一种有效的手段，以获得关于即将发生或正在发生的网络威胁事件的准确结论，尤其是在面对快速发展和适应的21世纪网络威胁形势时。因此，这项研究是一项更大规模研究的必要试点研究，该研究旨在针对一种新发现的网络威胁类别(称为颠覆性网络威胁)开发一种最先进的检测解决方案。该试点研究的目标是重新调查现代威胁检测解决方案中四种更常用的支持流功能，即。流包计数、流包吞吐量(字节/秒)、流包吞吐量(包/秒)和平均流包大小(字节)，试图确定/验证它们在新的网络威胁检测解决方案的开发中的持续相关性。该研究采用数据模拟的方法，使用最近的UNSW-NB15网络安全数据集进行描述性信息图分析。
papers.title_zh: 面向网络威胁检测的流级包分析支持特征:一项初步研究

papers.title: A layer-crossing multi-factor and dynamic security model over a moving target defence
papers.authors: Zhanwei Cui, Jianping Zeng, Chengrong Wu
papers.abstract: Moving target defence mainly focus on the single parameter hopping and rarely refer to the hopping of multiple parameters in multiple layers. With the background of database security, this paper constructs a layer-crossing, multi-parameter and dynamic security model over moving target defence. Seven parameters which belong to different layers in the database application are defined, and two mathematical functions of successful attack probability and the reconnection time of the legitimate users are proposed. Then through mathematical analysis, this paper comes to the conclusion that it is impossible to let the successful attack probability and the average reconnection time take the minimum values at the same time. Finally, under specific scenarios, the specific expressions of the two functions and the optimal hopping interval of each parameter are present. The model proposed is not only applicable to the security of database system, but also to other information systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 运动目标防御主要集中在单参数跳变上，很少涉及多层多参数跳变。以数据库安全为背景，构建了一个跨层、多参数、动态的移动目标防御安全模型。定义了数据库应用中属于不同层次的七个参数，提出了攻击成功概率和合法用户重新连接时间的两个数学函数。然后通过数学分析，本文得出结论:不可能让成功攻击概率和平均重连时间同时取最小值。最后，在特定的场景下，给出了两个函数的具体表达式以及每个参数的最优跳变区间。该模型不仅适用于数据库系统的安全，也适用于其他信息系统的安全。
papers.title_zh: 移动目标防御的跨层多因素动态安全模型

papers.title: Modelling and visualising SSH brute force attack behaviours through a hybrid learning framework
papers.authors: Xiao Luo, Chengchao Yao, A. Nur Zincir-Heywood
papers.abstract: Much research has focused on increasing the network anomaly detection rate while reducing the false positive rate through exploring different learning algorithms. However, many of the learning algorithms work as a 'black box' and do not provide insight into the anomaly behaviours to support the decision-making process. This research explores a proposed hybrid learning framework to model and visualise the host-based normal and attack network behaviours. The framework consists of two major learning components: the self-organising map (SOM) is employed to recognise the network flow clusters and to visualise them on a two-dimensional space; and the Association Rule Mining (ARM) algorithm is deployed to analyse and interpret the traffic behaviours within clusters. The proposed learning framework is evaluated on six SSH traffic sets to measure how successful it is at extracting and interpreting the patterns representing normal and attack behaviours.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多研究集中在通过探索不同的学习算法来提高网络异常检测率，同时降低误报率。然而，许多学习算法作为“黑盒”工作，并且不提供对异常行为的洞察来支持决策过程。该研究探索了一种提议的混合学习框架，以对基于主机的正常和攻击网络行为进行建模和可视化。该框架由两个主要的学习部分组成:自组织映射(SOM)用于识别网络流簇，并在二维空间上可视化它们；关联规则挖掘(ARM)算法用于分析和解释集群内的流量行为。建议的学习框架在六个SSH流量集上进行评估，以衡量它在提取和解释代表正常和攻击行为的模式方面的成功程度。
papers.title_zh: 通过混合学习框架对SSH暴力攻击行为进行建模和可视化

papers.title: Vulnerability discovery modelling: a general framework
papers.authors: Adarsh Anand, Navneet Bhatt, Omar Hussain Alhazmi
papers.abstract: Due to the rising popularity of software-based systems, software engineers are required to continuously monitor the software to have deep insights about the loopholes and keep a close check on the vulnerability discovery process. Over time of each module of the software is tested and identified for loopholes using various vulnerability discovery models (VDMs) that exist. In this paper, based on hazard rate function approach, we have developed a unified framework to capture the behaviour of various vulnerability trends during the discovery process. The utility of the proposed approach helps in identifying and studying different discovery scenarios (various distribution functions) under one canopy. Furthermore, we also discuss a method called normalised criteria distance, which compares different sets of VDMs using a set of comparison criteria in order to rank and select the best model from among VDMs. The proposal has been supplemented with validation done on real life vulnerability discovery data sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于基于软件的系统越来越受欢迎，要求软件工程师持续监控软件，以对漏洞有深刻的见解，并密切检查漏洞发现过程。随着时间的推移，使用现有的各种漏洞发现模型(VDM)来测试和识别软件的每个模块的漏洞。在本文中，基于风险率函数方法，我们开发了一个统一的框架来捕获发现过程中各种漏洞趋势的行为。所提出的方法的效用有助于识别和研究一个树冠下的不同发现场景(各种分布函数)。此外，我们还讨论了一种称为归一化标准距离的方法，该方法使用一组比较标准来比较不同组的VDM，以便从VDM中排序和选择最佳模型。该提议还补充了在真实生活漏洞发现数据集上进行的验证。
papers.title_zh: 漏洞发现建模:一个通用框架

papers.title: Enhanced bitcoin with two-factor authentication
papers.authors: Fatemeh Rezaeibagha, Yi Mu, Ke Huang, Leyou Zhang
papers.abstract: Bitcoin transactions rely on digital signatures to prove the ownership of bitcoin. The private signing key of the bitcoin owner is the key component to enable a bitcoin transaction. If the signing key of a bitcoin is stolen, the theft who possesses the key can make a transaction of the bitcoin. In this paper, based on the distance-based encryption (DBE), we propose an enhanced version of bitcoin in order to protect the signing key. Our approach is based on our two-factor authentication, where the signing key cannot be retrieved without being identified via the password and biometric authentication scheme, and the user is only required to enter his password and fingerprint (or other biometric information such as a factual image) to retrieve the key. By doing this, we can effectively improve the bitcoin security and provide stronger authentication. An attractive feature of our scheme is that one of encryption schemes is asymmetric, in the sense that the decryption key (biometric information) is not stored in the device. We also provide the security model and proof to justify the security of our scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 比特币交易依靠数字签名来证明比特币的所有权。比特币所有者的私人签名密钥是实现比特币交易的关键组成部分。如果比特币的签名密钥被盗，拥有密钥的盗窃者可以进行比特币的交易。本文在基于距离的加密(DBE)的基础上，提出了一种增强版的比特币来保护签名密钥。我们的方法基于我们的双因素身份验证，其中签名密钥在没有通过密码和生物特征身份验证方案识别的情况下无法检索，用户只需输入其密码和指纹(或其他生物特征信息，如真实图像)即可检索密钥。通过这样做，我们可以有效地提高比特币的安全性，并提供更强的认证。我们的方案的一个吸引人的特征是加密方案之一是非对称的，也就是说解密密钥(生物特征信息)不存储在设备中。我们还提供了安全模型和证明来证明我们方案的安全性。

papers.title: On the adoption of scramble keypad for unlocking PIN-protected smartphones
papers.authors: Geetika Kovelamudi, Bryan Watson, Jun Zheng, Srinivas Mukkamala
papers.abstract: Personal identification number (PIN) is a simple and effective mechanism for screen unlocking but is susceptible to a number of attacks. Scramble keypad is a method that can improve the security of PIN by changing the keypad layout in each PIN-entry process. However, scramble keypad has not been provided as a standard feature in Android and iOS. In this work, we conducted a security and usability analysis of scramble keypad through theoretical analysis and user studies. The security analysis shows that scramble keypad can perfectly defend smudge attacks and greatly reduce the threats of side-channel attacks. It also has a significantly better chance to defend shoulder surfing attacks than standard keypad. The compromising of usability of scramble keypad for the improved security was also investigated. The results suggest that it is worthy to provide scramble keypad as a standard option of mobile operating systems for unlocking PIN-protected smartphones.
papers.abstract_zh: 个人识别码(PIN)是一种简单有效的屏幕解锁机制，但容易受到许多攻击。加密键盘是一种通过在每次PIN输入过程中更改键盘布局来提高PIN安全性的方法。然而，在Android和iOS中，加密键盘并没有作为标准功能提供。在这项工作中，我们通过理论分析和用户研究对加扰键盘进行了安全性和可用性分析。安全性分析表明，加扰密钥板可以很好地防御涂抹攻击，大大降低了旁路攻击的威胁。与标准键盘相比，它也有更好的机会防御肩部冲浪攻击。还研究了为了提高安全性而对加扰密钥板的可用性的损害。结果表明，提供加扰键盘作为解锁PIN保护智能手机的移动操作系统的标准选项是值得的。
papers.title_zh: 采用加密键盘解锁受PIN保护的智能手机

papers.title: A complexity reduced and reliable integrity protection for large relational data over clouds
papers.authors: Waqas Haider, Muhammad Wasif Nisar, Tanzila Saba, Muhammad Sharif, Raja Umair Haider, Nadeem Muhammad Bilal, Muhammad Attique Khan
papers.abstract: At present, governments and private business operations are highly dependent on relational data applications such as bank accounts, citizen registration, etc. These relational data dependent operations require reliable integrity protection while utilising the cloud computing storage infrastructure. Identification and recovery of stolen bits are a major assistance to the reliable integrity protection services for the sensitive relational data applications. To deal with the problems of detecting and recovering tampering in large relational data at minimum computational complexity, in this paper, N8WA (briefed in Section 2.1) coding-based scheme is presented. Overall the scheme is comprised of two cross functional modules. The first module is labelled as compact code generation using N8WA coding and code registration at registration module (RM). In the second module which is called accurate locating/restoring tampering, utilising the mismatching of different compact codes based on N8WA from RM, the major/minor tampered data is accurately located and restored. Investigational outcome indicates that the scheme ensures the computational complexity of O(n2) while minimum to maximum alterations is accurately localised and restored successfully.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前，政府和私营企业运营高度依赖于关系数据应用，如银行账户、公民登记等。这些依赖关系数据的操作需要可靠的完整性保护，同时利用云计算存储基础架构。被窃位的识别和恢复是对敏感关系数据应用的可靠完整性保护服务的主要帮助。为了以最小的计算复杂度处理大型关系数据中的篡改检测和恢复问题，本文提出了基于N8WA(在2.1节中简要介绍)编码的方案。总体而言，该方案由两个交叉功能模块组成。第一个模块被标记为使用N8WA编码和注册模块(RM)处的代码注册的紧凑代码生成。在被称为精确定位/恢复篡改的第二模块中，利用基于来自RM的N8WA的不同压缩码的不匹配，主要/次要篡改数据被精确定位和恢复。研究结果表明，该方案确保了O(n2)的计算复杂度，同时最小到最大的变化被准确地定位并成功地恢复。
papers.title_zh: 一种降低复杂性的可靠的云上大型关系数据完整性保护

papers.title: On QoS-aware location privacy in mobile networks
papers.authors: Nour El Houda Senoussi, Abdelmalik Bachir, Abdelmadjid Bouabdallah
papers.abstract: We deal with the threats to user privacy in the context of wireless local networks. We focus on location privacy where an adversary tries to learn a user's past and current locations. The current Wi-Fi standard is vulnerable to location privacy and mobility profiling attacks due to the transmission of personally identifying information such as the MAC address in plain text. We provide a generic mathematical model to quantify and express the privacy and elaborate a decentralised algorithm that allows users to attain their desired levels of privacy while lowering its effect on the QoS perceived by them. We evaluate our proposal with numerical simulation and mobility traces collected from Wi-Fi users in an office environment. We show that higher privacy can be obtained with a variable effect on the throughput available to users.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们在无线局域网的环境中处理对用户隐私的威胁。我们关注位置隐私，即对手试图了解用户的过去和当前位置。当前的Wi-Fi标准容易受到位置隐私和移动性剖析攻击，这是由于以纯文本传输诸如MAC地址的个人识别信息。我们提供了一个通用的数学模型来量化和表达隐私，并阐述了一个分散的算法，允许用户获得他们想要的隐私级别，同时降低它对他们感知的QoS的影响。我们用数值模拟和从办公室环境中的Wi-Fi用户收集的移动轨迹来评估我们的提议。我们表明，在对用户可用的吞吐量有可变影响的情况下，可以获得更高的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 移动网络中QoS感知的位置隐私研究

papers.title: High utility differential privacy based on smooth sensitivity and individual ranking
papers.authors: Fagen Song, Tinghuai Ma
papers.abstract: Differential privacy can provide provable privacy security protection. In recent years, a great improvement has been made, however, in practical applications, the utility of original data is highly susceptible to noise, and thus, it limits its application and extension. To address the above problem, a new differential privacy method based on smooth sensitivity has been proposed in this paper. Using this method, the dataset's utility is improved greatly by reducing the amount of noise that is added, and this was validated by experiments.
papers.abstract_zh: 差分隐私可以提供可证明的隐私安全保护。近年来，虽然取得了很大的进步，但在实际应用中，原始数据的效用极易受到噪声的影响，从而限制了它的应用和推广。针对上述问题，提出了一种新的基于平滑敏感的差分隐私保护方法。使用这种方法，数据集的效用通过减少添加的噪声量而大大提高，并且这通过实验得到了验证。
papers.title_zh: 基于平滑敏感性和个体排序的高效用差分隐私

papers.title: New approach in the applications and forensics of the networks of the internet of things based on the fog infrastructure using SDN
papers.authors: Shahrzad Sedaghat
papers.abstract: Ubiquitous computing with smart mobile devices, internet of things, virtualisation, cloud, and fog is changing yesteryears' static networks to dynamic networks of mobile smart devices. Fog computing is a pattern which expands cloud computing and the provision of related services to the network edge. Therefore, fog computing was recently introduced to provide storage and network services between end users and traditional cloud computing data centres. The present study aimed to consider the structure, architecture and applications of fog computing and analyse its differences and similarities with cloud computing, examine forensics in these networks and finally, present a new approach in this regard. This paper describes how the emerging technology - software defined networking (SDN) can be deployed a single infrastructure and leveraged to provide scalable flexible forensic solutions in this diverse and service providers/IT in a deal with the dynamic nature of today's networks attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能移动设备、物联网、虚拟化、云和雾的无处不在的计算正在将昔日的静态网络改变为移动智能设备的动态网络。雾计算是一种将云计算和相关服务扩展到网络边缘的模式。因此，最近引入了雾计算，以在最终用户和传统云计算数据中心之间提供存储和网络服务。本研究旨在考虑雾计算的结构、架构和应用，分析其与云计算的差异和相似之处，检查这些网络中的取证，并最终提出这方面的新方法。本文描述了如何在单一基础设施中部署新兴技术软件定义网络(SDN ),并利用该技术在多样化的服务提供商/IT中提供可扩展的灵活取证解决方案，以应对当今网络攻击的动态性。
papers.title_zh: 基于雾架构和SDN的物联网网络应用和取证新方法

papers.title: Research on privacy protection system of RFID personal consumption data based on internet of things and cloud computing
papers.authors: Ningning Du, Chongxu Chen
papers.abstract: Internet of things and cloud computing have caused the subversion of traditional concepts in sociology, law and ethics. In order to improve the privacy protection level of personal consumption data, the internet of things and cloud computing are used to construct the privacy protection model. Firstly, legal interpretation of personal privacy data protection in RFID is carried out. Secondly, the privacy protection model based on clouding computing, and the corresponding algorithm is designed. Thirdly, the privacy protection authentication protocol of RFID personal consumption data is designed. Finally, the protocol search time-consuming comparison based on the traditional and proposed privacy protection systems are carried out based on simulation analysis. The results show that the proposed model can effectively protect the personal consumption data.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网和云计算引起了社会学、法学和伦理学传统观念的颠覆。为了提高个人消费数据的隐私保护水平，利用物联网和云计算构建隐私保护模型。首先，对RFID中个人隐私数据保护进行了法律解释。其次，设计了基于云计算的隐私保护模型和相应的算法。第三，设计了RFID个人消费数据隐私保护认证协议。最后，在仿真分析的基础上，对传统的和提出的隐私保护系统的协议搜索耗时进行了比较。结果表明，该模型能有效保护个人消费数据。
papers.title_zh: 基于物联网和云计算的RFID个人消费数据隐私保护系统研究

papers.title: Information protection of end users on the web: privacy issues and measures
papers.authors: Nooh Bany Muhammad, Aya Kandil
papers.abstract: In the current world, everyone needs to be connected to the internet. However, as technology develops, online scammers also advance with technology. To protect private information, the end users must ensure their data is protected. There are ways of protecting data from online hackers that end users are supposed to apply in order to keep their files safe. This paper is going to discuss what is happening nowadays? What are the ways of protection do websites use? How to protect our information and what's the best behaviour? And about the end users victims over the web.
papers.abstract_zh: 在当今世界，每个人都需要连接到互联网。然而，随着技术的发展，网络骗子也随着技术进步。为了保护私人信息，最终用户必须确保他们的数据受到保护。终端用户应该使用一些方法来保护数据免受在线黑客的攻击，以保证他们的文件安全。这篇论文将讨论当今正在发生的事情？网站使用的保护方式有哪些？如何保护我们的信息，最好的行为是什么？以及网络上的最终用户受害者。
papers.title_zh: 网络终端用户的信息保护:隐私问题与措施

papers.title: E-commerce process reengineering for customer privacy protection
papers.authors: Fengming Ma, Gang Sheng, Yuefeng Ma
papers.abstract: Privacy leakage is a major hidden danger for the healthy and orderly development of e-commerce. In this paper, we analyse the current situation of the information leakage. The main reason lies in that the customer information is stored and displayed in plaintext during the e-commerce process. We present a customer privacy protection platform on the basis of the analysis, where such technical measures as information segmentation, data encryption and access authorisation are taken. With the customer privacy protection platform, the customer information is not stored and displayed in plaintext any more, which is replaced with two-dimensional code or barcode. The traceability helps to prevent the leakage and abuse of the consumer information as much as possible. Thus, the traditional operation process of e-commerce is then reengineered and the customer information is only used on demand.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私泄露是电子商务健康有序发展的一大隐患。本文分析了信息泄露的现状。主要原因在于电子商务过程中，客户信息是以明文形式存储和显示的。在此基础上，我们提出了一个客户隐私保护平台，采用了信息分割、数据加密和访问授权等技术措施。有了客户隐私保护平台，客户信息不再以明文形式存储和显示，取而代之的是二维码或条形码。可追溯性有助于尽可能防止消费者信息的泄露和滥用。因此，传统的电子商务运作流程被重新设计，客户信息只在需要时使用。
papers.title_zh: 面向客户隐私保护的电子商务流程再造

papers.title: The prediction of network security situation based on deep learning method
papers.authors: Zhixing Lin, Jian Yu, Shunfa Liu
papers.abstract: Network security situational awareness is one of the important issues in the research of network space security technology. In this paper, deep learning technology is applied to analyse and learn network data, generate counter network by classification for sample amplification, use sparse noise reduction autoencoder for feature selection, and then use LSTM for deep learning model of security situation prediction. After the experiment proved that the proposed model based on sparse noise reduction is not balanced since the encoder-LSTM network security situation prediction model can solve various level attacks against a small number, using the model prediction results accurately in predicting regional security situation has the advantage for a longer time. In order to solve the above problems, the network security management becomes passive to active, adapting measures in advance.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全态势感知是网络空间安全技术研究的重要课题之一。本文应用深度学习技术对网络数据进行分析和学习，分类生成反网络进行样本放大，使用稀疏降噪自动编码器进行特征选择，然后使用LSTM进行安全态势预测的深度学习模型。经过实验证明，提出的基于稀疏降噪的模型是不均衡的，由于编码器-LSTM网络安全态势预测模型可以解决针对少数人的各种级别攻击，利用模型预测结果准确预测区域安全态势具有较长时间的优势。为了解决上述问题，网络安全管理变被动为主动，提前采取应对措施。
papers.title_zh: 基于深度学习方法的网络安全态势预测

papers.title: A hybrid approach for preserving privacy for real estate data
papers.authors: Parmod Kalia, Divya Bansal, Sanjeev Sofat
papers.abstract: In the present digital world, usage of the internet has increased many folds as users have become dependent on the cloud-based applications. The disclosure of personal information on such platforms becomes a prospective threat for an attack. Researchers have used randomised data distortion technique with addition of random noise to conceal the sensitive data from an unauthorised adversary. This perturbation technique has relevance for the numerical datasets only. In this paper, we propose a hybrid model of two phases encoding with additive random noise value for ensuring non-disclosure of private and sensitive information and maintaining an effective balance between data privacy and data utility. The proposed technique has been tested on different data sizes of the real estate industry in terms of efficiency and effectiveness in preserving privacy and data utility. The proposed algorithm has been evaluated in terms of privacy level and information loss. It has proved effective in comparison with other privacy-preserving techniques such as perturbation and encryption in terms of space complexity and efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 在当前的数字世界中，随着用户变得越来越依赖基于云的应用程序，互联网的使用已经增加了许多倍。在这样的平台上泄露个人信息成为潜在的攻击威胁。研究人员使用随机数据失真技术，加上随机噪声，对未经授权的对手隐藏敏感数据。这种扰动技术只与数值数据集相关。在本文中，我们提出了一个混合的两阶段加性随机噪声编码模型，以确保隐私和敏感信息不被泄露，并在数据隐私和数据效用之间保持一个有效的平衡。所提出的技术已经在房地产行业的不同数据规模上就保护隐私和数据效用的效率和有效性进行了测试。对提出的算法进行了隐私级别和信息损失方面的评估。与其他隐私保护技术(如扰动和加密)相比，该方法在空间复杂度和效率方面被证明是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 一种保护房地产数据隐私的混合方法

2019.journals_title: International Journal of Information and Computer Security, Volume 11

papers.title: MONcrypt: a technique to ensure the confidentiality of outsourced data in cloud storage
papers.authors: S. S. Manikandasaran, Lawrence Arockiam, P. D. Sheba Kezia Malarchelvi
papers.abstract: Cloud provides storage for enterprises to store their data in virtual storage. Enterprises outsourced their data but security of data in cloud storage is not guaranteed. If anything wrong happens on the data, the users suspect the cloud storage providers. Ensuring the confidentiality of outsourced data plays a vital role in the cloud security. To ensure the confidentiality of outsourced data, this paper proposes a technique called MONcrypt. MONcrypt is based on obfuscation technique. Obfuscation is a process of masking the original text into irrelevant text without using any key unlike encryption. MONcrypt uses key for de-obfuscation. This novel obfuscation technique is used to ensure the confidentiality of outsourced data in cloud storage. The paper compares the proposed technique with existing technique like Base32, Base64, hexadecimal en coding, DES, 3DES and Blowfish. The proposed technique shows better performance and security compared with the existing techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 云为企业提供存储，将数据存储在虚拟存储中。企业将数据外包，但云存储中的数据安全性没有保证。如果数据出现任何问题，用户就会怀疑云存储提供商。确保外包数据的机密性在云安全中起着至关重要的作用。为了确保外包数据的机密性，本文提出了一种称为MONcrypt的技术。MONcrypt基于混淆技术。与加密不同，混淆是在不使用任何密钥的情况下将原始文本屏蔽为无关文本的过程。MONcrypt使用密钥进行反混淆。这种新颖的混淆技术用于确保云存储中外包数据的机密性。本文将该技术与现有的Base32、Base64、十六进制en编码、DES、3DES和Blowfish等技术进行了比较。与现有技术相比，该技术具有更好的性能和安全性。
papers.title_zh: MONcrypt:一种确保云存储外包数据机密性的技术

papers.title: Detection algorithm for internet worms scanning that used user datagram protocol
papers.authors: Mohammad M. Rasheed, Norita Md Norwawi, Osman Ghazali, Munadil K. Faaeq
papers.abstract: The main purpose of intrusion detection system (IDS) is to find out intrusions among normal audit data and this can be considered as a classification problem. This problem is brought about by the user datagram protocol (UDP) which is a connectionless protocol that means it does not require a formal handshake to get the data flowing and has no need for SYNs, ACKs, FINs flags, or any other handshaking. Worms also make use of UDP protocol to connect or scan with other hosts. In this research, UDP scanning worm detection (UDPSWD) was proposed to detect UDP worm scanning by checking the failure message connections. UDPSWD focuses on the internet control message protocol (ICMP) unreachable, ICMP time exceeded and UDP is not responded to. The results show that UDPSWD is faster in comparison to other techniques, with no false positive or negative alarm.
papers.abstract_zh: 入侵检测系统(IDS)的主要目的是在正常的审计数据中发现入侵，这可以看作是一个分类问题。这个问题是由用户数据报协议(UDP)引起的，UDP是一种无连接协议，这意味着它不需要正式的握手来获得数据流，也不需要syn、ack、FINs标志或任何其他握手。蠕虫还利用UDP协议来连接或扫描其他主机。在本研究中，UDP扫描蠕虫检测(UDPSWD)通过检查失败消息连接来检测UDP蠕虫扫描。UDPSWD重点关注互联网控制消息协议(ICMP)不可达、ICMP超时、UDP无响应。结果表明，与其他技术相比，UDPSWD更快，没有假阳性或假阴性警报。
papers.title_zh: 使用用户数据报协议的网络蠕虫扫描检测算法

papers.title: SPHERES: an efficient server-side web application protection system
papers.authors: Ouissem Ben Fredj
papers.abstract: While the web attacks grow in number and manner, the current web protection methods fail to follow this evolution. This paper introduces a new design of a web application protection method called SPHERES. The main idea behind SPHERES is that it is placed in the application server; it intercepts the decrypted traffic, and checks it against a set of filtering rules specific to the requests. This design allows SPHERES to have the most accurate picture of the exchanged traffic, the websites structures and workflows, the user sessions and their states, and the system states. This accurate picture of the total system allows SPHERES to build a protection sphere around the website and checks several types and levels of protections efficiently. In addition to the detection of known attacks, SPHERES is able to detect zero-day attacks at runtime. The performance study of SPHERES shows that it is much better than two famous existing web protection tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然web攻击的数量和方式都在增长，但当前的web保护方法却跟不上这种发展。介绍了一种新的web应用程序保护方法SPHERES的设计。SPHERES背后的主要思想是它被放在应用服务器中；它拦截解密的流量，并根据一组特定于请求的过滤规则对其进行检查。这种设计使SPHERES能够最准确地了解交换流量、网站结构和工作流、用户会话及其状态以及系统状态。这种对整个系统的精确描述允许SPHERES在网站周围建立一个保护圈，并有效地检查几种类型和级别的保护。除了检测已知的攻击，SPHERES还能够在运行时检测零日攻击。SPHERES的性能研究表明，它比现有的两个著名的web保护工具要好得多。
papers.title_zh: SPHERES:一个高效的服务器端web应用程序保护系统

papers.title: A novel verifiable and unconditionally secure (m, t, n)-threshold multi-secret sharing scheme using overdetermined systems of linear equations over finite Galois fields
papers.authors: Kamel Mohamed Faraoun
papers.abstract: Threshold multi-secrets sharing schemes allow sharing a set of m secrets among n participants, while secrets can be revealed only if t or more participants collude. Although many multi-secret sharing schemes have been proposed, several improvements remain essential in order to cope with actual effectiveness and security requirements, including computational performances and compliance for large-scale data. In this paper, we present a novel multi-secrets (m, t, n)-threshold scheme using overdetermined systems of linear equations defined over finite Galois fields. The scheme provides unconditional security, linear sharing/reconstructing complexities and holds secure verifiability and t-consistence. By considering both secrets and shares as elements over finite Galois fields GF(2r), optimal and space-efficient representation is ensured compared to recent sharing schemes. In addition, the scheme provides dynamic secrets sharing, forgery/cheating detection and robustness against common attacks, while lower computational overhead is required.
papers.abstract_zh: 门限多秘密共享方案允许在n个参与者之间共享一组m个秘密，而秘密只有在t个或更多参与者合谋时才能被泄露。尽管已经提出了许多多秘密共享方案，但是为了应对实际的有效性和安全性要求，包括计算性能和对大规模数据的依从性，一些改进仍然是必要的。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的多秘密(m，t，n)-门限方案，它使用了有限伽罗瓦域上的超定线性方程组。该方案提供了无条件安全性、线性共享/重构复杂性，并具有安全可验证性和t-一致性。通过将秘密和共享视为有限伽罗瓦域GF(2r)上的元素，与最近的共享方案相比，确保了最优和空间有效的表示。此外，该方案提供了动态秘密共享、伪造/欺骗检测和抵抗常见攻击的鲁棒性，同时需要较低的计算开销。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的可验证且无条件安全的(m，t，n)-门限多重秘密共享方案

papers.title: A generic construction of identity-based proxy signature scheme in the standard model
papers.authors: Xiaoming Hu, Huajie Xu, Jian Wang, WenAn Tan, Yinchun Yang
papers.abstract: Recently, numerous identity-based proxy signature (IDPS) schemes are constructed by direct methods or generic methods. However, most of them are proved only to be secure in the random oracle model or are involved high computational cost. In this paper, we present a novel and generic construction method of IDPS scheme secure in the standard model from any identity-based signature (IDS) scheme. The security of IDPS scheme constructed by our method is based on the security of original IDS scheme. The computational cost of constructing an IDPS scheme is almost the same as that of constructing an original IDS scheme. Compared with other existing IDPS schemes constructed by direct methods or other generic methods, our IDPS scheme has better performance: signature length and computational cost of our IDPS scheme are almost half of other existing IDPS schemes. What is more, our method can be applied to construct other identity-based proxy cryptosystems.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，许多基于身份的代理签名(IDPS)方案是通过直接方法或一般方法构造的。然而，它们中的大多数只能在随机预言模型下被证明是安全的，或者需要很高的计算代价。本文提出了一种新的在标准模型下安全的IDPS方案的构造方法。用我们的方法构造的IDPS方案的安全性是建立在原IDS方案的安全性基础上的。构造IDPS方案的计算成本几乎与构造原始IDS方案的计算成本相同。与其他由直接方法或其他一般方法构造的现有IDPS方案相比，我们的IDPS方案具有更好的性能:我们的IDPS方案的签名长度和计算成本几乎是其他现有IDPS方案的一半。此外，我们的方法还可以应用于构造其他基于身份的代理密码系统。
papers.title_zh: 标准模型下基于身份的代理签名方案的一般构造

papers.title: A study of the internet financial interest rate risk evaluation index system in cloud computing
papers.authors: Sheng-dong Mu, Yixiang Tian, Yiwei Luo
papers.abstract: Cloud computing is a product of computer technologies combined with network technologies and it has been widely applied in China. Experts and scholars in all fields begin to make many studies of cloud computing infrastructure construction and effective resource utilisation. With ITFIN, people can enjoy financial services in dealing with various problems. However, one person can play many identities in the network. This phenomenon posed a severe challenge to ITFIN network security and has largely intensified the risks, including the operational risk, market selection risk and network and information security risk. ITFIN resolves the risks by establishing a reliable, reasonable and effective risk assessment model. We conducted theoretical and empirical analysis, then constructed an assessment model against China's ITFIN risk. The model integrates rough set and particle swarm optimisation support vector machine (PSO-SVM). Finally, the model was used to assess the ITFIN risk in China. The empirical research results indicate that the model can effectively reduce redundant data information with rough set theory. The theory also guarantees a reliable, reasonable and scientific model, enhance the classification effect of the model. The parameters of SVM model obtained by optimising with PSO can effectively avoid local optimum, improve the effect of the classification model. Overall, the model has good generalisation ability and learning ability.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算是计算机技术与网络技术相结合的产物，在中国已经得到了广泛的应用。各个领域的专家学者开始对云计算基础设施建设和资源有效利用进行大量研究。有了ITFIN，人们可以在处理各种问题时享受金融服务。但是，一个人在网络中可以扮演很多身份。这种现象对ITFIN网络安全提出了严峻的挑战，并在很大程度上加剧了风险，包括操作风险、市场选择风险和网络与信息安全风险。ITFIN通过建立可靠、合理、有效的风险评估模型来化解风险。我们进行了理论和实证分析，然后构建了一个针对中国投资信托基金风险的评估模型。该模型集成了粗糙集和粒子群优化支持向量机(PSO-SVM)。最后，将该模型应用于中国投资信托基金风险评估。实证研究结果表明，该模型能有效地利用粗糙集理论约简冗余数据信息。该理论还保证了模型的可靠性、合理性和科学性，增强了模型的分类效果。用粒子群算法优化得到的SVM模型参数可以有效避免局部最优，提高分类模型的效果。总体而言，该模型具有良好的泛化能力和学习能力。
papers.title_zh: 云计算环境下互联网金融利率风险评估指标体系研究

papers.title: Novel implementation of defence strategy of relay attack based on cloud in RFID systems
papers.authors: He Xu, Weiwei Shen, Peng Li, Keith Mayes, Ruchuan Wang, Dashen Li, Shengxiang Yang
papers.title_zh: RFID系统中基于云的中继攻击防御策略的新实现

papers.title: Reconfigurable design and implementation of nonlinear Boolean function for cloud computing security platform
papers.authors: Su Yang, Shen Junwei, Wang Wei
papers.abstract: Nonlinear Boolean function plays a pivotal role in the stream cipher algorithms and cloud computing security platforms. Based on the analysis of multiple algorithms, this paper proposes a hardware structure of reconfigurable nonlinear Boolean function. This structure can realise the number of variables and AND terms less than 80 arbitrary nonlinear Boolean function in stream cipher algorithms. The entire architecture is verified on the FPGA platform and synthesised under the 0.18 μm CMOS technology, the clock frequency reaches 248.7 MHz, the result proves that the design is propitious to carry out the most nonlinear Boolean functions in stream ciphers which have been published, compared with other designs, the structure can achieve relatively high flexibility, and it has an obvious advantage in the area of circuits and processing speed.
papers.abstract_zh: 非线性布尔函数在流密码算法和云计算安全平台中起着举足轻重的作用。在分析多种算法的基础上，提出了一种可重构非线性布尔函数的硬件结构。这种结构可以实现序列密码算法中变量数和与项数少于80的任意非线性布尔函数。整个结构在FPGA平台上验证，并在0.18微米CMOS工艺下综合，时钟频率达到248.7 MHz，结果证明该设计有利于实现已发表的流密码中的大多数非线性布尔函数，与其他设计相比，该结构可以达到较高的灵活性，在电路面积和处理速度上具有明显的优势。
papers.title_zh: 云计算安全平台非线性布尔函数的可重构设计与实现

papers.title: Network optimisation for improving security and safety level of dangerous goods transportation based on cloud computing
papers.authors: Haixing Wang, Guiping Xiao, Zhen Wei, Tao Hai
papers.title_zh: 基于云计算提高危险品运输安全保障水平的网络优化

papers.title: Proofs of retrievability from linearly homomorphic structure-preserving signatures
papers.authors: Xiao Zhang, Shengli Liu, Shuai Han
papers.abstract: Proofs of retrievability (PoR) enables clients to outsource huge amount of data to cloud servers, and provides an efficient audit protocol, which can be employed to check that all the data is being maintained properly and can be retrieved from the server. In this paper, we present a generic construction of PoR from linearly homomorphic structure-preserving signature (LHSPS), which makes public verification possible. Authenticity and retrievability of our PoR scheme are guaranteed by the unforgeability of LHSPS. We further extend our result to dynamic PoR, which supports dynamic update of outsourced data. Our construction is free of complicated data structures like Merkle hash tree. With an instantiation of a recent LHSPS scheme proposed by Kiltz and Wee (EuroCrypt15), we derive a publicly verifiable (dynamic) PoR scheme. The security is based on standard assumptions and proved in the standard model.
papers.abstract_zh: 可检索性证明(PoR)使客户能够将大量数据外包给云服务器，并提供了一种高效的审计协议，可用于检查所有数据是否得到正确维护，以及是否可以从服务器检索。本文提出了一种基于线性同态保结构签名的PoR的一般构造，使得公开验证成为可能。LHSPS的不可伪造性保证了我们的PoR方案的真实性和可恢复性。我们进一步扩展我们的结果到动态PoR，它支持外包数据的动态更新。我们的构造没有像Merkle hash树这样复杂的数据结构。通过实例化最近由Kiltz和Wee (EuroCrypt15)提出的LHSPS方案，我们得到了一个可公开验证的(动态)PoR方案。该安全性基于标准假设，并在标准模型中得到证明。
papers.title_zh: 线性同态保结构签名可恢复性的证明

papers.title: An ensemble algorithm for discovery of malicious web pages
papers.authors: Hedieh Sajedi
papers.abstract: Internet has become one of our daily life activities that all of us agree on its important role. It is necessary to know how it can either have misuse. Identity theft, brand reputation damage and loss of customer's confidence in e-commerce and online banking are examples of the damages it can cause. In this paper, we proposed an ensemble learning algorithm for discovery of malicious web pages. The goal is to provide more learning chance to the data instances, which are misclassified by previous classifiers. To this aim, we employ a genetic algorithm (GA) to improve classification accuracy. In this algorithm a weight is assigned to a weak classifier and GA chooses the best set of committee members of weak classifiers to make an optimal ensemble. Experimental results demonstrate that this algorithm leads to the classification accuracy improvement.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网已经成为我们的日常生活活动之一，我们都同意它的重要作用。有必要知道它是如何被误用的。身份盗窃、品牌声誉受损以及客户对电子商务和网上银行失去信心都是它可能造成的损害的例子。本文提出了一种用于恶意网页发现的集成学习算法。目标是为被先前分类器错误分类的数据实例提供更多的学习机会。为此，我们采用遗传算法(GA)来提高分类精度。在该算法中，一个权重被分配给一个弱分类器，遗传算法选择弱分类器的最佳成员集来进行最优集成。实验结果表明，该算法提高了分类精度。
papers.title_zh: 一种发现恶意网页的集成算法

papers.title: On mapping of address and port using translation
papers.authors: Aniruddha Bhattacharjya, Xiaofeng Zhong, Jing Wang, Xing Li
papers.abstract: Due to the shortage of IPv4 addresses, many hosts are currently assigned to a single IPv4 address by using one or a number of NAT devices. However, numerous NAT devices cannot be upgraded for executing 6to4 due to technical and/or economic reasons. Solutions depending on Double Network Address Translation 64 are a good way to utilise shared IP4 addressing. Mapping of address and port using translation (MAP-T) is a technique that accomplishes double translation on Border Relay (BR) and customer edge (CE) devices. IPv4 and IPv6 forwarding, IPv4 and IPv6 fragmentation functions, and NAT64 translation functions are used by MAP-T. This enables increasing numbers of IPv6 in both clients and servers in order to possess the best defence against certain attacks, such as routing loop attacks, spoofing attacks, denial-of-service attacks. We have here proposed some procedures for creating frameworks and sustaining secure IPv6 networks according to applications, environs and architecture.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于IPv4地址的短缺，目前许多主机通过使用一个或多个NAT设备被分配到单个IPv4地址。然而，由于技术和/或经济原因，许多NAT设备不能升级以执行6to4。依靠双网络地址转换64的解决方案是利用共享IP4寻址的好方法。使用转换映射地址和端口(MAP-T)是一种在边界中继(BR)和客户边缘(CE)设备上实现双重转换的技术。MAP-T使用IPv4和IPv6转发、IPv4和IPv6分段功能以及NAT64转换功能。这使得客户端和服务器中的IPv6数量不断增加，以便拥有对某些攻击的最佳防御，例如路由环路攻击、欺骗攻击、拒绝服务攻击。我们在这里提出了一些根据应用、环境和架构来创建框架和维持安全IPv6网络的过程。
papers.title_zh: 利用翻译实现地址和端口的映射

papers.title: Lightweight R-LWE-based privacy preservation scheme for smart grid network
papers.authors: Aarti Amod Agarkar, Himanshu Agrawal
papers.abstract: Privacy preservation is one of the important research challenges in IoT applications. In one such IoT application; smart grid network, billing information and energy profiling information of the customer may be collected, aggregated, and forwarded to control centre for further analytics. Based on the research findings, traditional public key cryptography is not secured against quantum attacks. Our study is motivated by the recent developments in the lattice-cryptography schemes. This paper presents a lightweight R-LWE lattice-cryptography-based scheme to sign and encrypt message traffic in smart grid. Security analysis suggests that proposed scheme preserves the privacy of customer. Performance analysis shows that proposed scheme cause less communication overhead as compared to traditional public key cryptography yet maintain parallel with NTRU-based scheme and outperforms both formats of public key cryptography in regards to computation overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私保护是物联网应用的重要研究挑战之一。在一个这样的物联网应用中；智能电网网络、计费信息和客户的能源概况信息可以被收集、汇总并转发到控制中心以供进一步分析。根据研究结果，传统的公钥密码系统无法抵御量子攻击。我们的研究是由最近格密码体制的发展所激发的。提出了一种轻量级的基于R-LWE格密码的方案，用于对智能电网中的消息流量进行签名和加密。安全性分析表明，提出的方案保护了用户的隐私。性能分析表明，与传统的公钥密码体制相比，该方案的通信开销较小，但与基于NTRU的方案保持并行，并且在计算开销方面优于两种公钥密码体制。
papers.title_zh: 基于轻量级R-LWE的智能电网隐私保护方案

papers.title: CSPS: catchy short passwords making offline and online attacks impossible
papers.authors: Jaryn Shen, Qingkai Zeng
papers.abstract: This paper proposes to address online and offline attacks to passwords without increasing users' efforts in choosing and memorising their passwords. In CSPS, a password consists of two parts, a user-chosen short password and a server-generated long password. The short password should be memorised and secured by its user while the long password be encrypted and stored on the server side. To keep the secret key for protecting the long password secure, an additional sever is introduced to store the secret key and provide encryption/decryption services. On top of balloon, CSPS integrates expensive hash with secure encryption. It is mathematically proved that computationally unbounded attackers cannot succeed in offline dictionary or brute-force attacks or a combination of offline and online attacks. The criteria of security are established, which quantifies the security. To our best knowledge, CSPS is the first technique to make security quantifiable in password authentication mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出在不增加用户选择和记忆密码的努力的情况下，解决对密码的在线和离线攻击。在CSPS，密码由两部分组成，用户选择的短密码和服务器生成的长密码。短密码应由用户记忆和保护，而长密码应加密并存储在服务器端。为了保持用于保护长密码的秘密密钥的安全，引入了附加的服务器来存储秘密密钥并提供加密/解密服务。在气球之上，CSPS集成了昂贵的散列和安全加密。从数学上证明了计算无界的攻击者无法在离线字典或暴力攻击或离线和在线攻击的组合中成功。建立了安全性标准，量化了安全性。据我们所知，CSPS是第一个在密码认证机制中量化安全性的技术。
papers.title_zh: CSPS:吸引人的短密码使离线和在线攻击变得不可能

papers.title: Mitigate black hole attack using bee optimised weighted trust with AODV in MANET
papers.authors: V. Keerthika, Nandagopal Malarvizhi
papers.title_zh: MANET中利用AODV优化加权信任减轻黑洞攻击

papers.title: What's in your honeypot: a privacy compliance perspective
papers.authors: Adam J. Brown, Todd R. Andel
papers.abstract: Honeypots, a form of active cyber defence, assist in frustrating cyber aggressors through a detect and deceive strategy. However, significant legal questions arise in the USA from the emulation of a production host for purposes of recording information pertaining to access sessions. Taking a holistic perspective, this research explores credible legal claims that may arise when using a honeypot. Situations consider issues pertaining to setting up a honeypot to not violate US federal and state privacy laws, to operating a honeypot without becoming exposed to first or third party liability, and to providing data gathered by a honeypot to law enforcement officials to contribute to an investigation.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜜罐是一种积极的网络防御形式，通过检测和欺骗策略帮助挫败网络攻击者。然而，在美国，出于记录与访问会话相关的信息的目的而模拟生产主机会产生重大的法律问题。从整体的角度来看，这项研究探索了使用蜜罐时可能出现的可信的法律索赔。情况考虑与设置蜜罐不违反美国联邦和州隐私法、操作蜜罐不承担第一方或第三方责任以及向执法官员提供蜜罐收集的数据以协助调查有关的问题。
papers.title_zh: 你的蜜罐里有什么:隐私合规视角

papers.title: Behavioural analysis approach for IDS based on attack pattern and risk assessment in cloud computing
papers.authors: Ben Charhi Youssef, Mannane Nada, Boubker Regragui
papers.title_zh: 云计算中基于攻击模式和风险评估的入侵检测系统行为分析方法

papers.title: A critical insight into the effectiveness of research methods evolved to secure IoT ecosystem
papers.authors: Burhan Ul Islam Khan, Rashidah Funke Olanrewaju, Farhat Anwar, Roohie Naaz Mir, Athaur Rahman Najeeb
papers.abstract: Increasing proliferation of IoT has led to an evolution of various devices for realising the smart features of ubiquitous applications. However, the inclusion of such a massive pool of devices with different computational capabilities, network protocols, hardware configurations, etc. also causes a higher number of security threats. Security professionals, organisations, and researchers are consistently investigating the security problems associated with IoT ecosystem and are coming up with different forms of solution sets. This paper presents a snapshot of the existing research work being carried out towards the security of IoT and assesses their strengths and weaknesses. The paper also explores the current research trend and presents the latest security methods being implemented and outlines the open research issues associated with it. The paper contributes to offering an accurate picture of the effectiveness of the existing security system in IoT.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网的日益普及导致了各种设备的发展，以实现无处不在的应用程序的智能功能。然而，包含如此巨大的具有不同计算能力、网络协议、硬件配置等的设备池。也会导致更多的安全威胁。安全专业人士、组织和研究人员一直在调查与物联网生态系统相关的安全问题，并提出了不同形式的解决方案。本文简要介绍了针对物联网安全性开展的现有研究工作，并评估了它们的优缺点。本文还探讨了当前的研究趋势，介绍了正在实施的最新安全方法，并概述了与之相关的开放研究问题。本文有助于准确描述物联网现有安全系统的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 对保护物联网生态系统的研究方法有效性的重要见解

papers.title: An efficient authentication and key agreement scheme for e-health applications in the context of internet of things
papers.authors: Hamza Khemissa, Djamel Tandjaoui, Samia Bouzefrane
papers.abstract: E-health applications are one of the most promising applications in the context of internet of things (IoT). Nevertheless, resource constraints and security issues in IoT are the main barriers for their deployment. Among security issues, authentication and data confidentiality are required to secure e-health applications. In this paper, we propose a new authentication and key agreement scheme for e-health applications in the context of IoT. This scheme allows a sensor node, a gateway node, and a remote user to authenticate each other and secure the collection of health-related data. The proposed scheme is based on lightweight symmetric cryptography since it uses nonces, exclusive-or operations, and simple hash functions. Besides, it takes into consideration the sensors location to provide an efficient authentication. To assess the proposed scheme, we conduct a theoretical and an automated security analysis using AVISPA tool. The results show that our scheme preserves the security properties, and ensures resilience against different types of attacks. In addition, we evaluate and compare both communication and computational costs with some existing authentication schemes. The obtained results prove that it provides authentication with low energy cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 电子健康应用是物联网背景下最有前景的应用之一。然而，物联网的资源限制和安全问题是其部署的主要障碍。在安全问题中，认证和数据保密性是保护电子保健应用所必需的。本文针对物联网环境下的电子健康应用，提出了一种新的认证和密钥协商方案。该方案允许传感器节点、网关节点和远程用户相互认证，并保护健康相关数据的收集。所提出的方案基于轻量级对称加密，因为它使用随机数、异或运算和简单的散列函数。此外，它考虑了传感器的位置，以提供有效的认证。为了评估所提出的方案，我们使用AVISPA工具进行了理论和自动化的安全性分析。结果表明，我们的方案保持了安全性，并保证了对不同类型攻击的弹性。此外，我们评估和比较了现有认证方案的通信和计算成本。所获得的结果证明它提供了低能量成本的认证。
papers.title_zh: 物联网环境下电子健康应用的高效认证和密钥协商方案

papers.title: An ontology-based approach to improve access policy administration of attribute-based access control
papers.authors: Jiaying Li, Baowen Zhang
papers.abstract: Attribute-based access control (ABAC) needs a large number of policies to function by using attributes of visitors, resources, environmental conditions, etc. Efficient policy administration is vital for implementation of ABAC models. In this paper, an ontology-based approach is proposed to build up an ABAC model, which is named as an ontology-based ABAC model, OABACM. Underlying relationships among things such as attributes hierarchies in OABACM are identified and described in OABACM, which if treated improperly can directly lead to problems in policy administration. In addition, policy representation and reasoning mechanism are discussed within OABACM and inherent logical properties of this model are formalised in rules. With proper reasoners, these properties can be utilised to logically improve access policy administration by reducing policy redundancy and detecting policy conflicts. In experiments, a sample ontology is created and several enterprise access examples are tested upon OABACM, which validates the effects of our model on policy administration.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)需要大量的策略通过使用访问者、资源、环境条件等的属性来发挥作用。高效的政策管理对ABAC模式的实施至关重要。本文提出了一种基于本体的方法来建立ABAC模型，称为基于本体的ABAC模型OABACM。OABACM中的属性层次等事物之间的底层关系在OABACM中被识别和描述，如果处理不当，会直接导致策略管理中的问题。此外，在OABACM中讨论了策略表示和推理机制，并将该模型的内在逻辑属性形式化为规则。通过适当的推理器，可以利用这些属性通过减少策略冗余和检测策略冲突来逻辑地改进访问策略管理。在实验中，创建了一个样本本体，并在OABACM上测试了几个企业访问实例，验证了我们的模型在策略管理方面的效果。
papers.title_zh: 一种基于本体的基于属性的访问控制策略管理方法

papers.title: A multi-agent system approach based on cryptographic algorithm for securing communications and protecting stored data in the cloud-computing environment
papers.authors: Mohammed Amine Yagoub, Okba Kazar, Mounir Beggas
papers.abstract: The cloud computing has been envisioned as the next generation architecture of information technology enterprise. The Internet is indispensable in present days to provide and maintain the data. Such applications can be used by the end-user via the cloud communications without any configuration. Moreover, the user's data files can be accessed from any other computer using the Internet services. The security goal is to save data from threat and vulnerability which is handled by various approaches. The data should be encrypted prior to be transmitted and stored. We aim to propose a solution such that we will encrypt the whole data along with the cryptographic key. This contribution provides a new architecture that combines, obfuscation technique, hybrid encryption algorithms and the homomorphic encryption approaches. The proposed security architecture based on multi-agent system for cloud computing communications and storage environment that takes into account the most known security gaps.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算被认为是信息技术企业的下一代架构。如今，互联网对于提供和维护数据是不可或缺的。最终用户可以通过云通信使用这些应用程序，而无需任何配置。此外，用户的数据文件可以从使用互联网服务的任何其他计算机上访问。安全目标是保护数据免受威胁和漏洞的影响，这可以通过各种方法来实现。数据在传输和存储之前应该加密。我们的目标是提出一个解决方案，这样我们将使用密钥加密整个数据。这一贡献提供了一种新的体系结构，它结合了混淆技术、混合加密算法和同态加密方法。提出了基于多代理系统的云计算通信和存储环境的安全架构，该架构考虑了最常见的安全漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 一种基于加密算法的多代理系统方法，用于保护云计算环境中的通信安全和存储数据

papers.title: An efficient user authentication model for IOT-based healthcare environment
papers.authors: Ahmed A. Elngar
papers.abstract: Along with the large-scale proliferation of IoT-networks and information technology, users can obtain the information resources conveniently via intelligent device. Therefore authentication mechanism is a fundamental tool for ensuring secure communications and the validity of communicating party. Specially, focusing on healthcare applications based on IoT-networks.This paper proposes an efficient authentication model called 'Elngar authentication model' (EAM)-based IoT medical data system for anonymous users using elliptic curves cryptosystem (ECC) which achieves mutual authentication and forward security. Specifically, this paper certify the legitimacy of the proposed via employing BAN-logic, which is one of the important formal methods. Further, the performance comparison shows that EAM model is more suitable for IoT medical applications where efficiency and security concerned.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着物联网网络和信息技术的大规模普及，用户可以通过智能设备方便地获取信息资源。因此，认证机制是确保安全通信和通信方合法性的基本工具。特别关注基于物联网网络的医疗保健应用。提出了一种基于EAM(Elngar authentication model，简称ELN gar authentic ation model)的高效认证模型，利用椭圆曲线密码体制(ECC)实现了双向认证和前向安全。具体来说，本文利用BAN逻辑这一重要的形式化方法证明了所提方法的合法性。此外，性能比较表明，EAM模型更适合考虑效率和安全性的物联网医疗应用。
papers.title_zh: 一种适用于IOT医疗环境的高效用户认证模型

papers.title: Cloud-based DDoS attack detection and defence system using statistical approach
papers.authors: B. S. Kiruthika Devi, T. Subbulakshmi
papers.title_zh: 使用统计方法的基于云的DDoS攻击检测和防御系统

papers.title: Sequential pattern analysis for event-based intrusion detection
papers.authors: T. N. Nisha, Dhanya Pramod
papers.title_zh: 基于事件的入侵检测序列模式分析

papers.title: SQL injection attacks - a systematic review
papers.authors: Kirti Sharma, Shobha Bhatt
papers.abstract: In today's era, each and every person is utilising websites and so many different web applications for online administrations, for example: booking of railway tickets, movie ticketing, shopping, communication and so forth. These websites consists sensitive and confidential information. With the linearity of web applications in the last decade, the unconstructive crash of security has also matured either. SQL injection attack is one such attack where the anonymous user can append SQL code to input query. This research paper starts with developing criteria for systematic literature review based on research questions, quality assessment and data samples. The paper presents various SQL injection techniques with their intended attacks. Further studies explore different techniques to prevent attacks. Tabular representation of quality evaluation criteria was presented with grades. Lastly, different research questions and solutions were provided related to SQL injection attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在当今时代，每个人都在利用网站和许多不同的网络应用进行在线管理，例如:预订火车票、电影票、购物、通信等等。这些网站包含敏感和机密信息。随着web应用程序在过去十年中的线性发展，非建设性的安全性崩溃也变得成熟了。SQL注入攻击就是这样一种攻击，匿名用户可以将SQL代码附加到输入查询中。本研究论文从基于研究问题、质量评估和数据样本的系统性文献综述的发展标准开始。本文介绍了各种SQL注入技术及其攻击意图。进一步的研究探索不同的技术来防止攻击。质量评估标准的表格表示与等级一起呈现。最后，提供了与SQL注入攻击相关的不同研究问题和解决方案。
papers.title_zh: SQL注入袭击——系统综述

papers.title: Password security by encryption using an extended ADFGVX cipher
papers.authors: Isunuri Bala Venkateswarlu, Jagadeesh Kakarla
papers.abstract: Login will be the critical step for most of the web users for the user authentication. As hackers utilizing a variety of techniques to steal the passwords, it is recommended to offer secured transmission of passwords to the servers from the client system. Current web developers are using common traditional hashing techniques for securing passwords over the network. However, hashing techniques are vulnerable to several attacks like brute-force attack, dictionary attack, and birthday attack. This paper implemented password security with an easy and robust transposition based encryption technique using an extended ADFGVX cipher. The proposed cipher uses two 7 × 6 Polybius squares for encryption to accommodate common characters of the password along with the random key for encryption. Finally, this study considered four metrics for performance evaluation and compared the proposed method with the state-of-art techniques. It is found that the proposed method performed excellently regarding complexity for cracking password and satisfactorily concerning execution time.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于大多数网络用户来说，登录是进行用户认证的关键步骤。由于黑客利用各种技术来窃取密码，因此建议从客户端系统向服务器提供安全的密码传输。当前的web开发人员正在使用常见的传统散列技术来保护网络上的密码。然而，散列技术容易受到几种攻击，如蛮力攻击、字典攻击和生日攻击。该文使用一种扩展的ADFGVX密码，通过一种简单而健壮的基于换位的加密技术实现了密码安全。所提出的密码使用两个7 × 6的波利比乌斯正方形进行加密，以容纳密码的公共字符以及用于加密的随机密钥。最后，本研究考虑了性能评估的四个指标，并将提出的方法与最先进的技术进行了比较。我们发现，所提出的方法在破解密码的复杂性方面表现优异，并且在执行时间方面令人满意。
papers.title_zh: 使用扩展的ADFGVX密码加密的密码安全性

papers.title: Outsourcing computation for private function evaluation
papers.authors: Henry Carter, Patrick Traynor
papers.abstract: Outsourced secure multiparty computation (SMC) protocols allow resource-constrained devices to execute input-private computation with great efficiency. Unfortunately, existing outsourced SMC protocols require that all parties know the function being evaluated, precluding applications where the function itself must remain private. We develop the first linear-complexity protocols for outsourcing private function evaluation (PFE), SMC protocols that provide input and function privacy. Assuming a semi-honest function holder, we build on existing two-party PFE constructions to develop outsourced protocols that are secure against a semi-honest, covert, or malicious outsourcing server and malicious mobile participants. To do this, we develop a garbling technique for combining public and private sub-circuits in a single computation. This allows us to apply auxiliary checks for malicious behaviour using only free-XOR gates. These protocols demonstrate the feasibility of outsourced PFE and provide a first step towards privacy-preserving applications for use in cloud computing.
papers.abstract_zh: 外包安全多方计算(SMC)协议允许资源受限的设备高效地执行输入私有计算。不幸的是，现有的外包SMC协议要求各方都知道被评估的功能，排除了功能本身必须保持私密的应用。我们开发了第一个用于外包私有函数评估(PFE)的线性复杂度协议，SMC协议提供了输入和函数隐私。假设一个半诚实的功能持有者，我们在现有的两方PFE结构的基础上开发外包协议，该协议可以抵抗半诚实的、秘密的或恶意的外包服务器和恶意的移动参与者。为了做到这一点，我们开发了一种混淆技术，用于在单个计算中组合公共和私有子电路。这允许我们仅使用自由XOR门来对恶意行为进行辅助检查。这些协议证明了外包PFE的可行性，并为云计算中的隐私保护应用迈出了第一步。
papers.title_zh: 私有函数评估的外包计算

papers.title: PrivacyContext: identifying malicious mobile privacy leak using program context
papers.authors: Xiaolei Wang, Yuexiang Yang
papers.abstract: Serious concerns have been raised about user's privacy leak in mobile apps, and many detection approaches are proposed. To evade detection, new mobile malware starts to mimic privacy-related behaviours of benign apps, and mix malicious privacy leak with benign ones to reduce the chance of being observed. Since prior proposed approaches primarily focus on the privacy leak discovery, these evasive techniques will make differentiating between malicious and benign privacy disclosures difficult during privacy leak analysis. In this paper, we propose PrivacyContext to identify malicious privacy leak using context. PrivacyContext can be used to purify privacy leak detection results for automatic and easy interpretation by filtering benign privacy disclosures. Experiments show PrivacyContext can perform an effective and efficient static privacy disclosure analysis enhancement and identify malicious privacy leak with 92.73% true positive rate. Evaluation also indicates that to keep the accuracy of privacy disclosure classification, our proposed contexts are all necessary.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动应用中的用户隐私泄露引起了人们的严重关注，并提出了许多检测方法。为了逃避检测，新的移动恶意软件开始模仿良性应用程序的隐私相关行为，并将恶意隐私泄露与良性隐私泄露混合在一起，以减少被观察到的机会。由于先前提出的方法主要集中于隐私泄露发现，这些回避技术将使得在隐私泄露分析期间难以区分恶意和良性隐私泄露。在本文中，我们提出PrivacyContext来使用上下文识别恶意隐私泄露。PrivacyContext可用于净化隐私泄露检测结果，通过过滤良性隐私泄露进行自动和轻松的解释。实验表明，PrivacyContext能够进行有效的静态隐私泄露分析增强，并以92.73%的正确率识别恶意隐私泄露。评估还表明，为了保持隐私泄露分类的准确性，我们提出的上下文都是必要的。
papers.title_zh: PrivacyContext:使用程序上下文识别恶意移动隐私泄露

papers.title: Video watermarking scheme based on IDR frames using MPEG-2 structure
papers.authors: Rakesh Ahuja, Sarabjeet Singh Bedi
papers.abstract: A robust, imperceptible and blind video watermarking scheme based on MPEG-2 is presented. The proposed algorithm using the DC coefficients from 8 × 8 block of discrete coefficient transform generated by picking candidate IDR frames based on column transposition method in order to embed the scrambled binary watermark. The watermark can only be extracted by using the secret keys, enhances the security of watermark. The robustness is evaluated by testing against spatial synchronisation attacks, temporal synchronisation attacks and re-encoding attacks by evaluating two parameters as normalised correlation and bit error rate in order to find the degree of similarity and degree of dissimilarity respectively between the original and extracted watermark. The superiority of the proposed algorithm is that the excellent robustness achieved against temporal synchronisation attacks and compression attack by comparing it with previous work and also good perceptibility obtained without changing the motion vectors during the DPCM process of MPEG-2 encoding scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种基于MPEG-2的鲁棒、不可感知的盲视频水印方案。该算法利用基于列转置法选取候选IDR帧产生的8 × 8块离散系数变换的DC系数来嵌入置乱后的二值水印。只有使用密钥才能提取水印，增强了水印的安全性。通过对空间同步攻击、时间同步攻击和重编码攻击进行测试来评估鲁棒性，这是通过评估作为归一化相关性和误码率的两个参数来进行的，以便分别找到原始和提取的水印之间的相似度和相异度。所提出的算法的优越性在于，通过与先前的工作进行比较，该算法在抵抗时间同步攻击和压缩攻击方面获得了优异的鲁棒性，并且在MPEG-2编码方案的DPCM过程中，在不改变运动矢量的情况下获得了良好的可感知性。
papers.title_zh: 基于IDR帧的MPEG-2结构视频水印方案

papers.title: Study on data fuzzy breakpoint detection in massive dynamic data flow
papers.authors: Mao Yingying, Yuan Hao
papers.abstract: The current method obtains the frequency of occurrence of abnormal data detected in the adjacent regions through reading between the sensor and the adjacent conversion data, and uses the frequency of occurrence of abnormal data to describe the spatial correlation, according to readings of sensor data using the Bayesian analysis method of sensor to determine whether the sensor is abnormal. But this method has the problem of low detection accuracy. For this reason, this paper proposes a method to detect the fuzzy breakpoint of data in the massive dynamic data flow. Firstly, this method used the amplitude difference method to determine the abnormal data amplitude and the discrete point difference of data fuzzy breakpoint, and then used the wavelet transform to extract the features of inflection point of the data fuzzy breakpoint. Combined with the features of inflection point of the extracted data fuzzy breakpoint, we carried out the support vector machine classification, and detected the data fuzzy breakpoints in the massive dynamic data flow. Experimental results show that the proposed method can effectively improve the accuracy of fuzzy breakpoint detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 当前的方法通过读取传感器和相邻区域之间的转换数据来获得在相邻区域中检测到的异常数据的出现频率，并且使用异常数据的出现频率来描述空间相关性，根据传感器数据的读取，使用传感器的贝叶斯分析方法来确定传感器是否异常。但是这种方法存在检测精度低的问题。为此，提出一种在海量动态数据流中检测数据模糊断点的方法。该方法首先利用幅度差法确定异常数据幅度和数据模糊断点的离散点差，然后利用小波变换提取数据模糊断点的拐点特征。结合提取的数据模糊断点拐点特征，进行支持向量机分类，检测海量动态数据流中的数据模糊断点。实验结果表明，该方法能有效提高模糊断点检测的准确性。
papers.title_zh: 海量动态数据流中数据模糊断点检测研究

papers.title: A novel approach for query over encrypted data in database
papers.authors: Ja'afer Al-Saraireh
papers.abstract: Database management is considered an essential component of many information systems to store data. Some database system contains secure data; these data are protected by using encryption techniques. The query performance is affected by encryption techniques. Therefore; should be a balance between the security and performance. A new technique in this research work has been proposed to enhance the query performance over the encrypted fields in a database system. This technique is based on producing a unique hash value for each secure data and transforms the SQL query into an appropriate formula to be executed over the hash value fields. The proposed approach has eliminated any statistical relationship between encrypted and hash value fields. The time of execution encryption/decryption is reduced to enhance the performance of the query over encrypted secure data in the proposed technique. A set of experiments are carried out, and the results indicate that the performance of SQL-query is enhanced by reducing the average response time to 14 compared with others related approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 数据库管理被认为是许多信息系统存储数据的基本组成部分。一些数据库系统包含安全数据；这些数据通过使用加密技术得到保护。加密技术会影响查询性能。因此；应该是安全性和性能之间的平衡。本文提出了一种新的技术来提高数据库系统中加密字段的查询性能。这种技术基于为每个安全数据产生唯一的散列值，并将SQL查询转换成要在散列值字段上执行的适当公式。所提出的方法消除了加密和散列值字段之间的任何统计关系。在所提出的技术中，执行加密/解密的时间被减少，以增强对加密的安全数据的查询的性能。实验结果表明，与其他相关方法相比，该方法的平均响应时间减少到14，从而提高了SQL-query的性能。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的数据库加密数据查询方法

papers.title: CB-ALCA: a cluster-based adaptive lightweight cryptographic algorithm for secure routing in wireless sensor networks
papers.authors: M. Revanesh, V. Sridhar, John M. Acken
papers.abstract: Wireless sensor network (WSN) focuses on various properties such as, clustering, authentication, routing, security, reliability and resource usage. Among these security is a critical issue in hostile environments. In this paper, a cluster-based routing algorithm is performed through adaptive lightweight cryptographic scheme. Firstly, we form clusters using improved fuzzy C means (iFCM) clustering. Then we select the optimum and reliable path to send data using improved artificial bee colony (iABC) algorithm. To construct a path, we consider node degree, node residual energy, valid distance and node mobility. A lightweight encryption approach is concerned for secure data transmission using RC6 block cipher algorithm. Once the simulation tests evaluated on NS3.26 network simulator, the experimental results obtained showed for our proposed work and it achieves good performance in terms of memory usage, communication overhead, transmission delay, bit error rate, energy consumption, computation time for encryption and decryption and packet delivery ratio.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线传感器网络(WSN)关注于各种属性，如分簇、认证、路由、安全性、可靠性和资源利用率。在这些安全性中，敌对环境中的安全性是一个关键问题。本文通过自适应轻量级加密方案实现了一种基于簇的路由算法。首先，我们使用改进的模糊C均值(iFCM)聚类形成聚类。然后利用改进的人工蜂群算法选择最优可靠的路径发送数据。在构建路径时，我们考虑了节点度、节点剩余能量、有效距离和节点移动性。提出了一种轻量级加密方法，用于使用RC6分组密码算法的安全数据传输。在NS3.26网络模拟器上进行仿真测试后，实验结果表明，我们提出的方法在内存使用、通信开销、传输延迟、误码率、能量消耗、加密和解密的计算时间以及分组投递率等方面都取得了良好的性能。
papers.title_zh: CB-ALCA:一种基于簇的无线传感器网络安全路由自适应轻量级加密算法

2017.journals_title: International Journal of Information and Computer Security, Volume 9

papers.title: Dynamic weighted VM load balancing for cloud-analyst
papers.authors: Ahmad M. Manasrah
papers.abstract: Cloud computing reformed the field of distributed systems and how businesses extend today. How to efficiently utilise the cloud computing resources to gain the maximum profit is one of the main research trends in the field, and the ultimate goal of cloud computing service providers. With the existence of virtualisation technology, running more than one virtual machines (VMs) on a single physical machine, brought a broad spectrum of benefits to service providers, researchers, etc. Therefore, this paper provides an analysis of the various VM load balancing algorithms. Further, a new VM load balancing algorithm has been proposed for an IaaS framework and implemented in a virtual machine environment of cloud-analyst to achieve better performance in terms of response and processing time.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算改革了分布式系统领域和当今的业务扩展方式。如何有效利用云计算资源获取最大利润是该领域的主要研究趋势之一，也是云计算服务提供商的最终目标。随着虚拟化技术的出现，在一台物理机上运行多个虚拟机(VM)给服务提供商、研究人员等带来了广泛的好处。因此，本文对各种虚拟机负载平衡算法进行了分析。此外，针对IaaS框架提出了一种新的虚拟机负载平衡算法，并在cloud-analyst的虚拟机环境中实现，以在响应和处理时间方面实现更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 面向云分析的动态加权虚拟机负载平衡

papers.title: Robust watermarking technique using back propagation neural network: a security protection mechanism for social applications
papers.authors: Aditi Zear, Amit Kumar Singh, Pardeep Kumar
papers.abstract: In this paper, an algorithm for digital watermarking based on discrete wavelet transforms (DWTs) and singular value decomposition (SVD) has been proposed. In the embedding process, the host colour image is decomposed into third-level DWT. Low frequency band (LL3) is transformed by SVD. The watermark image is also transformed by SVD. The S vector of watermark information is embedded in the S component of the host image. Watermarked image is generated by inverse SVD on modified S vector and original U, V vectors followed by inverse DWT. Watermark is extracted using an extraction algorithm. In order to enhance the robustness performance of the image watermark, back propagation neural network (BPNN) is applied to the extracted watermark to reduce the effects of different noise applied on the watermarked image. Results are obtained by varying the gain factor and size of the cover and watermark image, experimental results are provided to illustrate that the proposed method is able to withstand a variety of signal processing attacks and has been found to be giving superior performance for robustness and imperceptibility compared to existing methods suggested by other authors.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种基于离散小波变换和奇异值分解的数字水印算法。在嵌入过程中，宿主彩色图像被分解到第三级DWT中。低频带(LL3)通过奇异值分解进行变换。水印图像也经过奇异值分解变换。水印信息的S矢量被嵌入到宿主图像的S分量中。水印图像是通过对修改的S向量和原始的U，V向量进行逆SVD，然后进行逆DWT而生成的。使用提取算法提取水印。为了增强图像水印的鲁棒性，将反向传播神经网络(BPNN)应用于提取的水印，以降低不同噪声对水印图像的影响。通过改变增益因子以及载体和水印图像的大小来获得结果，提供实验结果来说明所提出的方法能够抵抗各种信号处理攻击，并且已经发现与其他作者提出的现有方法相比，该方法在鲁棒性和不可感知性方面给出了优越的性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于反向传播神经网络的鲁棒水印技术:一种面向社交应用的安全保护机制

papers.title: Trust delegation-based secure mobile cloud computing framework
papers.authors: Lo'ai Ali Tawalbeh, Fadi Ababneh, Yaser Jararweh, Fahd M. Al-Dosari
papers.abstract: Mobile devices are used to perform many useful tasks in our daily life. All around the world, many people are using their smart phones to communicate with others, identify their location, and do online shopping. These useful applications involve sharing personal and sensitive information. Also, the smart devices have many weaknesses, such as: limited battery life time, limited processing capacity and security issues. The mobile cloud computing (MCC) can be used to overcome these limitations. Using MCC improved the performance of many applications by conducting the processing at the cloud and sending back the results to the mobile device. But there are still many issues need to be addressed and considered when using MCC specially when dealing with applications that need live interaction and protecting the privacy. In this paper, we will study the main issues associated with mobile cloud computing models that include: security, performance, and quality of service. Then, we will present secure implementation of the cloudlet-based mobile cloud computing framework with its prototype that uses trust delegation technique to provide better security/performance tradeoffs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在我们的日常生活中，移动设备被用来执行许多有用的任务。在世界各地，许多人正在使用他们的智能手机与他人交流，识别他们的位置，并进行网上购物。这些有用的应用包括共享个人和敏感信息。此外，智能设备有许多弱点，如:有限的电池使用时间，有限的处理能力和安全问题。移动云计算(MCC)可以用来克服这些限制。使用MCC通过在云中进行处理并将结果发送回移动设备，提高了许多应用程序的性能。但是在使用MCC时，特别是在处理需要实时交互和保护隐私的应用时，仍然有许多问题需要解决和考虑。在本文中，我们将研究与移动云计算模型相关的主要问题，包括:安全性、性能和服务质量。然后，我们将展示基于cloudlet的移动云计算框架的安全实现及其原型，该原型使用信任委托技术来提供更好的安全性/性能折衷。
papers.title_zh: 基于信任委托的安全移动云计算框架

papers.title: Virtual machine security
papers.authors: Arif Khan
papers.title_zh: 虚拟机安全性

papers.title: Hierarchical detection of insider attacks in cloud computing systems
papers.authors: Omar M. Al-Jarrah, Moath Al-Ayoub, Yaser Jararweh
papers.abstract: Cloud computing has emerged as a new computing paradigm with enormous benefits that have attracted many businesses and service providers. As a result, it is critical to ensure highly available and resilient cloud system that continues to operate correctly under different circumstances. This is endangered by risks of cloud insider attacks. In this work, we propose an artificial intelligence based system to detect cloud insider attacks. A hierarchical detection system is used to ensure high detection accuracy and speed. In the first layer, we use a simple expert system to classify the insider as a normal, an attacker, or a probable attacker. The system reacts accordingly by allowing normal insiders to continue their work, blocking attackers, and performing further investigation on probable attackers in the second layer using a decision tree. Simulation results show that our system is able to detect insider attacks with 99.67% detection accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算已经成为一种新的计算模式，其巨大的优势吸引了许多企业和服务提供商。因此，确保高可用性和弹性的云系统在不同环境下继续正确运行至关重要。这受到云内部攻击风险的威胁。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个基于人工智能的系统来检测云内部攻击。分层检测系统用于确保高检测精度和速度。在第一层，我们使用一个简单的专家系统将内部人员分为正常人、攻击者或可能的攻击者。系统相应地做出反应，允许正常的内部人员继续工作，阻止攻击者，并使用决策树对第二层中可能的攻击者进行进一步的调查。仿真结果表明，该系统能够以99.67%的检测准确率检测出内部攻击。
papers.title_zh: 云计算系统中内部攻击的分层检测

papers.title: A secure mobile commerce framework based on community cloud
papers.authors: Hisham M. Alsaghier
papers.abstract: The exponential growth of the mobile applications and emerging concept of cloud computing (CC) has introduced a new realm of research known as mobile commerce based on cloud. In this paper, we propose a secure mobile commerce framework based on Banking Community Cloud (BCC).
