This paper overcomes all the flaws in the existing literature by making use of wireless public key infrastructure (WPKI), Universal Integrated Circuit Card (UICC) and BCC thereby achieving end to end security. Client's data will be protected during the transit and during the storage in cloud from cloud providers and from attackers. End to end security is ensured thereby ensuring authentication, integrity, confidentiality, and non-repudiation properties. Proposed protocols are free from attacks as they are formally verified using formal methods such as BAN logic.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动应用的指数级增长和新兴的云计算概念引入了一个新的研究领域，即基于云的移动商务。本文提出了一个基于银行社区云的安全移动商务框架。本文利用无线公钥基础设施(WPKI)、通用集成电路卡(UICC)和BCC克服了现有文献中的所有缺陷，从而实现了端到端的安全性。客户的数据在传输和存储期间将受到保护，不会受到云提供商和攻击者的攻击。确保了端到端的安全性，从而确保了认证、完整性、机密性和不可否认性。所提出的协议不会受到攻击，因为它们是使用诸如BAN逻辑之类的正式方法来正式验证的。
papers.title_zh: 基于社区云的安全移动商务框架

papers.title: Evaluation of puzzle-enabled proxy-assisted denial-of-service protection for web services
papers.authors: Jothi Rangasamy, Lakshmi Kuppusamy, Gopi Krishnan, Velmurugan
papers.abstract: Denial-of-service (DoS) attacks are a fast growing, severe menace to the availability of desired services. In this work, we investigate the efficacy of a cryptographic DoS countermeasure, namely, client puzzles which can be used to achieve a weak authentication as it forces the client to solve a somewhat-difficult computational problem in order to get serviced. We aim to make a web service more resilient to DoS attacks by using a reverse proxy between clients and the service provider. Unlike previous works, we integrate puzzles into reverse proxy and demonstrate that the proposed approach is indeed effective and advantageous in protecting the web servers from both flooding and semantic-type attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 拒绝服务(DoS)攻击是一种快速增长的对所需服务可用性的严重威胁。在这项工作中，我们研究了加密DoS对策的有效性，即客户端难题，它可以用来实现弱认证，因为它迫使客户端解决一个有些困难的计算问题，以便获得服务。我们的目标是通过在客户端和服务提供者之间使用反向代理，使web服务更能抵御DoS攻击。与以前的工作不同，我们将puzzles集成到反向代理中，并证明了所提出的方法在保护web服务器免受洪泛和语义类型攻击方面确实是有效和有利的。
papers.title_zh: 针对web服务的启用谜题的代理辅助拒绝服务保护的评估

papers.title: Mitigating selfish, blackhole and wormhole attacks in DTN in a secure, cooperative way
papers.authors: Amit Kr. Gupta, Jyotsna Kumar Mandal, Indrajit Bhattacharya
papers.abstract: In this work, security threats posed by selfish, blackhole and wormhole attacks in a delay tolerant network (DTN) are addressed. A cooperative approach has been proposed as a solution where malicious behaviour of a node is tested whenever another node tries to send a message to it. Performance parameters, like received and sent messages to neighbouring nodes have been used along with calculated faith values (CFV) to derive latest CFVs. The process is repeated for each communication instance. In addition, a simple yet efficient credibility-based cryptographic encryption technique is applied to encrypt message contents that works by appending the signatures and CFV values of each encountered nodes. The method has been tested, by implementing it over the spray and wait DTN protocol, in the ONE simulator. The proposed strategy is able to avoid the three types of malicious nodes effectively and increases the trustworthiness of communication process greatly.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，提出了在延迟容忍网络(DTN)中由自私、黑洞和虫洞攻击构成的安全威胁。已经提出了一种合作方法作为解决方案，其中每当另一个节点试图向其发送消息时，就测试一个节点的恶意行为。性能参数，如接收到的和发送到相邻节点的消息，已经与计算的信任值(CFV)一起用于导出最新的CFV。对每个通信实例重复该过程。此外，一种简单而有效的基于可信度的加密技术被应用于加密消息内容，该加密技术通过附加每个遇到的节点的签名和CFV值来工作。该方法已经通过在一个模拟器中在喷射和等待DTN协议上实现它而被测试。该策略能够有效避免三种类型的恶意节点，大大增加了通信过程的可信度。
papers.title_zh: 以安全、合作的方式减轻DTN的自私、黑洞和虫洞攻击

papers.title: Accountable administration in operating systems
papers.authors: Lei Zeng, Hui Chen, Yang Xiao
papers.abstract: Many security models and systems are based on the assumption that super users must be trusted. It is difficult to hold super users accountable because they can erase any logs of their activities and impersonate as other users. This work proposes an accountable system administration model for operating systems where the notion of super users is removed and all system administrators must be accounted for their activities even if they are untrustworthy. The model is built upon a premise that such a system has multiple peer system administrators, and the peer system administrators ensure the logs of their activities are preserved and audited. The accountability policy and operating system primitives are designed and constructed so that the proposed model is provable. An enforcement mechanism that instantiates the model and enforces the policy is designed and implemented in Linux, a real-world operating system.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多安全模型和系统都基于超级用户必须可信的假设。很难追究超级用户的责任，因为他们可以删除自己活动的任何日志，并冒充其他用户。这项工作为操作系统提出了一个可问责的系统管理模型，其中超级用户的概念被删除，所有系统管理员必须对他们的活动负责，即使他们是不可信的。该模型建立在这样一个前提上，即这样一个系统具有多个对等系统管理员，并且对等系统管理员确保他们的活动日志被保存和审计。设计和构造了责任策略和操作系统原语，使得所提出的模型是可证明的。在现实世界的操作系统Linux中，设计并实现了实例化模型和实施策略的实施机制。
papers.title_zh: 操作系统中的责任管理

papers.title: Security engineering methods - in-depth analysis
papers.authors: Shruti Jaiswal, Daya Gupta
papers.abstract: Providing security to complex information system development is challenging because of complex network and ubiquitous system. Traditional mechanisms address security concerns during development or design phases that may lead to various loopholes or over-constrained system. The field of security engineering has emerged whereby security requirements are gathered along with other requirements during the initial phase of software development. However, dealing with security concerns during the initial phases of development is challenging because of design and code unavailability. The paper first represents the proposals for security requirements engineering based on different approaches such as use case approach, goal-oriented approach, and process-oriented approach. These methodologies are evaluated along various parameters such as security engineering activities covered, application domain and others. The in-depth analysis ends with a recent proposal for security engineering and list of unresolved issues that needs consideration. The outcome of the paper can be exploited to drive further research.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于复杂的网络和无处不在的系统，为复杂的信息系统开发提供安全保障具有挑战性。传统机制在开发或设计阶段解决安全问题，这可能导致各种漏洞或过度约束的系统。安全工程领域已经出现，在软件开发的初始阶段，安全需求与其他需求一起被收集。然而，由于设计和代码不可用，在开发的初始阶段处理安全问题是具有挑战性的。本文首先提出了基于不同方法的安全需求工程的建议，如用例方法、面向目标的方法和面向过程的方法。这些方法将根据各种参数进行评估，如涵盖的安全工程活动、应用领域等。深入分析以最近的安全工程提案和需要考虑的未解决问题列表结束。这篇论文的成果可以用来推动进一步的研究。
papers.title_zh: 安全工程方法-深入分析

papers.title: Opportunistic key management in delay tolerant networks
papers.authors: Sofia-Anna Menesidou, Vasilios Katos
papers.abstract: Key management is considered to be a challenging task in delay tolerant networks (DTNs) operating in environments with adverse communication conditions such as space, due to the practical limitations and constraints prohibiting effective closed-loop communications. In this paper, we propose opportunistic key management as a more suitable solution for key management in networks requiring opportunistic behaviour. We show that opportunistic key management is better exploited and utilised when used in conjunction with routing decisions by security aware DTN nodes.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于禁止有效闭环通信的实际限制和约束，在具有不利通信条件的环境(例如空间)中操作的延迟容忍网络(DTN)中，密钥管理被认为是具有挑战性的任务。在本文中，我们提出机会密钥管理作为一种更适合于需要机会行为的网络中的密钥管理的解决方案。我们表明，当与安全感知DTN节点的路由决策结合使用时，机会密钥管理被更好地开发和利用。
papers.title_zh: 延迟容忍网络中的机会密钥管理

papers.title: A standardised data acquisition process model for digital forensic investigations
papers.authors: Reza Montasari
papers.abstract: Similar to traditional evidence, courts of law do not assume that digital evidence is reliable if there is no evidence of some empirical testing regarding the theories and techniques pertaining to its production. Courts take a careful notice of the way in which digital evidence has been acquired and stored. In contrast with traditional crimes for which there are well-established standards and procedures upon which courts can rely, there are no formal procedures or models for digital data acquisition to which courts of law can refer. A standardised data acquisition process model is needed to enable digital forensic investigators to follow a uniform approach, and to assist courts of law in determining the reliability of digital evidence presented to them. This paper proposes a model that is standardised in that it can enable digital forensic investigators in following a uniform approach, and that is generic in that it can be applied in both law enforcement and corporate investigations. To carry out the research presented in the paper, the design science research process (DSRP) methodology proposed by Peffers et al. (2006) has been followed.
papers.abstract_zh: 与传统证据类似，如果没有证据表明数字证据的产生与理论和技术相关，那么法庭不会认为数字证据是可靠的。法院对数字证据的获取和存储方式非常关注。传统犯罪有法院可以依赖的既定标准和程序，与之相反，没有法院可以参考的数字数据获取的正式程序或模式。需要一个标准化的数据获取流程模型，以使数字法医调查人员能够遵循统一的方法，并帮助法院确定呈现给他们的数字证据的可靠性。本文提出了一个标准化的模型，它可以使数字取证调查人员遵循统一的方法，并且是通用的，可以应用于执法和公司调查。为了开展本文中提出的研究，采用了Peffers等人(2006)提出的设计科学研究过程(DSRP)方法。
papers.title_zh: 用于数字取证调查的标准化数据采集流程模型

papers.title: Keyed hash function using Bernoulli shift map
papers.authors: Prathuri Jhansi Rani, S. Durga Bhavani
papers.abstract: Chaos-based cryptography involves real number computations and hence produces slow algorithms. In order to address this issue, the existing approaches use piece-wise linear maps that speed up computations. High-dimensional linear maps have been chosen to avoid dynamical degradation. In this paper, we claim that a single one-dimensional nonlinear chaotic map can produce ergodic orbits in a fast manner. We propose a keyed hash function that takes advantage of the interplay between chaos-based dynamics and Bernoulli shift dynamics. The proposed Bernoulli keyed hash function proves to be an efficient scheme achieving speeds on par with the existing schemes in the literature. Extensive validation is carried out at byte, block and the whole message level for collision resistance and sensitivity to key analysis. We provide empirical analysis to show that the proposed scheme is preimage and second preimage resistant.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于混沌的密码术涉及实数计算，因此产生缓慢的算法。为了解决这个问题，现有的方法使用分段线性映射来加速计算。选择高维线性映射来避免动态退化。在本文中，我们认为单个一维非线性混沌映射可以快速产生遍历轨道。我们提出了一个带密钥的哈希函数，它利用了基于混沌的动力学和伯努利移位动力学之间的相互作用。所提出的伯努利密钥哈希函数被证明是一种有效的方案，其速度与文献中现有的方案相当。在字节、块和整个消息级别进行广泛的验证，以防止冲突和对密钥分析的敏感性。我们提供了实证分析来证明所提出的方案是抗原像和第二原像的。
papers.title_zh: 使用伯努利移位映射的键控散列函数

papers.title: Data hiding using lifting scheme and genetic algorithm
papers.authors: Geeta Kasana, Kulbir Singh, Satvinder Singh Bhatia
papers.abstract: In this paper, data hiding algorithm by using lifting scheme and genetic algorithm (GA) has been proposed. Arnold transform has been used to scramble the secret image to secure the extraction of secret image. Lifting scheme is applied on the cover image to get the wavelet subbands. In this algorithm, scrambled secret image is embedded into significant wavelet coefficients of subbands of cover image. Scaling factor (SF) parameter is used in embedding and extracting process of the proposed algorithm and GA is used to optimise this parameter. This optimisation is used to maximise the value of peak signal to noise ratio (PSNR) of composite image and similarity index modulation (SIM) of extracted secret image. Experimental results reveal that proposed algorithm provides high embedding capacity and better quality of composite images than the existing data hiding techniques. To show the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm, statistical tests have been performed to show that the imperceptibility is maintained.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种基于提升格式和遗传算法的数据隐藏算法。利用Arnold变换对秘密图像进行置乱，以保证秘密图像的安全提取。对载体图像应用提升方案以获得小波子带。该算法将置乱后的秘密图像嵌入到载体图像子带的有效小波系数中。该算法在嵌入和提取过程中使用了比例因子(SF)参数，并使用遗传算法来优化该参数。这种优化用于最大化合成图像的峰值信噪比(PSNR)和提取的秘密图像的相似性指数调制(SIM)的值。实验结果表明，与现有的数据隐藏技术相比，该算法具有更高的嵌入容量和更好的合成图像质量。为了证明该算法的有效性，统计测试表明该算法保持了不可感知性。
papers.title_zh: 基于提升方案和遗传算法的数据隐藏

papers.title: Update enabled multi-keyword searchable encryption scheme for secure data outsourcing
papers.authors: Vasudha Arora, Shyam Sunder Tyagi
papers.abstract: Over the last decade, cloud computing has emerged as a distinct IT environment that is provisioned to provide remote access to a set of decentralised IT resources. Cloud computing enables the data owner to outsource their data and applications so that users could access the data from anywhere and at any time without any concern about local hardware and software management. However, concerns about outsourcing sensitive data cause privacy problems. Encrypting data before outsourcing protects data to some extent but searching on encrypted data may lead to compromised efficiency. Searchable encryption allows the cloud data to be retrieved efficiently based on certain relevance criterion. Our proposed scheme enables the dynamically updating already existing searchable encryption schemes with a high-level accuracy and security so that information leakage can be eliminated.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年中，云计算已经成为一种独特的IT环境，提供对一组分散的IT资源的远程访问。云计算使数据所有者能够外包他们的数据和应用程序，以便用户可以随时随地访问数据，而无需担心本地硬件和软件管理。然而，对外包敏感数据的担忧会导致隐私问题。外包前加密数据在一定程度上保护了数据，但搜索加密数据可能会降低效率。可搜索加密允许基于一定的相关性标准高效地检索云数据。我们提出的方案能够动态更新现有的可搜索加密方案，具有高水平的准确性和安全性，从而可以消除信息泄漏。
papers.title_zh: 支持更新的安全数据外包多关键字可搜索加密方案

papers.title: A novel quantum distributed key management protocol for ring-organised group
papers.authors: Rima Djellab, Mohamed Benmohammed
papers.abstract: Key distribution is a core building block for secure communication. In group communication, key distribution is not a simple extension of two-party communication. Many approaches were proposed in the classical field. Nevertheless, they are still based on the assumption that some computational problems are hard. Based on quantum mechanics lows, new field emerges allowing to generate and share a secret and secure key between two, or more, participants. In this paper, we propose new multiparty key distribution protocol in ring-organised communication group based on the well-known quantum key distribution protocol BB84. The security of the proposed solution is based on the unconditional security of the BB84 allowed by the mechanics lows and the mathematical proved secure operation XOR. In our proposed solution, each participant collaborates with a partial key in order to obtain at the end of the protocol the same group key that can be used for encryption aims. We also analyse and verify security properties of the proposed protocol. This is done using a probabilistic symbolic model-checker, the PRISM tool.
papers.abstract_zh: 密钥分发是安全通信的核心构件。在群组通信中，密钥分发不是两方通信的简单扩展。在经典领域提出了许多方法。然而，它们仍然基于一些计算问题很难的假设。基于量子力学定律，出现了一个新的领域，允许在两个或更多参与者之间生成和共享一个秘密和安全的密钥。本文在著名的量子密钥分配协议BB84的基础上，提出了一种新的环组织通信群多方密钥分配协议。所提出的解决方案的安全性是基于BB84的无条件安全性，这是由力学定律和数学证明的安全操作XOR所允许的。在我们提出的解决方案中，每个参与者使用一个部分密钥进行合作，以便在协议结束时获得可以用于加密目的的相同组密钥。我们还分析和验证了该协议的安全性。这是通过使用概率符号模型检查工具PRISM工具来完成的。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的环组织群量子分布式密钥管理协议

papers.title: A trust-based approach for securing data communication in delay tolerant networks
papers.authors: Djoudi Touazi, Mawloud Omar, Abdelhakim Bendib, Abdelmadjid Bouabdallah
papers.abstract: The proliferation of network technologies drives many different network architectures to provide huge variety of services and contents to end clients. This task becomes more difficult when we are in networks with intermittent connections, called delay tolerant networks (DTN) where security is an important issue. In this paper, we propose a trust-based approach to secure data transfer in DTN in the presence of malicious transporters. Our proposal is intended to a DTN architecture which includes several sub-networks geographically dispersed in isolated regions and having an intermittent access to an infrastructure-based network (like internet). Our approach is based on a particular web-of-trust, which is formed based on existing social relationship among clients and transporters. We conducted intensive simulations and the obtained results show that it offers high packet delivery rate and resists against malicious transporter's behaviour.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络技术的发展促使许多不同的网络体系结构向终端客户提供各种各样的服务和内容。当我们处于具有间歇性连接的网络中时，这项任务变得更加困难，这种网络被称为容迟网络(DTN ),其中安全性是一个重要的问题。在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个基于信任的方法来保护恶意传输者存在的DTN中的数据传输。我们的建议旨在建立一个DTN架构，该架构包括几个地理上分散在孤立区域的子网，并间歇性地访问基于基础设施的网络(如互联网)。我们的方法是基于一个特定的信任网络，它是基于客户和运输商之间现有的社会关系而形成的。我们进行了大量的模拟实验，实验结果表明该协议具有较高的数据包投递率，并能抵抗恶意传输者的行为。
papers.title_zh: 延迟容忍网络中基于信任的安全数据通信方法

papers.title: A survey on forensic event reconstruction systems
papers.authors: Abes Dabir, AbdelRahman Abdou, Ashraf Matrawy
papers.abstract: Security related incidents such as unauthorised system access, data tampering and theft have been noticeably rising. Tools such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems and anti-virus software strive to prevent these incidents. Since these tools only prevent an attack, once an illegal intrusion occurs, they cease to provide useful information beyond this point. Consequently, system administrators are interested in identifying the vulnerability in order to: 1) avoid future exploitation; 2) recover corrupted data; 3) present the attacker to law enforcement where possible. As such, forensic event reconstruction systems are used to provide the administrators with possible information. We present a survey on the current approaches towards forensic event reconstruction systems proposed over the past few years. Technical details are discussed, as well as analysis to their effectiveness, advantages and limitations. The presented tools are compared and assessed based on the primary principles that a forensic technique is expected to follow.
papers.abstract_zh: 与安全相关的事件(如未经授权的系统访问、数据篡改和盗窃)明显增多。防火墙、入侵检测系统和防病毒软件等工具努力防止这些事件的发生。由于这些工具只能防止攻击，一旦非法入侵发生，它们就不再提供有用的信息。因此，系统管理员对识别漏洞感兴趣，以便:1)避免将来被利用；2)恢复损坏的数据；3)在可能的情况下，将攻击者交给执法部门。因此，法医事件重建系统用于向管理员提供可能的信息。我们提出了一个调查目前的方法，法医事件重建系统提出了在过去几年中。讨论了技术细节，并分析了它们的有效性、优点和局限性。根据法医技术应遵循的主要原则，对所提供的工具进行比较和评估。
papers.title_zh: 法医事件重建系统综述

papers.title: MAM-ISSIDS: multi-agent model-based intelligent and self-sharing intrusion detection system for distributed network
papers.authors: K. Anusha, E. Sathiyamoorthy
papers.abstract: Intrusion detection system (IDS) is essential for protecting the computer networks from various threats and attacks. The autonomous multi-agent model (MAM) architecture is a scalable and smart alternative to leverage the strengths of the host and network based IDS. This paper proposes MAM-based intelligent and self-sharing IDS (MAM-ISSIDS) for distributed network to detect the host, network and web service attacks. Feature selection is performed by using the integrated particle swarm optimisation-genetic algorithm (PSO-GA) approach. The intuitionistic fuzzy rules are used to formulate the rules of the existing attackers for the benchmark dataset. The ontology structure is used to share the rules in network. The MAM is used for detecting the occurrence of abnormal traffic resulting due to the intrusion attacks. The proposed system achieves higher attack detection rate, accuracy and lower false positive rate due to the distributed sharing strategy of the MAM.
papers.abstract_zh: 入侵检测系统对于保护计算机网络免受各种威胁和攻击至关重要。自治多代理模型(MAM)架构是一种可扩展的智能替代方案，可以利用基于主机和网络的IDS的优势。提出了一种基于MAM的智能自共享入侵检测系统(MAM-ISSIDS ),用于检测主机、网络和web服务攻击。通过使用集成的粒子群优化-遗传算法(PSO-GA)方法来执行特征选择。直觉模糊规则用于为基准数据集制定现有攻击者的规则。本体结构用于在网络中共享规则。MAM用于检测由于入侵攻击而导致的异常流量的发生。由于MAM的分布式共享策略，该系统实现了更高的攻击检测率、准确率和更低的误报率。
papers.title_zh: MAM-ISSIDS:基于多代理模型的分布式网络智能自共享入侵检测系统

2015.journals_title: International Journal of Information and Computer Security, Volume 7

papers.title: Mobile device security
papers.authors: Kevin Curran, Vivian Maynes, Declan Harkin
papers.title_zh: 移动设备安全性

papers.title: Complementary witness soundness for witness indistinguishable proof system and CCA2 public-key encryption schemes
papers.authors: Haixia Xu, Bao Li, Qixiang Mei
papers.abstract: We introduce the notion of complementary-witness-soundness for a witness indistinguishable proof system. We then present a new general framework for public key encryption schemes, denoted as CWSWI-type encryption, based on a complementary-witness-sound witness indistinguishable (CWSWI) proof system. The construction of a CWSWI-type encryption scheme is relatively straight forward, while the security thereof against adaptive chosen cipher text attack (denoted CCA2) can be rigorously proven. Many existing CCA2 public key encryption schemes can be interpreted as being of CWSWI-type, including the schemes of Lindell, Cramer-Shoup and Peikert-Waters. Thus, our CWSWI approach provides a novel means for designing and analyzing CCA2 secure public key encryption schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于证人不可区分的证明系统，我们引入了补充证人可靠性的概念。然后，我们提出了一个新的公钥加密方案的通用框架，称为CWSWI型加密，基于一个互补见证-声音见证不可区分(CWSWI)证明系统。CWSWI型加密方案的构造相对简单，同时可以严格证明其抵抗自适应选择密文攻击(表示为CCA2)的安全性。许多现有的CCA2公钥加密方案可以被解释为CWSWI类型，包括Lindell、Cramer-Shoup和Peikert-Waters的方案。因此，我们的CWSWI方法为设计和分析CCA2安全公钥加密方案提供了一种新的手段。
papers.title_zh: 证人不可区分证明系统和CCA2公钥加密方案的补充证人可靠性

papers.title: Advanced security analysis of a signature scheme with message recovery
papers.authors: Lei Niu, Changqing Zhang, Qi Xia, Yong Yu
papers.abstract: Chang et al. proposed a new digital signature scheme with message recovery. However, several forgery attacks demonstrated that Chang et al.'s construction without using one-way hash functions and message redundancy is insecure. Nevertheless, it is unclear to see how to achieve the attacks. In this paper, more general forgery attacks are described to show clearly how to obtain these attacks. It is interesting that our general forgery covers all the known attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: Chang等人提出了一种新的具有消息恢复的数字签名方案。然而，几个伪造攻击证明了Chang等人的构造没有使用单向散列函数和消息冗余是不安全的。然而，还不清楚如何实现攻击。在本文中，描述了更一般的伪造攻击，以清楚地显示如何获得这些攻击。有趣的是，我们的一般伪造涵盖了所有已知的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 一个具有消息恢复的签名方案的高级安全性分析

papers.title: Performance analysis of buffered crossbar switch scheduling algorithms
papers.authors: Narayanan Prasanth, Kannan Balasubramanian
papers.abstract: The increasing demand for higher data rates on the internet requires routers that deliver high performance for high-speed connections. Nowadays high speed routers use the buffered crossbar switches, which have been the interest for research and commercialisation. In this paper, a study is made on the importance of buffered crossbar switches and their scheduling algorithms. Performance analysis is made for various buffered crossbar switch scheduling algorithms using non-uniform traffic patterns.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网对更高数据速率的需求日益增长，这就要求路由器能够为高速连接提供高性能。如今，高速路由器使用缓冲纵横制交换机，这已成为研究和商业化的兴趣。本文研究了缓冲交叉开关的重要性及其调度算法。对使用非均匀流量模式的各种缓冲交叉开关调度算法进行了性能分析。
papers.title_zh: 缓冲交叉开关调度算法的性能分析

papers.title: Implementing generic security requirements in e-voting using modified stegano-cryptographic approach
papers.authors: Olayemi M. Olaniyi, Oladiran T. Arulogun, Oluwasayo E. Omidiora, Oladotun Olusola Okediran
papers.abstract: Various information hiding techniques based on steganography, cryptography, and watermarking have been formulated in literatures to secure e-democratic decision making. The existing stegano-cryptographic models for secure e-voting are vulnerable to attacks and thus, can be manipulated by an eavesdropper. In this paper, we present an imperceptible stegano-cryptographic model for securing generic security requirements of e-voting systems. The purpose is to model a secure e-electronic voting capable of delivering credible, fair and transparent future e-democratic decision making in developing countries like Nigeria. The model was implemented on our framework for secure e-voting using Java programming language and Oracle database management system. The results of the study after qualitative performance evaluation of the model affirm that the model could serve as a platform for delivery of e-democratic decision making of high electoral integrity and political trustworthiness in developing countries with significant digital divides.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于隐写术、密码术和水印的各种信息隐藏技术已经在文献中被公式化以保护电子民主决策。现有的用于安全电子投票的隐写密码模型容易受到攻击，从而可能被窃听者操纵。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个不可察觉的隐写密码模型来保证电子投票系统的一般安全需求。目的是建立一个安全的电子投票模型，能够在像尼日利亚这样的发展中国家提供可信、公平和透明的未来电子民主决策。该模型在我们的安全电子投票框架上使用Java编程语言和Oracle数据库管理系统实现。对该模型进行定性性能评估后的研究结果确认，该模型可以作为一个平台，在存在严重数字鸿沟的发展中国家提供选举诚信和政治可信赖性高的电子民主决策。
papers.title_zh: 用改进的隐写加密方法实现电子投票中的一般安全要求

papers.title: A novel framework for secure file transmission using modified AES and MD5 algorithms
papers.authors: Rakesh Kumar, Geetu Mahajan
papers.abstract: With the tremendous growth of sensitive information on the internet, the security is getting more and more important than even before. However, the growth of users has unfortunately been accompanied with a rise in malicious activities. Millions of users are surfing the internet through various networks for different purposes. Therefore, they need highly safe and persistent services. The web-server or client endpoints should be secured while providing services or retrieving services. In this paper, a secure file transmission system using modified advanced encryption standard AES algorithm with two keys and MD5 hashing is proposed. Then, the file is transmitted to the receiver using client-server architecture that provides IP address-based wireless communication between source and destination. A robust and secure system is built which provides data confidentiality and integrity to the files. Finally, we compare the algorithms and prove that the proposed algorithm outperforms the other existing algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着互联网上敏感信息的急剧增长，安全性变得越来越重要。然而，不幸的是，用户的增长伴随着恶意活动的增加。数百万用户出于不同的目的通过各种网络在互联网上冲浪。因此，他们需要高度安全和持久的服务。在提供服务或检索服务时，web服务器或客户端端点应该受到保护。本文提出了一种基于改进的高级加密标准AES双密钥算法和MD5哈希算法的安全文件传输系统。然后，使用在源和目的地之间提供基于IP地址的无线通信的客户端-服务器架构将文件传输到接收器。建立了一个强大而安全的系统，为文件提供数据机密性和完整性。最后，对算法进行了比较，证明了该算法优于现有的其他算法。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的基于改进AES和MD5算法的文件安全传输框架

papers.title: Equivalence-preserving corrective enforcement of security properties
papers.authors: Raphaël Khoury, Nadia Tawbi
papers.abstract: Runtime monitoring is a widely used approach for the enforcement of security policies. It allows the safe execution of untrusted code by observing the execution and reacting if needed to prevent a violation of a user-defined security policy. Previous studies have determined that the set of security properties enforceable by monitors is greatly extended by giving the monitor some licence to transform its target execution. In this study, we present a new framework to model and study the behaviour of such monitors. In order to assure that the enforcement is meaningful, we bound the monitor's ability to transform the target execution by a restriction stating that any transformation must preserve equivalence between the monitor's input and output. We proceed by giving examples of meaningful equivalence relations and identify the security policies that are enforceable with their use. We also relate our work to previous work in this field. Finally, we investigate how an a priori knowledge of the target program's behaviour would increase the monitor's enforcement power.
papers.abstract_zh: 运行时监控是一种广泛使用的实施安全策略的方法。它通过观察执行情况并在需要时做出反应来防止违反用户定义的安全策略，从而允许安全执行不受信任的代码。先前的研究已经确定，通过给予监视器一些许可来转换其目标执行，监视器可实施的安全属性集被极大地扩展了。在这项研究中，我们提出了一个新的框架来模拟和研究这种监视器的行为。为了确保强制执行是有意义的，我们通过一个约束来限制监视器转换目标执行的能力，该约束声明任何转换必须保持监视器的输入和输出之间的等价。我们继续给出有意义的等价关系的例子，并确定使用它们时可强制执行的安全策略。我们还将我们的工作与该领域以前的工作联系起来。最后，我们研究目标程序行为的先验知识如何增加监视器的执行能力。
papers.title_zh: 安全属性的等价保持校正实施

papers.title: Hierarchical policy delegation in multiple-authority ABE
papers.authors: Peng Wang, Chinya V. Ravishankar
papers.abstract: We present HM-ABE, a hierarchical multi-authority attribute-based encryption scheme with policy delegation that generalises current work significantly. Current methods require encryptors to build ciphertext access policies themselves, using attributes published by authority domains. This causes problems, both since authorities may not publish sensitive attributes, and since users may not understand their internal policies. We permit encryptors to delegate parts of their access policies to authorities, who can construct appropriate policies on their behalf, using sensitive attributes, if needed. Delegation can be recursive. Delegation helps encryptors build more accurate access policies, especially when they must include attributes from multiple authorities. HMABE greatly reduces the chances that ineligible users gain access to data, or that eligible users are denied. Delegation lets authorities hide sensitive attributes, while still allowing users indirect access to their semantics. We show that HM-ABE achieves recursive attribute delegation, selective attribute hiding, and prove that it is secure.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出HM-ABE，这是一个基于属性的分层多权限加密方案，具有策略授权，可以有效地概括当前的工作。当前的方法要求加密器使用授权域发布的属性，自己建立密文访问策略。这导致了一些问题，一方面是因为权威机构可能不会公布敏感属性，另一方面是因为用户可能不了解他们的内部政策。我们允许加密器将他们的部分访问策略委托给权威机构，权威机构可以在需要时使用敏感属性代表他们构建适当的策略。委托可以是递归的。委托有助于加密器建立更准确的访问策略，尤其是当它们必须包括来自多个授权机构的属性时。HMABE极大地降低了不合格用户获得数据访问权或合格用户被拒绝的机会。委托允许权威机构隐藏敏感属性，同时仍然允许用户间接访问他们的语义。我们证明HM-ABE实现了递归属性委托、选择性属性隐藏，并证明了它是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 多权限ABE中的分层策略委托

papers.title: Modifications to GCC for increased software privacy
papers.authors: William R. Mahoney
papers.abstract: The paper describes methodologies added to the Gnu compiler collection GCC in an effort to create an obfuscating compiler. An obfuscating compiler creates programs which, when run, execute with the same results as un-obfuscated code, but which are more difficult to reverse engineer from the binary artefact. This provides increased protection with respect to the privacy of the intellectual property within the software, by thwarting the tools normally used to extract information from the binary executable. Reverse engineering technologies involving analysis of machine instructions are briefly described for background. The three methods of obfuscation implemented in the research are detailed: jump hiding, block shuffling, and junk insertion. Overhead in terms of space and speed are given using standard benchmark software.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文描述了Gnu编译器集合GCC中为创建混淆编译器而增加的方法。混淆编译器创建的程序在运行时会产生与未混淆代码相同的结果，但更难从二进制代码中进行逆向工程。通过阻止通常用于从二进制可执行文件中提取信息的工具，这为软件中知识产权的隐私提供了增强的保护。简要描述了涉及机器指令分析的逆向工程技术作为背景。详细介绍了研究中实现的三种混淆方法:跳转隐藏、块洗牌和垃圾插入。空间和速度方面的开销是使用标准基准软件给出的。
papers.title_zh: 修改GCC以增加软件隐私

papers.title: Secure file storage and retrieval in cloud
papers.authors: M. Thangavel, P. Varalakshmi, Mukund Murrali, K. Nithya
papers.abstract: Security in cloud storage is an important aspect of cloud computing. In this paper, a novel multi-level encryption scheme which ensures security in cloud is introduced. In this scheme, a modified RSA MRSA key generation algorithm is used to generate the phase keys. The file is first subjected to encryption using MRSA with phase public keys. For secure transmission, a modified Vernam cipher MVC is applied to the file and stored in the cloud. Upon request, the file is obtained by applying inverse MVC followed by MRSA decryption using the phase private keys. This scheme was tested on different types of input files. The proposed algorithms protect the system from brute force attack. The MRSA's computational time is significantly less compared to the traditional RSA algorithm. Frequency and spectral analysis proves that MVC is strong and effective. Thus the new scheme ensures both confidentiality and integrity.
papers.abstract_zh: 云存储的安全性是云计算的一个重要方面。本文介绍了一种新的多级加密方案，该方案保证了云中的安全性。在该方案中，使用一种改进的RSA MRSA密钥生成算法来生成相位密钥。该文件首先使用具有阶段公共密钥的MRSA进行加密。为了安全传输，修改的Vernam密码MVC被应用于文件并存储在云中。根据请求，通过应用逆MVC，然后使用阶段私钥进行MRSA解密来获得文件。这个方案在不同类型的输入文件上进行了测试。所提出的算法保护系统免受暴力攻击。与传统的RSA算法相比，MRSA的计算时间显著减少。频谱分析证明MVC是强大而有效的。因此，新方案保证了机密性和完整性。
papers.title_zh: 云中的安全文件存储和检索

papers.title: A map-based image steganography scheme for RGB images
papers.authors: Ratnakirti Roy, Shabnam Samima, Suvamoy Changder
papers.abstract: Majority of research in steganography focuses on hiding the secret information into the cover directly. The payload can be more secured by not embedding the secret in the cover at all. Instead, a partial information about the secret may be embedded which can be used for later payload realisation. This typically appears analogous to random noise and cannot regenerate the payload without a key. Common approaches to achieve such information include pre-embedding payload encryption. However, simpler cover-secret map-based techniques can also be thought of where such information is generated with optimal resource utilisation. This paper proposes a map-based data hiding scheme in images through image realisation steganography. The proposed technique works for colour and grey images. It also incorporates a multi-stage decoding key and there have been efforts to ensure that the technique conforms to high fidelity of the stego image and performs decently against steganalysis attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 大多数隐写术的研究集中于将秘密信息直接隐藏到载体中。通过根本不在封面中嵌入秘密，有效载荷可以更加安全。相反，可以嵌入关于秘密的部分信息，其可以用于以后的有效载荷实现。这通常类似于随机噪声，并且在没有密钥的情况下不能重新生成有效载荷。获得这种信息的常见方法包括预嵌入有效载荷加密。然而，也可以想到更简单的基于隐藏秘密地图的技术，其中这种信息是以最佳资源利用产生的。通过图像实现隐写术，提出了一种基于地图的图像数据隐藏方案。所提出的技术适用于彩色和灰度图像。它还包含一个多级解码密钥，并且一直在努力确保该技术符合隐写图像的高保真度，并在抗隐写分析攻击方面表现良好。
papers.title_zh: 一种基于地图的RGB图像隐写方案

papers.title: Application-layer denial of service attacks: taxonomy and survey
papers.authors: Georgios Mantas, Natalia Stakhanova, Hugo Gonzalez, Hossein Hadian Jazi, Ali A. Ghorbani
papers.abstract: The recent escalation of application-layer denial of service DoS attacks has attracted a significant interest of the security research community. Since application-layer DoS attacks usually do not manifest themselves at the network level, they avoid traditional network-layer-based detection. Therefore, the security community has focused on specialised application-layer DoS attacks detection and mitigation mechanisms. However, the deployment of reliable and efficient defence mechanisms against these attacks requires the comprehensive understanding of the existing application-layer DoS attacks supported by a unified terminology. Thus, in this paper we address this issue and devise a taxonomy of application-layer DoS attacks. By devising the proposed taxonomy, we intend to give researchers a better understanding of these attacks and provide a foundation for organising research efforts within this specific field.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近应用层拒绝服务DoS攻击的升级引起了安全研究团体的极大兴趣。由于应用层DoS攻击通常不会在网络层出现，因此它们可以避开传统的基于网络层的检测。因此，安全社区将注意力集中在专门的应用层DoS攻击检测和缓解机制上。然而，部署针对这些攻击的可靠且高效的防御机制需要全面理解由统一术语支持的现有应用层DoS攻击。因此，在本文中，我们解决了这个问题，并设计了应用层DoS攻击的分类。通过设计拟议的分类法，我们打算让研究人员更好地了解这些攻击，并为在这一特定领域组织研究工作提供基础。
papers.title_zh: 应用层拒绝服务攻击:分类和综述

papers.title: Data leakage triage: quantitative measure of effectiveness of containment plan
papers.authors: Jonathan Pan
papers.abstract: Increasingly organisations' deployed security defences are challenged by persistent malware attacks. There are many risks induced by successful malicious assaults against an organisation. One of the significant risks is data leakage. This risk has significant impacts to organisations and nations. To mitigate the likely occurrence of such risk, adequate preparation and response are needed. Epidemiological modelling of such malware outbreaks can aid in the development of mitigation plans. Most of these models used the number of infected hosts or time duration to analyse malware behaviours or the effectiveness of response plan. This paper proposes an extension of the agent-based malware containment model AMCM to provide a quantitative measurement of the amount of data leakage from malware infected hosts in order to evaluate the effectiveness of the response containment plan. It is believed that this form of measurement will enhance the preparation of incident response plans to deal with malware outbreak.
papers.abstract_zh: 越来越多的组织部署的安全防御受到持续恶意软件攻击的挑战。针对组织的成功恶意攻击会引发许多风险。其中一个重大风险是数据泄露。这种风险对组织和国家有重大影响。为了减少这种风险的可能发生，需要充分的准备和响应。此类恶意软件爆发的流行病学建模有助于制定缓解计划。这些模型大多使用受感染主机的数量或持续时间来分析恶意软件行为或响应计划的有效性。本文提出了基于代理的恶意软件遏制模型AMCM的扩展，以提供从恶意软件感染的主机的数据泄漏量的定量测量，从而评估响应遏制计划的有效性。据信，这种形式的测量将增强应对恶意软件爆发的事件响应计划的准备。
papers.title_zh: 数据泄漏分类:遏制计划有效性的定量测量

2016.journals_title: International Journal of Information and Computer Security, Volume 8

papers.title: A novel approach for hiding secret data in program files
papers.authors: Anoop Jyoti Sahoo, Rajesh Kumar Tiwari
papers.abstract: All large programs and software development projects, irrespective of application, generate a large amount of associated documentation. Documentation is an important part of all types of programs and software. It tells other programmers what the program does and how it works. Documentation helps others and teammates understand your work. In this proposed work, I have designed a method which hides important and secret data into the programs and software document parts with three layers of security. The resultant stego file undoubtedly can be transmitted anywhere using any channel. Experimental results show the feasibility of the proposed methodology.
papers.abstract_zh: 所有大型程序和软件开发项目，不管是什么应用，都会产生大量的相关文档。文档是所有类型的程序和软件的重要组成部分。它告诉其他程序员程序做什么以及如何工作。文档帮助其他人和队友理解你的工作。在这项工作中，我设计了一种方法，将重要的秘密数据隐藏到程序和软件文档中，具有三层安全性。合成的隐写文件无疑可以使用任何信道在任何地方传输。实验结果表明了该方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 一种在程序文件中隐藏秘密数据的新方法

papers.title: Advanced dynamic identity-based authentication protocol using smart card
papers.authors: Sandeep K. Sood
papers.abstract: Instances of password theft are rapidly growing in number. This is sufficient to shake the confidence of the customer in e-commerce. Authenticating the user on insecure communication channel like internet is an essential primitive and is target of various attacks. Therefore, remote user authentication is one of the most essential requirement for ensuring secure communication in today's ubiquitous computing environment. Smart card-based authentication provide multi-factor authentication for accessing web-based applications. In this paper, an efficient password-based remote user authentication scheme using smart card is proposed. The proposed scheme is an improvement of the scheme proposed by Hsiang and Shih in 2009. Proposed scheme is secure against all well known security attacks and has a low computational cost. The security of the proposed protocol depends upon two security parameters which makes difficult for an attacker to launch attacks on the proposed scheme. Moreover, the user and the server agree on the common session key. Afterwards, all the subsequent messages between the user and the server are encrypted with this session key. Therefore, the attacker cannot get any meaningful authentication information from eavesdropping even in insecure communication channel.
papers.abstract_zh: 密码失窃的案例在数量上正在快速增长。这足以动摇顾客对电子商务的信心。在像因特网这样的不安全通信信道上对用户进行认证是一个基本的原语，也是各种攻击的目标。因此，在当今无处不在的计算环境中，远程用户认证是确保安全通信的最基本要求之一。基于智能卡的身份验证为访问基于web的应用程序提供了多因素身份验证。该文提出了一种有效的基于口令的智能卡远程用户认证方案。该方案是对Hsiang和Shih在2009年提出的方案的改进。所提出的方案可以抵抗所有已知的安全攻击，并且具有低的计算成本。该协议的安全性依赖于两个安全参数，使得攻击者很难对其发起攻击。此外，用户和服务器就公共会话密钥达成一致。此后，用户和服务器之间的所有后续消息都用这个会话密钥加密。因此，即使在不安全的通信信道中，攻击者也无法通过窃听获得任何有意义的认证信息。
papers.title_zh: 基于智能卡的高级动态身份认证协议

papers.title: Reversible watermarking using channel coding and lifting for cultural heritage and medical image
papers.authors: Amit Phadikar, Poulami Jana, Baisakhi Sur Phadikar, Goutam Kumar Maity
papers.abstract: Reversible data embedding has drawn lots of interest recently, specially in the field of protection for cultural heritage and medical image. Being reversible, the original digital content can be completely restored. This paper uses Tian's algorithm of difference expansion as reversible watermarking scheme for the protection of cultural heritage and medical image. Lifting together with channel coding is used to increase the detection performance of extracted watermark bits. Experimental results and performance comparison with other reversible data hiding schemes are presented to demonstrate the validity of the proposed algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 可逆数据嵌入近年来引起了广泛的关注，尤其是在文化遗产和医学图像保护领域。由于是可逆的，原始数字内容可以被完全恢复。本文采用田的差分扩展算法作为可逆水印方案，用于文物和医学图像的保护。提升和信道编码一起用于提高提取的水印比特的检测性能。实验结果以及与其他可逆数据隐藏方案的性能比较表明了该算法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于信道编码和提升的文物和医学图像可逆水印

papers.title: Enhancing the security of modern ICT systems with multimodal biometric cryptosystem and continuous user authentication
papers.authors: T. Sahayini, M. S. K. Manikandan
papers.abstract: Most information and communication technology ICT systems authenticate the users with user name and password, only at the session establishment and no checks are performed further. Current security and transparency of the systems are enhanced by substituting user authentication with multimodal biometric techniques along with the continuous and sequential user authentication. In that the major apprehensions are outsourcing the biometric traits can be easily tainted by the non-legitimate users and the memory consumption will be high. To surmount these disquiets, in this paper, a framework pedestal on multimodal biometric cryptosystem with continuous and chronological authentication is proposed. In the enrolment phase, no raw biometric traits are accumulated instead encrypted and fused binary strings of the multimodal biometric traits are loaded. Subsequently in the authentication phase, authentication is continuous and sequential. As a result the recital of the proposed framework is enhanced in terms of security and memory utilisation.
papers.abstract_zh: 大多数信息和通信技术系统仅在建立会话时使用用户名和密码对用户进行认证，而不进行进一步检查。通过用多模式生物测定技术代替用户认证以及连续和顺序的用户认证，增强了系统的当前安全性和透明度。主要的担心是外包，生物特征很容易被非合法用户感染，内存消耗会很高。为了克服这些忧虑，本文提出了一个基于连续和时序认证的多模态生物特征密码系统的框架基础。在注册阶段，不积累原始生物特征，而是加载加密和融合的多模态生物特征的二进制串。随后，在身份验证阶段，身份验证是连续和顺序的。结果，所提出的框架的叙述在安全性和存储器利用方面得到了增强。
papers.title_zh: 利用多模式生物识别密码系统和连续用户认证增强现代信息和通信技术系统的安全性

papers.title: Applicability of keystroke dynamics as a biometric security feature for mobile touchscreen devices with virtualised keyboards
papers.authors: Christian Praher, Michael Sonntag
papers.abstract: Touchscreen-based smartphones with virtualised QWERTY keyboards are becoming increasingly popular and by and by displace the old numerical keypads of normal cellular phones. On traditional desktop computer keyboards, which basically feature the same layout as the virtualised smarthpone keyboards, keystroke dynamics analysis KDA algorithms have long since been successfully used as an additional factor for user authentication. However the question remains whether the algorithms used for desktop computers also achieve good results on touchscreen-based devices. This paper presents the results of an experimental user study on the performance of a KDA algorithm for desktop computers applied on a touchscreen-based smartphone. The results achieved are far inferior than those achieved with a desktop computer keyboard. As will be shown, standard typing characteristics like time between two key events which provide good results for user authentication on desktop computers are not sufficient for building a successful KDA algorithm for virtual touchscreen keyboards. Hence, this paper also identifies additional features that could be incorporated in such an algorithm in order to improve the accuracy of KDA on touchscreen-based mobile devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 带有虚拟QWERTY键盘的触摸屏智能手机越来越受欢迎，并逐渐取代了普通手机的旧数字键盘。在传统的台式计算机键盘上，基本上具有与虚拟化smarthpone键盘相同的布局，击键动力学分析KDA算法早已成功地用作用户认证的附加因素。然而，问题是用于台式电脑的算法是否也能在基于触摸屏的设备上取得好的结果。本文介绍了一项用户实验研究的结果，该实验研究是关于在基于触摸屏的智能手机上应用的台式计算机的KDA算法的性能。所获得的结果远不如用台式计算机键盘所获得的结果。如将要示出的，为台式计算机上的用户认证提供良好结果的标准打字特征，如两个按键事件之间的时间，不足以为虚拟触摸屏键盘构建成功的KDA算法。因此，本文还识别可并入此算法中的额外特征，以便改进基于触摸屏的移动装置上的KDA的准确性。
papers.title_zh: 击键动力学作为具有虚拟键盘的移动触摸屏设备的生物特征安全性特征的适用性

papers.title: A novel approach to enhance the network lifetime for hybrid routing protocol
papers.authors: J. Gnanambigai, N. Rengarajan
papers.abstract: The quintessential ambition of this work is with relevance to the clustering protocol in order to maximise the network life time of the WSNs that is achieved by clustering concept to reduce the energy consumption. Most of the clustering algorithms, specifically low energy adaptive clustering hierarchy LEACH, consummates enormous energy concerned with the overheads; repeated clustering head selection procedures, etc. In this work, a new LEACH-based hybrid clustering algorithm is proposed. This new routing scheme quadrant-based LEACH proposed is an admixture of two routing schemes LEACH WSN and Q-DIR ad-hoc. It uses the additional conceptual of quadrant formation, IGNs and restricted flooding to accomplish the ideology. As an additional focus the work concentrates on the radio model and devices the energy parameters relevant to the protocol operation. The results exhibits that QB-LEACH collaterally assures energy efficient operation when compared with that of its predecessors.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作的本质目标是与分簇协议相关联，以便最大化WSNs的网络寿命，这是通过分簇概念来实现的，以减少能量消耗。大多数分簇算法，特别是低能量自适应分簇层次LEACH算法，在开销上耗费了大量的能量；重复聚类头选择程序等。本文提出了一种新的基于LEACH的混合聚类算法。这种新的基于象限的LEACH路由方案是LEACH WSN和Q-DIR ad-hoc两种路由方案的混合。它使用象限形成、IGNs和受限泛洪的附加概念来实现思想。作为一个额外的焦点，该工作集中在无线电模型和设备与协议操作相关的能量参数上。结果表明，QB-LEACH与它的前辈相比，保证了节能运行。
papers.title_zh: 一种提高混合路由协议网络寿命的新方法

papers.title: An MDA approach to secure access to data on cloud using implicit security
papers.authors: Yasmina Ghebghoub, Saliha Oukid, Omar Boussaid
papers.abstract: Cloud computing has been developed to deliver information technologies services on demand for organisations or as individual users. In this paper, we describe an approach which proposes a security model bases on organisation role-based access control ORBAC and encryption system. This model aims to give users a possibility to control security of their data. In this scheme, a secret key is partitioned using a Galois field GF2
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算的发展是为了按需为组织或个人用户提供信息技术服务。本文描述了一种基于组织角色的访问控制ORBAC和加密系统的安全模型。该模型旨在为用户提供控制其数据安全性的可能性。在该方案中，使用伽罗瓦域GF2来划分密钥
papers.title_zh: 一种使用隐式安全性来保护云上数据访问的MDA方法

papers.title: Lightweight identity-based authentication protocol for wireless sensor networks
papers.authors: Farah-Sarah Ouada, Mawloud Omar, Abdelmadjid Bouabdallah, Abdelkamel Tari
papers.abstract: Wireless sensor network WSN is often deployed in hostile environments, which make it vulnerable to attacks. WSN comprises a large number of sensor nodes with different hardware abilities and functions. Due to the limited memory resources and energy constraints, complex security algorithms cannot be used in WSN. Hence, it is necessary to balance between security requirements and energy consumption. In this paper, we propose a lightweight public-key-based authentication protocol for WSNs. Our protocol uses identity-based encryption in order to lighten the energy consumption from the public-key certificate management. We have developed two variations of the proposed solution depending on the manner and when an attack should be detected. We perform an overall evaluation of our approach through simulations. The results indicate out performance of our approach in terms of energy consumption while providing effective security.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线传感器网络WSN通常部署在恶劣的环境中，容易受到攻击。WSN包括大量具有不同硬件能力和功能的传感器节点。由于有限的存储器资源和能量约束，复杂的安全算法不能用于WSN。因此，有必要在安全需求和能量消耗之间取得平衡。在本文中，我们提出了一个轻量级的基于公钥的无线传感器网络认证协议。我们的协议使用基于身份的加密，以减轻公钥证书管理的能量消耗。根据检测攻击的方式和时间，我们开发了两种不同的解决方案。我们通过仿真对我们的方法进行了全面的评估。结果表明，我们的方法在提供有效的安全性的同时，在能量消耗方面具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 无线传感器网络中基于身份的轻量级认证协议

papers.title: Key pre-distribution schemes to support various architectural deployment models in WSN
papers.authors: Pramod T. C, N. R. Sunitha
papers.abstract: The tremendous applications of wireless sensor technology for day to day activities are rapidly increasing. They have the ability to make the environment smart and prolific. As vulnerabilities on wireless sensor networks are increasing, ensuring secure communication has gained a lot of attention from past years. In this paper, by considering the resource constraints of those networks, three deterministic key pre-distribution schemes are proposed using the symmetric matrix property to support group, grid and overlay based architecture deployment models. The proposed key pre-distribution schemes aim to minimise the key storage overhead and increase the local connectivity and resilience of the network.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线传感器技术在日常活动中的巨大应用正在迅速增加。他们有能力让环境变得智能和多产。随着无线传感器网络脆弱性的增加，确保安全通信在过去几年中得到了很多关注。本文通过考虑这些网络的资源约束，利用对称矩阵特性提出了三种确定性密钥预分配方案，以支持基于组、网格和覆盖的体系结构部署模型。提出的密钥预分发方案旨在最小化密钥存储开销，并增加网络的本地连通性和弹性。
papers.title_zh: 支持WSN各种架构部署模式的关键预分发方案

papers.title: Performance comparison of TCP, UDP and TFRC in static wireless environment
papers.authors: RajaSekhar Rajaboina, P. Chenna Reddy, Raja Ashok Kumar, Nangil Venkatramana
papers.abstract: Mobile adhoc networks are being used for both commercial and non-commercial applications. Since adhoc networks are deployed on the fly without any infrastructure and because majority of the applications are critical, proper functioning of the protocols is essential. The transfer of multimedia is one of the essential requirements of the adhoc network. TCP, and UDP are the transport protocols that are generally used. TCP friendly rate control (TFRC) is the transport protocol that is being used for transfer of multimedia applications because of its smooth throughput. All the three transport protocols are designed from the beginning for the wired networks. Their functioning in the mobile networks is studied only recently. In this paper the performance of transport protocols TCP, UDP, and TFRC is analyzed in adhoc networks. The purpose is to identify the limitations of the three transport protocols in adhoc networks and understanding the scope for improvement. This paper considers only static adhoc networks. The topology is serial topology with each node separated by approximately 200m distance which is the typical communication range supported by the Ns2 simulator. Ns-2.35 is used as simulator.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动自组织网络正被用于商业和非商业应用。由于adhoc网络是在没有任何基础设施的情况下动态部署的，并且因为大多数应用是关键的，所以协议的正确运行是至关重要的。多媒体传输是自组织网络的基本要求之一。TCP和UDP是通常使用的传输协议。TCP友好速率控制(TFRC)是用于传输多媒体应用的传输协议，因为它具有平滑的吞吐量。这三种传输协议从一开始就是为有线网络设计的。它们在移动网络中的功能直到最近才被研究。本文分析了传输协议TCP、UDP和TFRC在adhoc网络中的性能。目的是确定这三种传输协议在自组织网络中的局限性，并了解改进的范围。本文只考虑静态自组织网络。该拓扑是串行拓扑，每个节点相距大约200米，这是Ns2模拟器支持的典型通信范围。使用Ns-2.35作为模拟器。
papers.title_zh: 静态无线环境下TCP、UDP和TFRC的性能比较

papers.title: Formally verified TSM centric privacy preserving NFC mobile payment framework and protocol
papers.authors: Kavitha Ammayappan
papers.abstract: Near field communication is on the verge of broad adoption worldwide. The combination of NFC and smart mobile devices are making the way of life more easier for millennials. Sensitive consumer information can be predicted using data aggregation and predictive data mining approaches on any profit-oriented open e-commerce business models which may potentially cause a privacy breach. In mobile payment, which is a popular e-commerce sub domain application, consumers' sensitive information potentially sits on retailers' server over which consumer has no control but hackers can exploit. This paper presents a new TSM centric privacy preserving framework and a protocol for NFC-based proximity payments. It prevents consumer data from ever touching a merchant's server where the majority of data breaches occur. The correctness of proposed privacy preserving NFC payment protocol is ensured here via formal modelling and verification using Proverif.
papers.abstract_zh: 近场通信即将在世界范围内被广泛采用。NFC和智能移动设备的结合让千禧一代的生活方式变得更加轻松。在任何以利润为导向的开放式电子商务商业模式中，可以使用数据聚合和预测性数据挖掘方法来预测敏感的消费者信息，这可能会导致隐私泄露。在移动支付这一流行的电子商务子领域应用中，消费者的敏感信息可能位于零售商的服务器上，消费者无法控制这些信息，但黑客可以利用这些信息。本文提出了一个新的以TSM为中心的隐私保护框架和一个基于NFC的近距离支付协议。它防止消费者数据接触大多数数据泄露发生的商家服务器。这里通过使用Proverif的正式建模和验证来确保所提出的隐私保护NFC支付协议的正确性。
papers.title_zh: 正式验证的以TSM为中心的隐私保护NFC移动支付框架和协议

papers.title: Design of a tweakable image encryption algorithm using chaos-based schema
papers.authors: Assia Beloucif, Oussama Noui, Lemnouar Noui
papers.abstract: In this paper, we introduce a tweakable colour image encryption scheme based on confusion-diffusion architecture, we use the piecewise nonlinear chaotic map to generate pseudo-random sequences through the encryption process. With the addition of the tweak identical, a plain image can be encrypted to different cipher images. Thus, it is impossible for an opponent to break the scheme. Satisfactory security performances are attained by only one encryption round and the effectiveness is much enhanced. We describe our algorithm in details and illustrate its security, effectiveness and robustness by using security analysis and simulations. Comparisons with existing colour image encryption schemes have been performed showing that the proposed scheme offers very affirmative performances.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了一种基于混淆扩散结构的可调彩色图像加密方案，通过加密过程使用分段非线性混沌映射产生伪随机序列。通过添加tweak identical，一个普通的图像可以被加密成不同的密码图像。因此，对手不可能破坏这个方案。仅通过一轮加密就可以获得令人满意的安全性能，并且效率大大提高。我们详细描述了我们的算法，并通过安全性分析和仿真说明了它的安全性、有效性和鲁棒性。与现有的彩色图像加密方案进行了比较，表明提出的方案提供了非常肯定的性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于混沌模式的可调图像加密算法设计

papers.title: Mobility information estimation algorithm using Kalman-filter for vehicular ad hoc networks
papers.authors: Fuad A. Ghaleb, Anazida Zainal, Murad A. Rassam
papers.abstract: In vehicular networks, the exchange of mobility information is considered as the basis for many applications. The quality of this information affects applications and networks performance. False mobility information leads applications, network services and security services to make wrong decisions. Accordingly, many verification approaches were proposed as a security countermeasure. However, most of these approaches assume accurate mobility information regardless of localisation errors occurrence. Therefore, estimating the mobility information is an important security procedure to enhance the verification performance. In this paper, mobility information estimation algorithm MIEA was proposed based on Kalman filter to estimate the actual mobility information from noisy measurements. To evaluate the algorithm effectiveness, the study used next generation simulation dataset NGSIM. White noises were injected into vehicle trajectories to simulate localisation errors. Results show that the root mean square error RMSE is reduced which implies the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 在车辆网络中，移动性信息的交换被认为是许多应用的基础。这些信息的质量会影响应用程序和网络的性能。虚假的移动性信息导致应用、网络服务和安全服务做出错误的决定。因此，提出了许多验证方法作为安全对策。然而，这些方法中的大部分都假定了精确的移动性信息，而不管定位误差是否出现。因此，估计移动性信息是提高验证性能的重要安全步骤。本文提出了基于卡尔曼滤波的移动信息估计算法MIEA，用于从噪声测量中估计实际的移动信息。为了评估算法的有效性，本研究使用了下一代仿真数据集NGSIM。白噪声被注入到车辆轨迹中以模拟定位误差。结果表明，均方根误差RMSE降低，表明了该算法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于卡尔曼滤波的车载自组网移动信息估计算法

papers.title: Anomaly-based network intrusion detection through assessing feature association impact scale
papers.authors: Jyothsna Veeramreddy, Rama Prasad V. Vaddella
papers.abstract: Phenomenal growth in the volume of computer network users leads to the drastic divergence of anomaly activities. Henceforth, it is quite obvious to consider the associability between network transactions and the feature involved to form those transactions. In this regard, the majority of current research is involved to devise signature-based intrusion detection using softcomputing techniques. Most of these soft computing approaches are delivering the computational complexity as On
papers.abstract_zh: 计算机网络用户数量的惊人增长导致了异常活动的急剧分化。因此，考虑网络事务和形成这些事务所涉及的特征之间的关联性是很明显的。在这方面，当前的大部分研究涉及使用软计算技术来设计基于签名的入侵检测。这些软计算方法中的大多数都提供了计算复杂性
papers.title_zh: 通过评估特征关联影响程度的异常网络入侵检测

papers.title: Investigation on defected ground-plane structures to improve isolation and correlation in multi-band MIMO antenna
papers.authors: M. Swagath Babu, G. Idayachandran, A. Rajesh, T. Shankar, Rangaswamy Nakkeeran
papers.abstract: In this paper, a cleft-shaped multi-band multiple input multiple output MIMO antenna has been investigated with various defected ground-plane structure DGS for wideband operation of global positioning system GPS at L2 band 1,200 MHz and long term evolution advanced LTE-A at tri-band 700 MHz, 1,800 MHz and 2,600 MHz wireless applications. The DGS includes co-directional complementary split ring resonator C-CSRR and rhombus structures. Through appropriate placement of these DGS, the reflection coefficient is found to be less than −10 dB and the bandwidth is at least 200 MHz in all the structures. With the proposed structure, the envelope correlation coefficient ECC is found to be almost equal to zero for C-CSRR and rhombus shaped DGS at all the bands.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，研究了具有各种缺陷接地平面结构DGS的裂缝形多频带多输入多输出天线，用于全球定位系统GPS在L2频带1，200 MHz的宽带操作和长期演进高级LTE-A在三频带700 MHz、1，800 MHz和2，600 MHz的无线应用。DGS包括同向互补开环谐振器C-CSRR和菱形结构。通过适当放置这些DGS，发现所有结构中的反射系数都小于10 dB，带宽至少为200 MHz。利用所提出的结构，对于C-CSRR和菱形DGS，在所有频带上，包络相关系数ECC几乎等于零。
papers.title_zh: 改善多频带MIMO天线隔离度和相关性的缺陷接地平面结构研究

papers.title: A qualitative framework for evaluating buffer overflow protection mechanisms
papers.authors: N. Raghu Kisore
papers.abstract: In the last decade, a large number of buffer overflow protection mechanisms have been proposed in the literature. The exponential growth of the Internet has greatly enhanced the chances of a large scale cyber attack. In the absence of a quantitative model to answer the fundamental question in security 'how secure is secure enough?', we propose a qualitative framework based on which we review existing buffer overflow protection mechanisms to better understand their ability to prevent/slowdown a large scale cyber-attack. We use the proposed qualitative framework to evaluate 24 different buffer overflow protection mechanisms and finally conclude with a report card to summarise the security gaps in each of these mechanisms. We believe that this work at the least would serve as a reference to the research community and security practitioners in the software industry.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年中，文献中提出了大量的缓冲区溢出保护机制。互联网的指数增长大大增加了大规模网络攻击的机会。在缺乏一个定量模型来回答安全中的基本问题“多安全才算足够安全？”中，我们提出了一个定性框架，在此基础上，我们回顾了现有的缓冲区溢出保护机制，以更好地了解它们防止/减缓大规模网络攻击的能力。我们使用提出的定性框架来评估24种不同的缓冲区溢出保护机制，最后以一份报告卡来总结每个机制中的安全漏洞。我们相信这项工作至少可以为软件行业的研究团体和安全从业者提供参考。
papers.title_zh: 评估缓冲区溢出保护机制的定性框架

papers.title: Application of quantitative security measurement model for prioritisation of vulnerability mitigation: a real case study
papers.authors: Anshu Tripathi, Umesh Kumar Singh
papers.abstract: Vulnerability mitigation is one of the key processes of proactive security management. Increase in complexity of IT systems and sophistication of attacks accompanied with rising rate of vulnerability evolution necessitate prioritisation of vulnerability mitigation. In this direction, a metric-based quantitative security measurement model QSMM was proposed in Tripathi and Singh 2013 that measures relative risk level of vulnerabilities and hosts in a network. Objective of the model is to assist system administrator in automated and reasonable decision making for mitigation of vulnerabilities present in a network. In order to evaluate the performance and effectiveness of the proposed model in realistic network, the model was applied in network of MIT campus. MIT campus network was used as the testbed to demonstrate the efficacy of model. This work presents a detailed account of this real case study and further, results are analysed.
papers.abstract_zh: 漏洞缓解是主动安全管理的关键过程之一。随着IT系统复杂性和攻击复杂性的增加以及漏洞演变速度的加快，有必要对漏洞缓解进行优先排序。在这方面，Tripathi和Singh在2013年提出了一种基于度量的定量安全测量模型QSMM，用于测量网络中漏洞和主机的相对风险级别。该模型的目的是帮助系统管理员为缓解网络中存在的漏洞做出自动和合理的决策。为了评估该模型在现实网络中的性能和有效性，将该模型应用于麻省理工学院校园网。麻省理工学院校园网被用作验证模型有效性的实验平台。本文详细介绍了这一真实案例研究，并对结果进行了分析。
papers.title_zh: 定量安全度量模型在漏洞缓解优先级排序中的应用:一个真实案例研究

papers.title: A robust zero watermarking algorithm for stereo audio signals
papers.authors: Sunita Vikrant Dhavale, Rajendra S. Deodhar, Debasish Pradhan, L. M. Patnaik
papers.abstract: Zero-watermarking techniques constructs zero watermarks without modifying the original host audio signal. This paper presents a robust zero-watermarking algorithm for stereo audio signals. The proposed algorithm exploits inter-channel redundancy of stereo audio signal in order to construct zero watermarks binary sequence. Here, the features are extracted from DWTDCT-SVD domain to construct zero watermarks; and are found to be robust against modified discrete cosine transform MDCT-based perceptual stereo audio coding schemes. Extensive experimental results assure that the proposed watermarking scheme is highly secure as well as robust to common attacks like, MP3 compression, cropping, filtering, re-sampling, amplitude scaling and re-quantisation, etc. To the best of our knowledge, zero-watermarking algorithm based on stereo audio properties is proposed first time.
papers.abstract_zh: 零水印技术在不修改原始宿主音频信号的情况下构建零水印。提出了一种鲁棒的立体声音频信号零水印算法。该算法利用立体声音频信号的通道间冗余来构造零水印二值序列。这里，从DWTDCT-SVD域提取特征来构造零水印；并且被发现对于改进的基于离散余弦变换MDCT的感知立体声音频编码方案是鲁棒的。大量的实验结果表明，所提出的水印方案具有很高的安全性，并且对常见的攻击，如MP3压缩、剪切、滤波、重采样、幅度缩放和重量化等具有鲁棒性。据我们所知，首次提出了基于立体声音频特性的零水印算法。
papers.title_zh: 一种鲁棒的立体声音频信号零水印算法

papers.title: A survey on security and efficiency issues in chaotic image encryption
papers.authors: J. Gayathri, S. Subashini
papers.abstract: The advent of digital and telecommunication technology, especially the internet, has paved the way for diversifying multimedia applications. Multimedia data such as video, audio and images have manifested themselves in proliferating internet-based applications. Consequently, there is a rapid growth of chaos-based cryptographic techniques to ensure security functionalities like confidentiality, integrity, or authentication. A host of research work based on chaotic cryptosystem has been proposed to satisfy the specific requirements defined for image communication. Despite all the notable development surrounding the chaotic cryptosystem, many of the proposed methods negotiate with the required number of attributes that influences the design of the cryptosystems. Associated with this issue, careful scrutinisation of the performance of the existing chaos-based encryption techniques is needed for its further development towards practical applications. A new taxonomy of image encryption techniques according to their association with the chaotic system employed in three different categories has been propounded to assess the security and efficiency functionalities. This survey attempts to summarise the existing image encryption techniques in all the three categories followed by a discussion on the security and efficiency constraints.
papers.abstract_zh: 数字和电信技术，特别是互联网的出现，为多媒体应用的多样化铺平了道路。诸如视频、音频和图像的多媒体数据已经在激增的基于互联网的应用中表现出来。因此，基于混沌的加密技术迅速发展，以确保保密性、完整性或认证等安全功能。基于混沌密码系统的大量研究工作已经被提出，以满足图像通信的特定要求。尽管围绕着混沌密码系统有了显著的发展，但是许多提出的方法都与影响密码系统设计的所需数量的属性进行协商。与这个问题相关的是，需要仔细检查现有的基于混沌的加密技术的性能，以使其进一步发展到实际应用。根据图像加密技术与混沌系统的关联，提出了一种新的图像加密技术分类法，用于评估图像加密技术的安全性和有效性。这项调查试图总结现有的图像加密技术的所有三个类别，然后讨论了安全和效率的限制。
papers.title_zh: 混沌图像加密中的安全和效率问题综述

papers.title: Towards service continuity for transactional applications via diverse device drivers
papers.authors: Shengzhi Zhang, Xiaoqi Jia, Peng Liu
papers.abstract: Existing techniques, such as state roll-back or replay can preserve as much accumulated 'state' as possible when one application is compromised. However, when operating system kernel is compromised, e.g., driver vulnerability exploitation, the default behaviour of most commodity operating systems today is to reboot from a clean initial state. All the running applications also need to be terminated and restarted, thus losing their accumulated 'work in progress' states. In this paper, we propose to leverage virtualisation technique to produce operating system replicas with driver diversity. By replicating transactional application on each replica and loosely synchronising them, we validate the output, critical memory regions and persistent data of transactional applications, thus detecting intrusion stemming from driver code vulnerability. We implement such diversity approach on Xen hypervisor, and rely on a proxy to conduct request replication and response validation. Our evaluation demonstrates that the proposed approach can accurately and immediately detect driver-bug-orientated exploitation and achieve on-the-fly intrusion response to ensure the correctness/continuity of the applications' execution. We only incur 4.44% and 4.7% overhead to response time and CPU respectively in the best case.
papers.abstract_zh: 当一个应用程序受到危害时，诸如状态回滚或重放之类的现有技术可以保存尽可能多的累积“状态”。然而，当操作系统内核受到危害时，例如，驱动程序漏洞利用，当今大多数商用操作系统的默认行为是从干净的初始状态重启。所有正在运行的应用程序也需要被终止和重启，因此丢失了它们累积的“工作进行中”状态。在本文中，我们提出利用虚拟化技术来产生具有驱动程序多样性的操作系统副本。通过在每个副本上复制事务应用程序并松散地同步它们，我们验证事务应用程序的输出、关键内存区域和持久数据，从而检测源于驱动程序代码漏洞的入侵。我们在Xen hypervisor上实现了这种多样性方法，并依靠代理来进行请求复制和响应验证。我们的评估表明，所提出的方法能够准确、快速地检测到面向驱动程序错误的利用，并实现即时入侵响应，以确保应用程序执行的正确性/连续性。在最好的情况下，响应时间和CPU的开销分别只有4.44%和4.7%。
papers.title_zh: 通过不同的设备驱动程序实现事务应用的服务连续性

2018.journals_title: International Journal of Information and Computer Security, Volume 10

papers.title: Performance analysis of image steganalysis techniques and future research directives
papers.authors: Sanchita Pathak, Ratnakirti Roy, Suvamoy Changder
papers.abstract: Steganography is a technique of hiding information imperceptibly inside other medium so that the very fact of communication taking place remains hidden. Recently, the reach of internet has extensively widened through social networking and blogging websites and a high amount of digital media interchange, especially in the form of digital images is being witnessed. This poses a huge threat to security from hackers and terrorists, as this medium can be used for covert communication, thus justifying the need for good steganalysis techniques to detect the existence of hidden messages in digital images. This paper analyses some steganalysis techniques which attack various kinds of spatial domain steganography techniques. Some of them are chi-square attack, triples analysis, sample pair analysis, TPVD steganalysis and analysis of adjacent pixel pair steganalysis. This paper also identifies the current research challenges and discusses possible directions for future research in this field.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐写术是一种将信息隐藏在其他介质中的技术，因此通信发生的事实仍然是隐藏的。最近，通过社交网络和博客网站，互联网的范围已经广泛扩大，并且大量的数字媒体交换，特别是以数字图像的形式被目睹。这给黑客和恐怖分子带来了巨大的安全威胁，因为这种介质可用于隐蔽通信，因此证明了需要良好的隐写分析技术来检测数字图像中隐藏消息的存在。本文分析了攻击各种空域隐写技术的隐写分析技术。其中一些是卡方攻击、三元组分析、样本对分析、TPVD隐写分析和相邻像素对隐写分析。本文还指出了当前的研究挑战，并讨论了该领域未来研究的可能方向。
papers.title_zh: 图像隐写分析技术的性能分析及未来研究方向

papers.title: Modelling a secure support vector machine classifier for private data
papers.authors: M. Sumana, K. S. Hareesha
papers.abstract: Privacy preserving data mining engrosses in drawing out information from distributed data without disclosing sensitive information to collaborating sites. This paper aims on the construction of a vertically distributed privacy preserving support vector machine classifier. The learning model is build for datasets, where one of the collaborating parties comprises the dependent attribute. Furthermore, the amount of privacy, computation speed and the accuracy of our classifier outperform other benchmark algorithms. Privacy of the perceptive attributes values of the cooperating sites are retained while performing secure computations. Collaborative classification is performed using these attributes. The site with the dependent attribute is the master site that initiates the process of secure computation to identify support vectors. Homomorphic property is used to protectively compute the data matrix on records/tuples available at sites. The recommended nonlinear privacy preserving classifier provides an accuracy equivalent to the non-privacy undistributed SVM classifier which uses all the attributes directly.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私保护数据挖掘专注于从分布式数据中提取信息，而不会将敏感信息透露给协作站点。本文旨在构建一个垂直分布的隐私保护支持向量机分类器。学习模型是为数据集构建的，其中合作方之一包括依赖属性。此外，我们的分类器的隐私量、计算速度和准确性优于其他基准算法。在执行安全计算的同时，协作站点的感知属性值的私密性得以保留。使用这些属性执行协作分类。具有从属属性的站点是发起安全计算过程以识别支持向量的主站点。同态属性用于保护性地计算站点上可用的记录/元组的数据矩阵。推荐的非线性隐私保护分类器提供了与直接使用所有属性的非隐私未分配SVM分类器相当的准确度。
papers.title_zh: 为私有数据建模安全的支持向量机分类器

papers.title: Reliable and secure communication using fundamental cut-sets and fundamental circuits
papers.authors: C. Pavan Kumar, R. Selvakumar, Raghunadh K. Bhattar
papers.abstract: Ensuring reliability and security has been a challenge in modern communication systems. To achieve these challenges, a novel reliable and secure communication system is designed in this paper. Reliability is achieved by constructing a class of error correcting codes called concatenated kernel codes. Security in terms of source authentication is achieved from using graph nature of trellis employing techniques from graph theory namely fundamental cut-set and fundamental circuit. It has been shown that the proposed communication framework achieves the goal of reliability and security considering the channel noise and cryptanalytic attacks. The theoretical basis of the proposed framework is validated and its performance is evaluated through simulations.
papers.abstract_zh: 确保可靠性和安全性已经成为现代通信系统中的一个挑战。为了应对这些挑战，本文设计了一种新型可靠安全的通信系统。可靠性是通过构造一类称为级联核码的纠错码来实现的。在源认证方面的安全性是通过使用格子结构的图形特性来实现的，该格子结构采用了来自图论的技术，即基本割集和基本电路。结果表明，在考虑信道噪声和密码分析攻击的情况下，所提出的通信框架达到了可靠性和安全性的目标。通过仿真验证了该框架的理论基础，并对其性能进行了评估。
papers.title_zh: 使用基本割集和基本电路进行可靠和安全的通信

papers.title: An end-to-end user two-way authenticated double encrypted messaging scheme based on hybrid RSA for the future internet architectures
papers.authors: Aniruddha Bhattacharjya, Xiaofeng Zhong, Jing Wang
papers.abstract: In future internet architectures, end-to-end (E2E) secured personal messaging is essential. So here an E2E user two-way authenticated double encrypted messaging architecture based on hybrid RSA for private messaging is proposed. Our P2P protocol works over TCP protocol for creating direct connections in between, with IPv4 broadcast options to discover peers on the same LAN. Our protocol implements perfect forward secrecy using Diffie-Hellman key exchange with renegotiation capability in every session with optimal asymmetric encryption padding and random salts. For making hybrid RSA with double encryption, in encryption level, main RSA is integrated with efficient RSA to give more statistical complexity. In the decryption process, the CRT is used for very high efficiency with integration with shared RSA. Our architecture also gives a hassle-free, secure, peer-to-peer, strong and reliable platform with E2E encryption for private messaging and it can also work with future internet architectures.
papers.abstract_zh: 在未来的互联网体系结构中，端到端(E2E)安全的个人消息是必不可少的。为此，本文提出了一种基于混合RSA的E2E用户双向认证双重加密消息体系结构。我们的P2P协议工作在TCP协议之上，用于在两者之间创建直接连接，使用IPv4广播选项来发现同一LAN上的对等体。我们的协议使用Diffie-Hellman密钥交换实现了完美的前向保密，在每次会话中使用最优的非对称加密填充和随机盐进行重新协商。为了实现双重加密的混合RSA，在加密层，主RSA与高效RSA相结合，增加了统计复杂度。在解密过程中，CRT通过与共享RSA的集成实现了极高的效率。我们的架构还提供了一个无障碍、安全、对等、强大且可靠的平台，采用E2E加密技术用于私人消息传递，并且还可以与未来的互联网架构配合使用。
papers.title_zh: 面向未来互联网架构的基于混合RSA的端到端用户双向认证双重加密消息方案

papers.title: Development of an efficient classifier using proposed sensitivity-based feature selection technique for intrusion detection system
papers.authors: H. S. Hota, Dinesh K. Sharma, Akhilesh Kumar Shrivas
papers.abstract: Intrusion detection system protects an individual computer or network computer from suspicious data and protects the system from unauthorized access. In this paper, we propose a feature selection technique (FST) known as sensitivity based feature selection technique (SBFST) which selects relevant features from intrusion data based on the value of sensitivity. We compare various existing FSTs with the proposed SBFST from three different categories of NSL-KDD data set. Experimental results reveal that C4.5 with SBFST performs better than other existing FSTs and produce a high accuracy of 99.68% with 11 features and 99.95% accuracy with nine features for the multiclass and binary class problems respectively. It has also produced 99.64% accuracy for both multiclass and binary class problems respectively with six and seven features. The performance of proposed SBFST is also verified using the intersection of features, segment by segment with other FSTs and found to be better.
papers.abstract_zh: 入侵检测系统保护个人计算机或网络计算机免受可疑数据的侵害，并保护系统免受未经授权的访问。在本文中，我们提出了一种特征选择技术(FST ),称为基于敏感度的特征选择技术(SBFST ),它基于敏感度的值从入侵数据中选择相关的特征。我们从三个不同类别的NSL-KDD数据集比较了各种现有的FST和提出的SBFST。实验结果表明，C4.5结合SBFST的性能优于现有的FST，对于多类和二类问题，11个特征的准确率达到99.68%，9个特征的准确率达到99.95%。对于多类和二类问题，它也分别用六个和七个特征产生了99.64%的准确率。提出的SBFST的性能也通过使用特征的交集，逐段地与其他FST进行验证，并且被发现更好。
papers.title_zh: 利用基于敏感度的特征选择技术开发入侵检测系统的高效分类器

papers.title: WeChat traffic classification using machine learning algorithms and comparative analysis of datasets
papers.authors: Muhammad Shafiq, Xiangzhan Yu, Asif Ali Laghari
papers.abstract: In this research paper, we present the first classification study to classify WeChat application service flow traffic (text messages, picture messages, audio call and video call traffic) classification and secondly to find out the effectiveness of big dataset and small dataset as well as to find out effective machine learning classifiers. We firstly capture WeChat traffic and then extract 44 features then we combine capture traffic to make full instance of dataset. Then we make reduce instances of dataset from the full instance of dataset to show the effectiveness of large dataset and small dataset. Then we execute well known machine learning classifiers. Using statistical test, we use Wilcoxon and Friedman statistical test for the datasets and ML classifiers to find more deeply its effectiveness. Experimental results show that reduce instance dataset show high accuracy result compared to full instance and C4.5 classifier perform effectively as compared to other classifiers.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇研究论文中，我们首先进行分类研究，对微信应用服务流流量(文本消息、图片消息、音频呼叫和视频呼叫流量)进行分类，然后找出大数据集和小数据集的有效性，以及找出有效的机器学习分类器。我们首先捕获微信流量，然后提取44个特征，然后我们结合捕获的流量来制作完整的数据集实例。然后，我们从完整的数据集实例中提取出数据集的约简实例，以展示大数据集和小数据集的有效性。然后我们执行众所周知的机器学习分类器。利用统计检验，我们对数据集和ML分类器进行了Wilcoxon和Friedman统计检验，以更深入地发现其有效性。实验结果表明，精简实例数据集比完整实例数据集具有更高的准确率，C4.5分类器比其他分类器具有更好的性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于机器学习算法的微信流量分类及数据集对比分析

papers.title: Node authentication algorithm for securing static wireless sensor networks from node clone attack
papers.authors: Vandana Mohindru, Yashwant Singh
papers.abstract: Wireless sensor networks (WSN) consist of small size sensor nodes with limited sensing, processing, communication, and storage capabilities. These sensor nodes are vulnerable to the node clone attack where the attacker compromises the node and extracts secret information from the node and replicate the large numbers of clones of captured node throughout the sensor network. Therefore, providing security in such networks is of utmost importance. The main challenge to achieve this is to make the security solution energy efficient so that it is feasible to implement in such resource constrained nodes in WSN. In this paper, an energy efficient algorithm is proposed for node authentication. The aim of node authentication algorithm is to authenticate the sensor nodes before message communication within WSN so that cloned nodes are identified in the initial step of the communication. This algorithm uses encryption decryption operations and also XOR, extraction, bitwise shift operations. The performance of the proposed algorithm is analysed in terms of communication, storage, and computation overheads metrics. Finally, performance of the proposed algorithm is analysed with the other node authentication algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线传感器网络(WSN)由小型传感器节点组成，具有有限的传感、处理、通信和存储能力。这些传感器节点容易受到节点克隆攻击，攻击者破坏节点并从节点中提取秘密信息，然后在整个传感器网络中复制大量被捕获节点的克隆。因此，在这样的网络中提供安全性是至关重要的。实现这一点的主要挑战是使安全解决方案节能，以便在WSN这种资源受限的节点中实施是可行的。本文提出了一种节能的节点认证算法。节点认证算法的目的是在WSN内进行消息通信之前对传感器节点进行认证，以便在通信的初始阶段识别出克隆节点。该算法使用加密解密操作以及XOR、提取、按位移位操作。从通信、存储和计算开销等方面分析了该算法的性能。最后，通过与其他节点认证算法的比较，分析了该算法的性能。
papers.title_zh: 保护静态无线传感器网络免受节点克隆攻击的节点认证算法

papers.title: The research of reputation incentive mechanism of P2P network file sharing system
papers.authors: Shaojing Li, Wanli Su
papers.abstract: In the digital information age, data sharing and security are important research topics, data sharing technology and information security technology have developed rapidly. The reputation incentive mechanism based on interest of nodes is important in P2P file sharing system. This mechanism can reduce the transaction risk in P2P file sharing system, improve the success rate of transaction and maintain the sound development of network. In addition, in this paper, two typical security problems (naive attack and sybil attack) are studied to minimise the damage to the network. The simulation and analysis of the success rate of resource location and transaction show that the reputation incentive mechanism is correct, feasible and effective. Furthermore, it has significant improvements in security and simplicity.
papers.abstract_zh: 在数字信息时代，数据共享和安全是重要的研究课题，数据共享技术和信息安全技术发展迅速。基于节点兴趣的信誉激励机制是P2P文件共享系统的重要组成部分。该机制可以降低P2P文件共享系统中的交易风险，提高交易成功率，维护网络的健康发展。此外，本文还研究了两种典型的安全问题(天真攻击和sybil攻击),以减少对网络的损害。通过对资源定位和交易成功率的仿真和分析，验证了信誉激励机制的正确性、可行性和有效性。此外，它在安全性和简单性方面有显著的改进。
papers.title_zh: P2P网络文件共享系统的信誉激励机制研究

papers.title: Robust injection point-based framework for modern applications against XSS vulnerabilities in online social networks
papers.authors: Shashank Gupta, Brij Bhooshan Gupta
papers.abstract: The authors introduced a universal and an automated server-side flexible framework, XSS-explorer, which automatically scrutinises the web applications in order to discover XSS attack vectors. XSS-explorer is capable enough for exploring and recognising all the injection points of web application and produces explicit XSS attack injection investigations for all such injection points. Our approach is based on methods permitting precise filling of injection points of forms with usable info. The identification of such injection points permits our technique to retrieve each possible web page of application, allowing a wider exploration and accelerating the discovery frequency of XSS attack vectors. We evaluate efficiency of our scheme on a suite of open source multimedia applications by applying F-test hypothesis and F-measure. These evaluations indorse that precise filling of the injection points by only usable info confirms an enhanced efficiency of the tests, thus accelerating the recognition rate of XSS attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 作者介绍了一个通用的和自动化的服务器端灵活框架，XSS浏览器，它可以自动检查web应用程序，以发现XSS攻击媒介。XSS探索者有足够的能力来探测和识别web应用程序的所有注入点，并为所有这些注入点生成显式的XSS攻击注入调查。我们的方法基于允许用可用信息精确填充表单的注入点的方法。这种注入点的识别允许我们的技术检索应用程序的每个可能的网页，允许更广泛的探索和加速XSS攻击媒介的发现频率。我们使用F-检验假设和F-测度在一组开源多媒体应用程序上评估了我们的方案的效率。这些评估表明，仅通过可用信息精确填充注入点证实了测试效率的提高，从而加快了XSS攻击的识别率。
papers.title_zh: 针对在线社交网络中XSS漏洞的现代应用程序的健壮的基于注入点的框架

papers.title: A nonlinear two dimensional logistic-tent map for secure image communication
papers.authors: Sujarani Rajendran, Manivannan Doraipandian
papers.abstract: In recent technology development, images are playing a vital role in different applications such as social network, biometrics, medical, military and satellite fields. It is essential to protect these images from intruders during transmission on insecure networks. This paper proposes a new chaotic map for image cryptosystem by combining tent map and 2D logistic map in different form. The proposed 2D Logistic-Tent map (2DLT) generates two chaotic series. These chaotic series are used to perform the confusion and diffusion phases of image cryptosystem. A comparison between existing standard 2D logistic map and proposed 2D logistic-tent map shows that the proposed map has high random chaotic series than the existing one. In order to evaluate the strength of the proposed image cryptosystem, the developed chaos cryptosystem was subjected to different analysis such as differential, key size and sensitivity, chosen plain text and cipher text attack analyses. All the analysed results proved that the proposed cipher has good security level and can be used for different secure image communication applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 在最近的技术发展中，图像在社交网络、生物识别、医疗、军事和卫星等领域发挥着重要的作用。在不安全的网络上传输时，保护这些图像免受入侵者的侵害是至关重要的。将帐篷映射和2D logistic映射以不同的形式结合起来，提出了一种新的用于图像加密的混沌映射。提出的2D Logistic-Tent映射产生两个混沌序列。这些混沌序列用于执行图像密码系统的混淆和扩散阶段。现有的标准2D logistic映射与提出的2D logistic-tent映射的比较表明，提出的映射比现有的映射具有更高的随机混沌级数。为了评估所提出的图像密码系统的强度，对所开发的混沌密码系统进行了不同的分析，例如差分、密钥大小和灵敏度、选择明文和密文攻击分析。分析结果表明，该密码具有良好的安全性，可用于不同的保密图像通信应用。
papers.title_zh: 用于图像安全通信的非线性二维logistic-tent映射
